summary: Back 2 School is a trivia game with challenging primary school questions that the player must answer to graduate from elementary school. Are you smart enough to pass elementary school? Play Back 2 School today and work out those brain muscles!

name: Bad Cat
summary: There are many different burgers in the world: a bacon burger, a chicken burger, a royal burger. But there is also a cat named Burger, and this guy is definitely too tough for you.

name: Back Again
summary: Can you make it to the end of this punishing 3D platformer or will you be stuck in the void? Back again features: Challenging levels to test your skill and patience, a unique changing soundtrack with a light narrative and creepy atmosphere. Also includes Survival Mode

name: Battle Crate Simulator
summary: Outfit your crates for battle, explore an open world or watch them fight in sandbox mode!

name: Battle Tops
summary: Battle Tops is a game where you can design and battle your own battle tops. Or battle them against random tops. There are also lots of customizable options and arenas so you can customize every battle. You can also play with your Twitch viewers.

name: Battle of the Robots
summary: Battle Of The Robots is a spectacular fighting game featuring robots. In this game you will find the most beautiful battles and fights in which you have to fight with robots. Engage in intense close combat and become the king of the martial arts! Defeat them all and stand on the podium of the winner

name: Barbarous 2: Tavern Wars
summary: Join Emyr and the Barbarous party on an epic Time Management adventure!

name: Banana Hunter
summary: Banana hunter - A prehistoric banana lover goes on his hunt in this unusual platformer! Collect goodies from the hordes of enemies and make your way into the light of your tribe's hot fire to survive!

name: Battle of Rebels
summary: Go for the high score and fight off waves of zombies in this single-player third-person and first-person shooter game. Battle of Rebels plays to your strengths and gives you the freedom to do more and be more while carving your own path to victory.

name: BadTrip
summary: Experience action survival horror game in dark scary forest like never before in unprecedented BADTRIP game. Detailed graphics, tense third-person action, and masterful storytelling - forest has never felt more scary

name: Battle for the Droid Station
summary: Battle For The Droid Station is a RPG shooting game now available on Steam. Feel the adrenaline as you run and gun down hundreds of rogue mechs and droids causing mayhem on the space station. Take control of your droid character and try to clear the space station from invading droids and robots.

name: Battle Brothers: Of Flesh and Faith
summary: The free 'Of Flesh and Faith' DLC for Battle Brothers expands the game with two highly detailed origins - the Oathtakers and the Anatomists -. two new banners, new equipment and more than 50 new events!

name: Ball Game
summary: Ball Game is an upcoming round-based racing game where you and up to 15 other players compete head-to-head to be the fastest on the track (inside of a bouncy ball, of course)

name: Battleships: Command of the Sea
summary: Take on the role of one of the historical commanders of the US or Japanese navy and use their special skills inspired by their character or military accomplishments.

name: Battery-out
summary: Battery-out is an action platformer with power routing.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Lake Hartwell
summary: Get ready to take on the monster Lake Hartwell and the most professional bass fishing tournament – The Bassmaster Classic. It’s time to go head-to-head with the competition and compete in a 3-round final on the Bassmaster 2022 Classic venue to become the champion and take home the coveted trophy.

name: Ball Pain
summary: Ball Pain is next in line to join the ranks of Rage Games. Can you get to the top before you start raging?

name: Battle of Finland: Winter War
summary: Battle of Finland: Winter War is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer. The Soviet Union began the conquest of Finland on November 30 1939, thus the Winter War was started. Can you help small Finland stop the red army steam rolling over Finland?

name: BangBang PewPew
summary: Finally, modern lightguns have become available for the PC that bring back the classic feeling of aiming down the sights. It’s time for the games to catch up! 25 lightgun challenges. Hot-seat multiplayer. Online challenges and leaderboards. Customizable targets.

name: Bad Guy: Neighborhood
summary: Roam a violent neighborhood as you complete various objectives to unlock a large variety of unique weapons and abilities. Encounter bosses, partake in mini-games, complete tasks to earn money or cause terror to the neighborhood people in this open world third person game.

name: Ballista
summary: Ballista is a completely immersive fantasy world with stunningly real physics and casual action adventure. In a realm under siege by destruction, tyranny, and even the occasional maleficent dragon, you must progress through five kingdoms to destroy the Bane Stones responsible for corrupting the very brick and mortar of the land’s thirty strongholds, and vanquish the Great Evil for good.

name: Battle Hunters Zero
summary:
Battle Hunters offers a unique and simple combat system that combines strategic command of your heroes with real-time action. Deploy special abilities, use items to keep you alive, and choose when to attack, defend or to run.

An adventure lasting over 16 hours, with a wide variety of locations to explore and a monstrous horde of over 80 enemy creature types to defeat. More than 25 unique heroes are waiting to be discovered - can you find and recruit them all to your cause?
So what are you waiting for? Choose you heroes, win the battle, save the kingdom.

name: Balloony's Adventure
summary:
Balloonys girlfriend got swept away by a strong gust of wind. Travel through 80 screens of spikes, traps, and pooping birds to save her.

Gameplay is inspired by the game Bubble Ghost, an old favourite of mine and although fans of Bubble ghost will see that gameplay is very different at the same time there is not much else to compare Ballonys adventure to.
Left click anywhere on the screen and Balloony will turn to face that direction, then Right click and he will fly off in the selected direction bouncing off of walls and generally being hard to control. Watch out for spikes, lava and other miscellaneous traps as you bounce your way through eighty screens of balloon popping mayhem.

name: Baby's Nightmare Circus
summary:
This time, you’ve gotten lost in your mind.

You’re trapped, unable to wake and remember. Best guess is to defend yourself in your dreadful sleep. Use your flashlight to ward off unwanted creatures. Venture to tents to explore.

Find a way out!

name: Backpack Hero
summary: Backpack Hero is the inventory management roguelike! Collect rare items, organize your bag, and vanquish your foes!

name: Banjo X
summary: Banjo X was a remake of Banjo-Kazooie that Rareware were developing for the Xbox in 2005, which was eventually cancelled and redeveloped into Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts & Bolts.

name: Ballygon
summary: Tilt the stage, turn the camera, and roll your way to the goal in Ballygon, a new labyrinth marble-rolling game! Challenge over 150 stages with unique mechanics in polygonal worlds. Go ball in with Ballygon!

name: Balloon Duel
summary: Balloon Duel was based off the 1984 NES game Balloon Fight, though it has taken some features out and introduced new ones.

name: Bad Writer
summary: Get ideas. Write short stories. Sell them to magazines. Try and keep happy and not give up from all the rejections.

name: Bad Bad
summary: You play as a shooter along the way shooting bombs, destroying barricades, finding supplies and roads until you see a helicopter to complete the game. After the battle, don't forget to admire the anime foot wall on the road.

name: Baldwin's Bear
summary: It's the magic of a carnival through the eyes of a child! From a fishing pool to a bouncy castle to a ghost train, each minigame is unique from the last, and holds its own little tricks and secrets. Collect tickets as Baldwin to afford the teddy bear, or race a friend for it in versus mode!

name: Banana Shooter
summary: In this game, you are not a banana, you are Dave, because you like to eat bananas, so the banana is taken away, the only way to get it is to kill other Dave. When you have the highest kill count, you will will get bananas. The whole game is a multiplayer battle type, you can configure your own gun or knife to fight against others. There are multiple maps in the game, you can get coins by killing enemies to upgrade, you can upgrade the movement speed, The upper limit of blood volume, but if you are accidentally killed, all upgrades will be cleared, which is a bit similar to roguelike, but it is a multiplayer battle type. And the map has a very hot back room recently, and my favorite strange core, which will definitely make your eyes shine.

name: Battle 19XX
summary: Battle 19XX is a 2D side-scrolling and easy-to-play war game where players need to lead their army to defeat the enemy, and at the same time, they need to go into battle to fight the enemy. A simple resource system, diverse arms, and weapons upgrade your weapons immediately to fight together.

name: Bacterial Edge
summary: The game is a shooting game of bacteria looking down on zombies. It has a certain terrorist element. The player plays a story of an eschatological survivor who has experienced difficulties and survived.

name: Banzai Escape 2: Subterranean
summary: Banzai Escape 2 Subterranean is an anime third-person action shooter and a sequel based after the events of Banzai Escape 2

name: Battletoads: Legacy Cartridge Collection
summary:
This version contains:

- Limited Edition of 2,000
- Brand-New Playable Cartridge
- Translucent Zitz Green and Ultra Limited Pimple Brown Cartridges
- Specialty Fold-Out Foil Box with Gloss and Embellishments
- Full-Color, Premium Instruction Booklet w/ Restored Artwork + Foreword by Jirard “The Completionist” Khalil
- Custom Dust Cover

name: Barbaria
summary: Welcome to Barbaria! Enter a brutal world where visceral motion-controlled combat blends seamlessly with god-scale base-building and asynchronous multiplayer raids. Attack other players, build defenses, and equip your team as you compete to be the Mightiest in Barbaria!

name: Base Craft: Desolate Survival
summary: Co-op twin-stick base building survival game.

name: Barton Lynch Pro Surfing 2022
summary: Barton Lynch Pro Surfing 2022 pits you against the world’s best surfer’s at the most exotic locations on the planet. An in-depth leader-board sports game meets free surf exploration at 12 massive worlds. Get pumped by the unique control, amazing weather & customization tools.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Jordan Lake
summary: Jordan Lake will give anglers plenty to find and fish. With unique environments such as small beach covered coves, underwater structures, 13 fish Species to catch, and 10 named legendary fish, Jordan Lake has something for everyone.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Lake Seminole
summary: Located on the border between Florida and Georgia is the beautiful Lake Seminole . Fed by the Chattahoochee and Flint Rivers, this reservoir is named after the Native American tribes indigenous to the Florida region.

name: Battle of Fate Awakening
summary: Battle of Fate Awakening is a card-based RPG battler, with a host of collectable characters ready to fight for your side and your attention.

name: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu Portable
Battle Pirates
summary:
With your arsenal of pirate weapons and a head full of strategy, blast away those enemy pirates and purge the seven seas!
Create your own team and pit it against the CPU, or someone you just dont like.

name: Barrage
summary: Tired of "Pew-Pew"pistol,Why not try about Bofors 40mm Anti-Aircraft Guns,or Mighty 88mm Flak-cannon?Shatter the sky with your BARRAGE,and ther is nothing like aiming or reloading can distrub you from shooting.

name: Battle of Heroes 3
summary: The hero acts as a mercenary who is sent to the border of the kingdom. Use combat and magic skills, explore the fantasy world, develop a hero and warriors, towers, aura, magic, weapons. Explore and create magical items. Grow a dragon or a cerberus.

name: Ballads of Hongye
summary: "Ballads of Hongye" is a unique city-building game. Unlike the conventional city-building games, lands in Ballads of Hongye are expanded by finishing the challenges in a limited time. Once you own the lands, you can take your time to build your dream oriental city with over 150 different buildings.

name: Balance Knight
summary: Balance Knight is a game in which the player must advance up a scaffolding shaken by physics.

name: Bad Soccer Manager
summary: Lots of minigames are hidden within the game that need to be completed. The more you complete the higher the morale. The higher the morale? The more attacking chances you earn on a match day. If your team love you then they will work like a dog to win at all costs!

name: Battle Support
summary: This is a 2d war game where players can use the support in the column below to support ground troops. Players can obtain various parts to upgrade their army by completing a game, making the army stronger and winning!

name: Bare Butt Boxing
summary: Take control of alien youngsters mesmerized by the sport of boxing as they battle it out all over our beloved planet Earth, unaware of the laws and traditions of human society. Enjoy the chaos and whimsy of simulated characters and environments in this action arena brawler that will keep you hooked with surprising combat twists and gameplay variety. Board the spaceship, we're off to the next scrimmage!

name: Battles of the Ancient World III
summary: The 'Battles of the Ancient World' game system is a tactical simulation of some of the greatest and most important battles from 1457 B.C. to 378 A.D.. Each, of the 5 scenarios available, features one of these great battles and players may play as either side. Each unit in the game represents an actual unit that participated in the battle, each with an actual strength between 250 and 1,200 men. The map represents the actual terrain over which each battle was fought. The game in the series has been designed to ensure maximum playability and historical accuracy, in that order. There are 60 different units across all the missions, ranging from elite Roman Legionaries, to Egyptian Chariots. Each unit has its own unique ability that you need to take advantage of in order to win each battle.

name: Baller Blast
summary: A new twist on the classic brick-breaker!

name: Back 4 Blood: Tunnels of Terror
summary: Tunnels of Terror features the all-new PvE areas “Ridden Hives”, along with 2 new playable Cleaners, new Legendary Weapons, 12 weapon skins, new cards, 8 premium skins, and the fearsome Warped Ridden to discover below the depths of Evansburgh.

name: Battle Shooter
summary: This is a First-person shooter game. Unique Modified weapons system to create the player's unique gun, conquer every enemy. The combination of the next generation of gameplay, diversified map and mode selection, leading players to the volatile battlefield, enjoy different game fun.

name: Backrooms: Levels of Fear
summary: If you're not careful and no-clip out of reality in wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, and endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz...

name: Battle Alliance
summary: This a strategy game all about enemy troops trying to break through your defences at any cost. Choose a location, plan your strategy and lead your troops to victory. You alone decide how to use budget available to you – to buy new weapons or to improve and strengthen existing ones. A number of weapons systems (infantry, artillery, high-tech weapons, navy) are available to you. Since the enemy attacks with different kinds of units, it is essential to make the right choice and the right placement. However, make sure that you have only limited resources available and that the weapons systems have different characteristics. If the situation gets too tricky, you'll need air support. But be careful. The enemy has the same options as you! The intelligently designed maps and the wide selection of weapons open up a variety of tactical possibilities and countless hours of entertainment.

name: Bacteriophage
summary: Bacteriophage Roguelike Platformer takes place inside the body of someone with many bacterial infections. You play as a cyborg named Terri (“like bacteria”), with a gun that shoots bacteriophage DNA-infused bullets. Your job is to make your way through this human body and destroy any and all bacteria and infections that stand in your way.

name: Bananab!!
summary: An obstacle course game for two players -- with a twist! Contestants start on opposite ends of a single race track, one moving forward, the other backward in time.

name: Babel
summary:
In the distant future, human beings invented space warps, which allowed space travel to long distances. On board the space ship Agamemnon, they started an intergalactic journey. But an accident happened, and the humans were thrown into a parallel universe. Years have passed until they have adapted themselves to the different civilization. This parallel world, composed of three huge continents, is called Babel. Zell is a teenage boy, an orphan who lives in a post-apocalyptic world riding his bike, together with his friend Alice, who is like a big sister to him. One day they meet a mysterious girl named Sefia who seems to be on an important mission. Their struggle against evil begins at that moment...

Babel is a Japanese-style RPG set in a futuristic world. Zell and his party travel around the world, visiting large cities and encountering many randomly appearing enemies. During the turn-based battles, each character can use a variety of attacks with different weapons, as well as special techniques. The combat window shows animated moves of the party members. Unlike in most role-playing games, characters do not receive experience points from defeating enemies; only money is gained. The characters level up according to the player's progress in the narrative.

name: Baseball
summary:
The LCD game of Baseball is a Sega Sports-branded baseball game created by Tiger Electronics. It was released as part of the Pocket Arcade series in 1994.

The game was re-released as Deion Sanders Baseball the following year, but aside from a title change and a different physical shell, the game is thought to be identical.

name: Batman
summary: Batman is a LCD game based on the Batman movie released in 1989.

name: Batman & Robin
summary: Batman & Robin is an LCD game based on the Batman and Robin movie.

name: Batman Forever: Double Dose of Doom
summary: A handheld game based on the Batman Forever movie.

name: Batman
summary: A wristwatch LCD game based on the Batman movie, released in 1990.

name: Batman: The Animated Series
summary: An LCD game based on the animation Batman: The Animated Series.

name: Batman Returns
summary: An LCD game based on the Batman Returns movie. It was released in 1992.

name: Battletoads
summary: Is a port for Tiger handheld LCD's devices.

name: Baladins
summary: Baladins is a choose-your-own-story multiplayer game (1-4 players online) inspired by Role-Playing Games. A whole campaign with friends, packed in 1-hour sessions!

name: Batman & Robin
summary: A Batman game released for the Tiger Electronics console R-Zone.

name: Batman Forever
summary: A game based on the Batman Forever movie, released for the R-Zone.

name: Battle Arena Toshinden
summary: A Tiger Electronics port of Battle Arena Toshinden. In the same year Tiger released two handheld versions, for R-Zone and VRT-X.

name: Bacon: The Game
summary:
Have you ever tried bacon on...
... ice cream?
... Piña Colada?
... the United States of America?

name: Base Jump: Wing Suit Flying
summary: Spread your wings and start flying like you’ve never been before! Base Jump Wing Suit Flying allows you to take part in awesome and exciting extreme sports. Use Wingsuit to jump and fly over multiple cool environments and beat your high scores!

name: Barkhan
summary: A harsh desert planet has become the stage for a brutal war between three Great Clans. A clash for control over the rare minerals scattered across the planet's surface to prove their superiority. In the heat of dynamic battles with the enemy's troops, be prepared to face and defeat the fearsome creatures hidden beneath the sands.

name: Batman & Robin
summary: A game for the Tiger Game.com.

name: Basureroes: Invasion
summary: “Basureroes: Invasion” is a 2D platform game with retro aesthetics in which a group of heroes with different abilities must save the world from an alien invasion. Run, jump and fight your way through twenty levels full of danger and epic boss fights.

name: Bad Cops
summary: A tactical SWAT simulator to be played solo or with friends/other Steam players. Are you a good cop or a bad cop?

name: Badminton Manager
summary:
Badminton is the fastest racquet sport in the world, but by playing Badminton Manager you can become a global champion from the comfort of your sofa! Start your journey by playing friendly matches against local opponents, earn money to train your player to improve their skills, and then enter tournaments around the world to win trophies.
Simple menus mean that anyone can start enjoying their path to glory straight away - it doesn't matter if you're a casual player or an experienced badminton pro!

name: Battle Fortress Defence
summary:
Battle for world domination over progressive Age's, beginning in the Stone Age, and advancing all the way through to the Space Age (if you survive!). Research technologies to make your base and units more powerful. Earn gold by killing your enemies to spend on more powerful units. Deploy your Super Weapons to crush your enemy.
To win you will need to employ military style tactics rather than just send out waves of troops. You will need to balance your attack and defense strategies with limited resources. Learn to deploy your Super Weapon at the right moment to gain the upper hand, with the knowledge that your enemy will be trying to do the same.

name: Batman
summary: A tabletop LCD game based on the Batman movie, released in the 1990s.

name: Batman Returns
summary: A wristwatch game based on the Batman Returns movie. It was released in 1992.

name: Battle Academy
summary: Approachable, absorbing and visually impressive yet detailed, Battle Academy aims to revolutionize the strategy games market with a blend of intuitive design and compelling game play driven by cutting edge technical innovation. Inspired by an original online game concept devised by the BBC, the game has more than 30 battles in a range of theatres of war from the North African desert through D-Day to the to the snowy Ardennes mountains where the Allies battled to repel the final German offensive.

name: Barcode Fingermon
summary:
Let’s become the Fingermon League Champion!
While testing out his teleporter, Doctor Philip accidentally scans a barcode and summons a Fingermon. After this incident, other people also found out that they can summon Fingermon using a barcode or QR code on the teleporter. These specially selected people with the ability to summon Fingermon are called Connectors.
3 years since then, the Fingermon League, a sport in which Connectors battle using Fingermon, has become the most popular sport. As a newly selected Connector, you have been invited to Fingermon League to take part in the League. Now, scan the barcode to collect Fingermon, and take on various Fingermon Leagues to become the Champion!

name: Baseball Everyday
summary: Baseball Everyday is a game where people can play a baseball everyday regardless of time, place and weather.

name: Battles and Castles
summary: Take control over one of the powerful clans, fight against beasts and knights to create an impressive kingdom!

name: Battles of the Ancient World II
summary: The 'Battles of the Ancient World' game system is a tactical simulation of some of the greatest and most important battles from 333 B.C. to 60 A.D.. Each, of the 5 scenarios available, features one of these great battles and players may play as either side. Each unit in the game represents an actual unit that participated in the battle, each with an actual strength between 250 and 1,200 men. The map represents the actual terrain over which each battle was fought. The game in the series has been designed to ensure maximum playability and historical accuracy, in that order. There over 50 different units across all the missions, ranging from elite Roman Legionaries to Alexander the Great. Each unit has its own unique ability that you need to take advantage of in order to win each battle.

name: Badland Party
summary: Badland Party continues its creators quest to perfect atmospheric side-scrolling adventures with stunning graphics and innovative physics-based gameplay. Witness the award-winning series take the visual allure another step forward, introduce dozens of new characters to play with and allow friends to play together in both local and online multiplayer modes. Or enjoy a single player adventure together with an AI companion.

name: Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered
summary: Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered is a survival horror stealth game that parodies cheap 90's edutainment and never takes itself too seriously. Explore Baldi's schoolhouse and try to find all 7 notebooks, but don't get caught by Baldi! He wants to play hide-and-seek, but something... Isn't right. Luckily you have a slew of items you can find and use to your advantage, but Baldi also has friends who can cause problems for you if you're not careful. And remember, Baldi hears every noise you make, so do what you can to stay quiet!

name: Back to the Dawn
summary:
A gripping prison escape RPG woven with crime, corruption, and hidden agendas. Step into a maximum-security facility where every inmate has a past—and a plan. You'll have to fight to survive, investigate, and ultimately break free before the time runs out.

Uncover a scheme that threatens more than just your life—it could bring down the entire city. In this thrilling adventure, choices matter, and escape is your only salvation!

name: Barbarium
summary:
Barbarium is a free action platformer, set in a post-apocalyptic world, where the man with the fastest lasergun and the biggest sword is the king.
Travel across exotic enviroments, kicking ass and saving girls. Fight towering bosses, drink beer, and enjoy a casual chat with the locals!

name: Barbie: Ocean Discovery
summary:
The Game Boy Color version of Adventures with Barbie: Ocean Discovery.
The PC and GBC versions are slightly different; The dolphin plays a more significant role in Windows than it does in the Game Boy Color version.

name: Barbie Pet Rescue
summary: In "Barbie: Pet Rescue" for Game Boy Color, Barbie must rescue stray animals after a thunderstorm hits Green Arbor Park. She uses vehicles to reach the animals, and some require mini-games to be completed before they can be rescued. Once the animals are back at the Rescue Center, Barbie must increase their health and happiness levels using different treatments. After the animals are healthy and happy, she returns them to their owners, sometimes by completing a final mini-game to match the animal with its parent. Each successful rescue earns Barbie a certificate, and progress is saved through passwords.

name: Barbie as the Princess and the Pauper
summary: In her new adventure, Barbie takes on two roles--Erika and Princess Anneliese. Based on the classic story The Prince and the Pauper, this game follows Erika as she tries to prove that she's worthy to be crowned queen. With the help of Princess Anneliese, you must help Erika move through the game's unique environments and settings--the village, castle, and forest--so that she is fully prepared for the coronation ceremony and her role as queen. Showcase Erika's best qualities by helping villagers, solving puzzles, and completing creative tasks.

name: Barbie in the 12 Dancing Princesses
summary: Barbie is cast as Genevieve, one of the twelve princesses who live with their windowed father King Randolph in a castle. They live a frivolous live, so Randolph brings over his cousin Duchess Rowena to raise them as proper princesses. She makes their lives miserable however and poisons the king, so they flee to a magical world brought to life through a story of their mother. Rowena traps them there, along with Genevieve's friend Derek, and they need to use a goblet to collect mystical water that can cure their father.

name: Barbie Fashion Show
summary: Barbie Fashion Show lets you help Barbie get ready for Fashion Week in Paris! Advance through 3 design studios creating stylish outfits for Barbie and her four friends to model. It's up to you to put on the coolest, most fashionable fashion shows ever!

name: Barbie Mermaid Adventure
summary:
In Barbie Mermaid Adventure, Barbie assumes the role of a specimen of that mythical fish-human hybrid, the mermaid, and plans a party with all of her undersea friends. Unfortunately, a magical light shell in the main palace broke. In order to fix it, Barbie needs to enlist the help of 3 rainbow dolphins.

Explore three exotic undersea worlds!; Play seven fun-filled games and activities!; Care for cuddlefish, free Whisper the whale, and more!; Collect decorations and hand out party invitations!; Help Mermaid Barbie and her friends compose the "Song of the Sea"!; Play two of a kind with school fish and watch them dance at the celebration and design a crown and necklace for Barbie to wear!

name: Barbie of Swan Lake: The Enchanted Forest
summary: Play imaginative games to restore the forest to its grandeur as you journey to six magical locations! Search for hidden items within each world as you paint murals, create a field of singing flowers, piece together puzzles, and more.

name: Barbie: Treasures in Time
summary: Barbie: Treasures in Time is a cancelled sequel to Barbie Explorer for the Nintendo GameCube and PlayStation 2. It was scheduled to be released in June 2nd, 2003.

name: Barbie Jewelry Designer
summary: Barbie helps you design all kinds of jewelry that you can wear. Mix and match colors, patterns, and pretty designs. Print favorite designs on the Print 'n Shrink material using an ink-jet printer, then simply cut them out and bake them in an oven. They miraculously shrink into colorful plastic jewelry.

name: Barbie as Princess Bride
summary: Barbie as Princess Bride introduces the player to a young Princess Barbie and her childhood friend, Prince Ken. The 2 grow up close together, fully intending to wed the day they come of age. One day, Prince Ken is called out to sea on a long journey but promises the princess that he will return to marry her one day.

name: Barbie Beauty Styler
summary: Barbie Beauty Styler is a creative painting / drawing package featuring Barbie and her friends Teresa, Kira and Christie. It is aimed at the younger gamer. There is very little writing, all the icons 'speak' to identify themselves as the mouse passes over them and the game regularly chips in with encouraging comments like 'You're really good at this' and 'Isn't this fun!'.

name: Barbie Magic Genie Bottle
summary:
Barbie Magic Genie Bottle is a computer game that is packaged with a custom-purpose input peripheral -- an actual genie bottle that attaches to a Windows PC via a standard PC 15-pin joystick port. The bottle is used to invoke special actions during the game and is thus a required component of the gameplay.

Barbie transports the player to the distant land where you will be assisting her. Barbie needs the player to visit 5 different lands and collect 5 different gems. In order to collect the gem in each land, the player must solve a puzzle. Solving the puzzle requires collecting 5 puzzle pieces scattered about the land.

Gameplay involves navigating through a first-person 3D city on foot and via flying carpet, which raises the player up to a higher plane. All the while, Barbie is in tow lending advice. Throughout different cities, the player also has to interact with other people and complete sub-quests that they assign in order to advance the game.

name: Barbie as Sleeping Beauty
summary: Barbie as Sleeping Beauty tells the story of Princess Rose, who was gifted with beauty, laughter and love by good fairies, but cursed by an evil fairy to fall asleep for one hundred years before her 16th birthday. Help Princess Rose get ready for her 16th birthday party, wake up her animal friends, design a crown and dress to wear to the party, and find the hidden fairies in the library to get the key to the banquet hall.

name: Barbie Nail Designer
summary: Design personalized nail stickers you can really wear. Join Barbie at her fabulous nail salon and choose a style to match your own--Daisy Days, Cool Styles, or Glossy Glam. Choose from an array of colors and animated designs, from pinks and reds, blues and greens, to rainbows and fun jungle prints. You can even create your own special nail designs. Then add sparkles and other finishing touches for the ultimate digital manicure. Now print the nails you have designed on special sticker sheets included--and wear your nails for instant fingernail fun!

name: Banjo-Threeie
summary:
Banjo-Threeie is a rumored third entry for the Banjo-Kazooie series that was supposedly intended to be made for the Nintendo GameCube in the early 2000s.

The game was first hinted at the end of Banjo-Tooie, in which the character Gruntilda jokingly says "Just you wait until Banjo-Threeie...", which was speculated to be evidence that the game was at one point planned by fans.

At SpaceWorld 2000, a small animation featuring characters from the Banjo-Kazooie series was shown, showing off the presence of Rare during the GameCube era of gaming. The animation features Banjo, Kazooie and Mumbo Jumbo being chased by enemies from Banjo-Tooie, all using their models from the game.

In 2002, Rare was brought by Microsoft, which caused various games developed for Nintendo systems at the time to move platforms, which would've included Banjo-Threeie.

Decades later, in 2020, the developer Gregg Mayles confirmed it to be simply a joke that fans took at face value, and the SpaceWorld demo was confirmed to simply be a showcase of how many N64 models the GameCube could render at once.

According to Mayles, a game in the same style as the first two wasn't in the plans, and they went through three different concepts, until setting on what became Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts & Bolts.

name: Baldo: The Guardian Owls - The Three Fairies Edition
summary: Action, adventure, dungeons... Dive into a thrilling odyssey!

name: Battlebots
summary: A cancelled video game based off of the Comedy Central series "Battlebots" that ran from 2000 to 2002. Featuring over 40 robots from the TV series in 4 different weight classes, as well as a custom bot builder for use in a tournament mode. The game was developed by Warthog and was to be published by THQ, but the game was cancelled late in development due to the cancellation of the TV series it was based on.

name: Bail or Jail
summary: A 3 minute tag-battle with extra twists! Play as a Monster who must lock everyone into jail before time runs out, or as a Human who must avoid capture and bail their teammates out of trouble. Invite your friends and family to play this speedy game of cat and mouse - or rather, Monsters and Humans!

name: Baw's Pharmacy
summary: Baw’s Pharmacy is a mobile time management and strategy game. Players manage a medical warehouse and sell products to hospitals and clinics. Customers will approach the sales counter and request a specific item for purchase.

name: Badanamu First Step
summary: Learn essential pre-k skills by playing with all the Badanamu and friends.

name: Bahari
summary:
You are a free diver whose passion for underwater photography will take you to discover the beautiful depths of the sea.

As a free diver you need to keep track of your oxygen level with the beats of your heart and make sure to refill your exhausted lungs from time to time. You’ll also be equipped with your trusty camera, with which you'll be able to photograph the terrain and fishes around you.

name: Balam and the Spirit Within
summary:
Balam and the Spirit Within is an action-adventure, side-scrolling, Metroidvania game heavily inspired by Mayan culture and mythology. Adventure through dense jungles, sprawling temples, primordial caverns, and the otherworldly planes of the gods. Fight wild animals, carnivorous plants, towering golems, and hybrid monstrosities created by the gods of the underworld.

Stand against challenging bosses and learn the true meaning of sacrifice to restore balance to the world.

name: Battlerace
summary: Battlerace is a simple first-person shooter that invites you and your friends to play together! The game combines the most popular and best gameplay modes in one production! In Battlerace you decide how to play!

name: Banjo-Kazooie
summary: The Xbox 360 remaster of Banjo-Kazooie has visual and performance improvements over the Nintendo 64 version. In this version, the player doesn't lose the notes after getting out of a stage, which is a major difference over the original, since it doesn't require the player to get everything again after leaving or dying.

name: Banjo-Tooie
summary: The Xbox 360 remaster of Banjo-Tooie has visual and performance improvements over the Nintendo 64 version. In this version, the player doesn't loose the notes after getting out of a stage, which is a major difference over the original, since it doesn't require the player to get everything again after leaving or dying. It also has a reimplementation of the Stop 'n' Swop feature, using the save data from the Banjo-Kazooie remaster to unlock new content.

name: Battle Chain
summary: A fun multiplayer battle arena, that will incorporate a global leaderboard soon!

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Bob-omb Battlefield
summary: A Banjo-Kazooie ROM hack which puts Banjo-Kazooie to traverse a reimagination of Bob-omb Battlefield from Super Mario 64.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Donkey Kong Country
summary: A Banjo-Kazooie ROM hack which reimagines the first level (Jungle Japes) from Donkey Kong Country.

name: Ball Hunter
summary: The hunter embarks on a journey into the deep forest of Tiger Mountain. Discover the secrets of the deepest part of the forest, unravel the mysteries of animals turning into spheres, and restore the forest to its original appearance.

name: Band of Mercenaries
summary: Band of Mercenaries is a couch one-hit kill respawning arena game in which your lives (respawns) are the mercenaries you hired. To win you can either be good on the battlefield or have money sense to make the battle unbalance from the start.

name: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: This edition includes Battlefield: Bad Company 2 game and Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - Vietnam expansion pack. It also features instant access to four vehicle unlockables and three weapons.

name: Basil Goes O.U.T.S.I.D.E.
summary: Basil does not usually like to leave his house. He thought he went to his comfy, safe bed as usual last night, now why’d he wake up in some dark cave in the middle of nowhere?

name: Bark
summary: Bark is a psychological/survival horror experience from the perspective of a small, innocent Jack-Russel Terrier living in an abusive household. Maintain your instinctual needs and desires as you try desperately to escape the house in which you have been forced to call home.

name: Babushka's Glitch Dungeon
summary: You are a little old lady who needs to clean up a big magical cellar. Learn colorful mind-bending spells, or just hit stuff with your broom.

name: Bathotel
summary: Step into the everchanging, claustrophobic world of Batho[tel]. After losing everything, including your own body, you find yourself walking through a hotel which seems familiar but eerily unwelcoming. Solve puzzles, avoid death, and learn about other guests as you explore the repeating world.

name: Banchou Tactics
summary: Banchou Tactics is a strategy turn-based role-playing game in the Japanese Gangster High School.

name: Bad Monday Simulator
summary: Battle against the fusion of Sans and Garfield - Sansfield! In this Undertale style battle simulator, you must quickly dodge attacks and use special moves and items to survive!

name: Batman: Return to Arkham - Arkham Asylum
summary: A remastered version of Arkham Asylum developed by Virtuos using Unreal Engine 4 for the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It includes all previously released downloadable content.

name: Batman: Return to Arkham - Arkham City
summary: Batman: Arkham City sends players soaring into Arkham City - a heavily fortified sprawling district in the heart of Gotham City. Batman Arkham City introduces a brand-new story that draws together an all-star cast of classic characters and murderous villains from the Batman universe.

name: Battery Low
summary:
Tap on time to charge your phone and deliver it to the charge point like a flip master! It's a perfect time to save the low battery and your phone too!

The Mobile phone is out of battery, and you have a zillion ways to put it on the charger! Just tap on time and aim at the target!

Make a clear strategy before you make your move, you don't want to break your phone while trying to do a home flip!

name: Banana Drama

name: Babysitter Simulator
summary: Babysitter Simulator is a casual game which prepares you for mature life! Your mission seems simple at first sight, but it is not so.

name: Bargue
summary: Bargue is an online role-playing game with 12 people. You can be a good customer, a bad mafia, or a neutral thief. To survive each round, you must convince the opponent with voice chat. At the end of the day, the surviving team wins!

name: Bag Boy Memory
summary: A Playdate remake of Sonic Advance's memory minigame

name: Basket Random
summary: Basket Random! Basketball is here with its most funny and random way. In Basket Random game, try to score a basket by using only one key with different variations from each other! Changing fields, changing players and changing balls do not surprise you! You can be the best of them all. You can play Basket Random game either against CPU or against a friend in 2 player gaming mode! The one who reaches 5 score first, wins the game. Have Fun!

name: BackfireWall
summary: It is a first-person tragicomic narrative adventure game that’s set inside a smartphone. You are the update assistant – solve puzzles to counter the update and save the previous operating system from deletion.

name: Ball With Pistons
summary: A game that will test your guts... Ball With Pistons has only one objective. Use the pistons to carry the ball to the top. No matter how many times you are dropped down, no matter what difficulties you encounter.

name: Battle of Billionaires
summary: Fight against other players online in this boxing game.

name: Battle Waves
summary: A fast-paced Card Battler with Tower Defense action! Claim victory in the Roguelite Deckbuilder campaign and Online Multiplayer. Collect all the factions to explore thousands of strategic combinations.

name: Bat to Bed
summary: A punishing vertical climb to the top of a serene forest, with simple but nuanced one-button movement.

name: Backrooms: Perpetual
summary: Backrooms horror multiplayer game that is procedurally generated.

name: Ball Torture

name: Bakso Simulator
summary:
Have you ever dreamed of having your own bakso restaurant?
Dream no further, because now you can do it all with Bakso Simulator!
In this world, you will own your own bakso restaurant with your old friend
Help the townsfolks by doing their quests and uncover all the secrets in town!

summary: Battleship is a free online game for 2 players. Arrange ships, wait for opponent and start playing.

name: Backstage Pass: The Ultimate Rock and Roll Trivia Game
Bass Pro Shops: The Strike - Tournament Edition
summary:
Grab your favorite rod, reel, and tackle box and get ready to enter the cutthroat world of competitive tournament fishing. You'll face some of the world's best anglers as you navigate a series of ten tournaments, situated on North America's premier fishing lakes.

Featuring over a dozen realistic species of game fish, and hundreds of lures and rod/reel combinations, The Strike: Tournament Edition is the closest to you'll get to a real tournament fishing without ever leaving the comfort of your living room couch.

name: Bad Birds
summary: Bad Birds is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. It's a traditional fangame, the main goal being to collect effects.

name: Banjo-Kazooie Online
summary: A Banjo-Kazooie mod that adds online compatibility through ModLoader64.

name: Barbarian
summary: A cancelled GBA port

name: Battleship
summary: Now it's your turn to sink your opponent's battleship in this Game Boy Color rendition of the classic strategic board game. Players deploy all four of their ships to different areas on a grid, and take turns firing shots at various parts of their opponent's grid. Hit each ship the required number of times, and the ship is removed from play. In a unique twist on the classic game, each ship has new weapons. For the solo player, there are 48 missions to complete with animated full-color cutscenes to inspire you to victory! The real challenge however, is taking on a human opponent via a link cable. Forget setting up the board and looking for missing pieces, this is the real way to play Battleship!

name: Battle Humanoid
summary: Deck construction roguelike x tower defense! Let's go on an adventure while making your own deck!

name: Basket Catch
summary: Pick up and collect falling objects! More than 100 stages!

name: Backroom Beyond
summary:
Backroom Beyond is a first-person game that mixes puzzles with single-player adventure in a dark, harrowing environment that makes the player question the protagonist's sanity. Based on the internet myth, Backroom Beyond goes further and makes the player wonder if that journey is about something more personal than anything else.

The narrative has two main points. Drawings tell part of the game's story on the walls. The drawings have no defined authorship, which gives them an extra degree of strangeness. The second point is the existence of The Guide, a being that instigates the players to think about their actions in real life.

The game basically has one objective throughout its 40-level journey: place the red box over the red button and open the door to the next level. It seems simple at first, but it's not. Each environment has its own logic. If the players feel frustrated because something went wrong in their strategy, they can press the “wake up again" button, which will return them to the beginning of the level.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Super Deluxe Edition
summary: Experience the thrill of competitive big bass fishing and climb the ranks to become the Bassmaster Classic champion!

name: Backstage
summary: A point-and-click search for clues behind the curtains. Will you piece together an idol's mysterious musical cover-up?

name: Baise Lesbienne!
summary: Quick, Marie! Search through the apartment and find the harness to be able to be sodomized by your two friends!

name: Bales of Amber
summary:
Welcome to the end of the world. In this Kafka-esque dystopia, the government has gathered all remaining animals in order to form the Animal Factorization Initiative. Now you live in an apartment inside a whale.

This surrealist seascape creates an opportunity to be an intimate part of the ecosystem you live in in a way that you never have been before.

name: Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 4 Player Cooperation Edition
Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 3 Player Cooperation Edition
Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 2 Player Cooperation Edition
Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 2 Player Cooperation Edition: Challenge Mode
Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 3 Player Cooperation Edition: Challenge Mode
Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 4 Player Cooperation Edition: Challenge Mode
Bara Beach Bear
summary: Help a hunky friend get off on the beach.

name: Bara Blackjack
summary: Play blackjack against a beefy frisky orc.

name: Backrooms of Reality
summary: A game in which you navigate through backrooms' mazes and solving simple environmental puzzles. Sometimes you may encounter some creatures that live there. The game contains horror elements.

name: Ballads at Midnight
summary: When a sarcastic bard is arrested and exiled to an abandoned castle, she expected to be at the mercy of a hungry, blood-thirsty vampire. She soon discovers that the vampire, Lucius, is not starving: he is gravely bored. She may just survive on borrowed time, one ballad each midnight.

summary: Blast through waves of enemy brigades or compete against your friends in Battle Tracks, a top-down action-adventure. Fight your way across unknown battlefields and against thousands of enemy tanks. Earn stars to compete against the enemy boss and advance to the next arena!

name: Battle of Tanks
summary: Don't let the army of enemy tanks reach the southern border of the battlefield. You have several guns at your disposal and the ability to call an airstrike. Move around the battlefield in the top view and choose the right guns to attack. You need to hold out for the allotted time.

name: Barista: Take Away
summary: Drag and drop game against the clock, where you will try to make the perfect coffee for each client

name: Ball Go Home
summary: Roll, jump, and fall through over 100 levels in this fun, difficult 2D physics platformer. Master a unique control scheme as you get your ball home!

name: Barricade
summary: Barricade is a zombie horde shooter with a classic 90's feel. Players use objects to build a barricade that protects their only source of upgrades. Endless waves of zombies will exploit weaknesses in your defenses. Will you juggle building, shooting, and repairing, or be overrun?

name: Ballex 2: The Hanging Gardens
summary: Ballex² is a third-person rolling ball game, the sequel to Ballex. You will control a ball, enjoy the scenery of the four seasons, overcome obstacles and solve various puzzles.

name: Battle for Wesnoth Legacy
summary: Battle for Wesnoth is a turn-based fantasy strategy game.

name: Backflip Dive
summary: Backflip Dive 3D is a 3D sports game in which the goal is to perform perfect flips and land successfully on the marked area.

name: Battle Map 2
summary: Take your adventure to the next level! Battle Map 2 will beautify tiles, calculate line of sight, and reveal traps - on your device, or on an external display!

name: Banana Hell: Mountain of Madness
summary: Jump your way to get the blue diamond as you try to survive a very annoying banana monologue! A REALLY HARD game!

name: Battle XXL
summary: You are what you drive.

name: Baba is You Xtreme
summary: Baba is back in this short freeware puzzle game! Revisit familiar mechanics and experience some wacky new surprises! Are you Hardcore enough to complete all the levels??

name: Battle Part
summary: 3D Vehicles Shooter focused on boss battles.

name: Banana Kong 2
summary:
Banana Kong 2 builds up on the original endless runner concept and adds entirely new challenges and ideas! Solve all-new missions, collect bananas and win golden Kong Coins to buy upgrades, hats and many other items in the crazy jungle shop! Become the King of the Jungle! While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to compete with your friends! Who will run the best distance? You can see your friends best results right in the game. Compare your records and unlock achievements while improving your playing style.

A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this never-ending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly. Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game.

name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold Game Creator
summary: Create 2D levels and missions with characters, enemies, and other entities based off the TV show, "Batman: The Brave and the Bold"

name: Bake it Till' You Make it!
summary: Bake it Till' You Make it is a cooking/sandbox game. You can bake treats, decorate cakes, and basically do whatever you want. Your kitchen has a wide variety of tools and ingredients from sprinkles, piping bags, and flamethrowers. The room also includes a large selection of multiple sprinkle colors and many ovens. You can grab one of the four cake types: loaves, bundts, cupcakes, and regular cakes and cook them inside of the oven. The cakes all have different cooking temperatures and times. Cook with caution as cooking cakes for extended periods of time could cause them to burn. You can also use the piping bag and color pipettes to apply frosting onto four different kinds of cakes. The frosting will then stick on the cake and allow for the cake to be transported. Sprinkles can then be shaken over the cake to add more decoration to the cake. The game is currently in early access and more tools and ingredients are planned and will be added in the future.

name: Bahnsen Knights
summary: 1986, Tornado Alley, USA… Go undercover as Boulder, an agent infiltrating the notorious religious cult known as the Bahnsen Knights. Face off against occultists, biblical storms, and an enigmatic car salesman turned preacher as you investigate the disappearance of a fellow agent and close friend.

name: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance II
summary:
Using the 3rd Edition Dungeons & Dragons rules set, Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance II features four new acts of hack-and-slash combat and powerful spell casting. Even more monster types will engage in real-time battles using the same overhead perspective as witnessed in the original game. Each selected character can parlay the experience gained from combat into acquiring new feats and enhanced abilities over time. To help in battle, a new item creation system lets players craft magical weapons and armor using raw materials found during their travels.

As before, two heroes can join the adventure in cooperative play on the same screen, with each character differing in the types of feats and powers under his or her command. Equipment can be found or purchased from local merchants using the gold looted from felled creatures or received as payment for quests. Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance II also features a number of hidden areas, secret characters, and literally hundreds of items to find and use, including potions, scrolls, and wands. In addition, the game features a new branching storyline that offers players a choice where to go next for fortune and honor.

name: Barista: Rise and Grind
summary: RISE to the top in this cozy third-wave barista simulation game. GRIND to be the best barista by roasting, brewing and serving customers the best coffee possible. Buy equipment to unlock new recipes and customize your café’s layout, branding and decor to manage the business how you want!

name: Bakeborough
summary: In Bakeborough, a Bakery RPG, you can take out your eye to see less.

name: Balam: Bounce Hell
summary: Balam: Bounce Hell is a non-shooting bullet hell set in Pre-Columbian America. You won't be able to directly attack the enemies you find in your path. It will only be possible to finish off your opponents by rebounding their own attacks. That is why, in Balam, defense is always the best attack.

name: Ballistic Zen
summary: Skate. Strafe. Wallrun. Master a unique movement system based on old-school air-strafing, updated for the modern age. Use your hoverblades to find hard to reach collectables and beat time trials in an open world. Feel the Ballistic Zen.

name: Baradroid: A Gay Visual Novel
summary: A choice-driven, high-tech, gay visual novel with elements of dating-sim! Choose your baradroid, Live with him, and... Can you teach a robot the meaning of human love?

name: Bananner Nababber
summary: It's a nice sunny day in Neo-Tartaria and ruthless killer Harry Pippels and his pretend friend Humpty-Ho are guzzling down some sprutzels and racking up a debt at the bar. Their life of luxury is soon interrupted however when the Elder Demon's diabolical crypto schemes threaten the lands.

name: Banner of Blood
summary: This medieval fantasy base-building game allows you to lead your warriors to traverse randomly generated battlefields. Reinforce the capital against the orcs' invasion.

name: Bad Impressions
summary: Bad Impressions is a game where you draw a character card and a scenario card and you have to improvise how that character would react to the situation. Hundreds of cards gives thousands of unique scenarios.

name: Base Commander
summary: A team MOBA where players try to outplay their opponents for control of empowered bases on the map.

name: Battle Charge
summary: Medieval 3rd person action RPG. Lead your troops and loyal companions into short but intense skirmish battles. Charge into the enemy lines. Use the best strategy to defeat the opposing army and defend your ground. Think tactics, epic clashes, shield walls, executions, traps & more. Survive & levelUp

name: Battlefield Priest
summary: this is a RTS strategy game,if you like Warcraft or Command & Conquer you maybe like this game players controller a priest to healing soldiers and choose which kind of soldiers the kingdom need , killing monters and murch for their nests

name: Battle Rift
summary: This is Battle Rift, a sci fi, first-person shooter. It's like Super Mario only harder and in 3D and of course with weapons. The main mode is the "Challenge Mode" where you fight your way through 20 hard levels.

name: Battlefield Cell
summary: During the pandemic, would you be curious about how our bodies react to the virus? Are you wondering: "What' is autoimmunity?" "All definitions and thesis of the immunology are too hard to understand!" Don't be afraid! After beating the game, you get all the necessary information and fun!

name: Babe or Grave
summary: Babe or be graved

name: Bad Chicken
summary: Bad Chicken is a retro styled sideway scrolling shoot-em-up inspired by the retro classics. It takes place in 8 locations in the Ferrus system, each one with different challenges, and dangers.

name: BackYard Hoops
summary: Basketball just as you remember it as a kid. Older brother slamming the ball into your face not included.

name: BackRooms New
summary: This game is "BackRoomsNew" in game, after each level the game will be harder and in each level there will be all kinds of monsters that will try to catch you. Each level will have a task where you have to find a key or a lever and all sorts of things to open the door.

name: Bargin to Win
summary: BarginToWin is trade bargain simulation game that you buy cheap and sell for profit!

name: Bartox
summary: In this musical adventure game, you'll follow Bart as he realizes his new violin is magical and transports him to a fantasy world, away from his monotonous life. Solve the puzzles and learn about the mysteries within. Oh, and a lush voice is narrating his every move..

name: Battle Forces
summary:
Fps games and multiplayer shooting games are your favorite genres? What can be better than the classical realistic one? The shooter that comes with a mix of your favorite multiplayer games features and new!
Meet new shooting game with a capital S - Battle Forces! Let's dive into the world of fps shooter!

name: Banker HD
summary: Banker is a popular time management genre game, it's simple and easy to pick up, you will be addicted to the excitement it brings in just a short period of time!

name: Backgammon
summary: Backgammon, a combination of luck and strategy, dates back to antiquity. This classic game will entertain you for hours!

name: BallisticNG: Maceno Island
summary:
Welcome to Maceno Island, a man made paradise home to high rise sea fronts, massive jungles, precarious mountain thrills and an AGL newcomer with a rich history in sea bed mineral mining and designer sandals.

Maceno Island introduces 6 new tracks, all playable in forward and reverse, a new campaign and a new set of colorful liveries.

name: Baccarat Corsair
summary: Baccarat Corsair is 3D game that allows you to experience the excitement of baccarat. To enjoy the interesting mini-games, stunning graphic and thrilling music, you can also invite your friends to play together. Do not miss the chance to have fun and try your luck!

name: Backrooms VHS
summary: If you’re not careful and noclip out of reality in the wrong areas, you’ll end up in the Backrooms, where it’s nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz.

name: Bash Sports Online Bowling
summary: BASH GAMING STUDIO PRESENTS: BASH SPORTS ONLINE BOWLING! PLAY HEAD TO HEAD WITH YOUR ONLINE FRIENDS, or practice at home! 8 player online game play, multiple characters to choose from and some secrets that will BLOW YOU AWAY! Do you have what it takes to join the SPARTA CLUB??? See you ONLINE!

name: Bardcard
summary:
Bardcard is a card-matching roguelite featuring a mysterious subterranean world to explore. Match cards to advance through the dungeon. Discover helpful equipment, battle dangerous minions, and meet magical familiars that join you on your adventure. Learn the secrets of this realm and discover the truth about the chaos that engulfs it.
Can you find your brother Lukas? Who is ZUG? How far down does this dungeon go?

name: Bard's Gold: Complete Edition
summary:
Bard's Gold is a challenging platformer that lets you explore strange worlds in a quest for a Goblin that stole your gold. Help Bard to overcome the dungeon's many dangerous perils and use your new-found treasures to improve your character and to buy new weapons and gear!

Bard’s Gold Complete Edition contains all the hidden Halloween levels in one physical exclusive PS Vita Edition.

name: Back to the Joseon
summary: Sword action game using physics collision

name: Barboozeled
summary: A simple walking simulation with a twist, make around the obstacles and out the door while not in full control of your own feet.

name: Batman
summary: This unnamed prototype of Batman, also known as "Real Shitty Batman!", was a game in production by Software Creations.

name: Badass Tennis
summary: An explosively stylized casual sports game that invites you to blast the ball back and forth against either an AI player or a friend across the table in a unique single-touchscreen multiplayer experience.

name: Bad Dudes

name: Battleship War: Time to Sink the Fleet
summary: Play the classic sea battle game. Position your ships and form a team to destroy your enemies in realistic offshore battles. Defeat ship after ship to sink the fleet.

name: Back 4 Blood: Children of the Worm
summary: Children of the Worm features a brand-new Campaign story – Act 5 that puts you into an epic showdown with a fierce new enemy threat. To help combat this unknown adversary, this expansion will introduce “Prophet” Dan, a gun-toting, self-proclaimed preacher of the end times, who joins our growing list of Cleaners in their effort to save humanity. Children of the Worm also includes exclusive character skins, exclusive weapon skins, along with new weapons, accessories, and cards.

name: Bandit Emblem
summary:
The duchy of Lansford is not in peaceful times. Its citizens are ravaged by bandit raids, the mighty Empire to the north marshals its armies for conquest, and a dark cult grows behind the scenes. Young Prince Adonis, son of the ruler Duke Athaulf, enters his first taste of adulthood as he sets out to return peace to his land.

You’re the bandits he kills in the Prologue.

Play through six chapters of unique level design, featuring inversions of common gimmicks, fourth-allegiance units, and loads of playable generics, as you discover what exactly happens after the player gets a Game Over.

name: Backwards Mario World
summary:
Backwards Mario World is an easier hack that parodies the storytelling/style in most rom hacks.

This hack features an interesting overworld design where you play through the events/levels as if they already occurred. Additionally start-select is enabled because Mario has technically beaten the game already. Good Luck!

name: Bad Night: First Incursion
summary: Play as a sexy female alien investigating the origin of the cataclysmic attacks on her home world. You will encounter a plethora of characters, both friend and foe, which can fall victim to your powers of seduction. If you like fast paced, retro style games with adult content, then get this game!

name: Bass Blasters

summary: Crowds of aliens attack from all sides, collect the necessary skills and survive.

Ballspell is a short zuma-like game where you play as a wizard, trying to take down your teachers. Shoot magic at a train of enemies, matching colors to defeat them.

However, be aware, some enemies have special abilities that will complicate things, such as shields that bounce off your magic, or imps that will speed up the train when woken up.

Luckily you learn new spells by defeating your teachers, giving you additional tools in taking them all down!

name: Basketball Crew 2k18: Dunk Stars Street Battle!
Batoni

And stop it, by any means necessary. In this dark eerie-puzzle adventure game you'll talk with citizens and try to solve the puzzle. Gather the right tools for the job and solve quirky puzzles.

summary: Better with friends, up to 3 players. You and your friends must work as a team to craft, load and shot at enemies before they shot back.

name: Barista Simulator
summary: Barista Simulator lets you experience making a wide variety of coffees just like espresso, latte, cappuccino or even your special mix of coffees. While managing your coffee shop, you play as a Barista and make the coffees your customers want. It's up to you to choose how to treat your shoppers.

name: Barbarian Kingdom
summary: Among the sands of the desert, a settlement is emerging that has a chance to become an empire. Be the ruler and decide on its shape, build a well-functioning kingdom with enormous strength and prestige, or become a ruthless Barbarian conquering unconquered lands. What strategy will you choose?

name: Bakudan Hero
summary: Bakudan Hero is a game where you push blocks to clear the way for the Cat-bus to pass. Can you find the best route using the fewest bombs?

name: Bangkok Story: A Stray Dog
summary: A top-down 2D story-driven adventure game inspired by real-life events. Traverse and experience the life of a formerly homeless man through an interview of how he regained his sense of self by telling his past to a stray dog. Set in Bangkok, Thailand 2017.

name: Battle of Decay: Survival
summary: Battle of Decay: Survival is a top-down casual survival game that throws you into a world during a virus outbreak. Fight your way through the missions with your friends and get out of hell alive. This game is set in the world of the in-development game 'Battle of Decay'.

name: Bartender Simulator
summary: Become the bartender and bar owner with Bartender Simulator! Start with a small and little-known bar, expand your business and attract new guests. Serve well-known drinks and create new unique ones, develop your bartending and flair skills. Make you and your bar the best and most famous in the city!

name: Battle Dawn 2: Terra Reborn
summary: Place your colony, find an alliance of like-minded players and triumph over thousands of other players to conquer the world through strategy, tactics, diplomacy and skill in the biggest social-interaction based MMO of all time. Upgrade your colony, collect items for your Avatar and become a legend!

name: Barbarian
summary: Low poly survival game, with a souls like combat system, where you can dodge, block, and parry attacks. Craft items, build homes, level up, and gear your character to get ready to defeat bosses.

name: Baldy Bounce
summary: Baldy Bounce is a 3D platforming adventure game with collectables, mini-games, character customisation, and much more.

name: Ball Game Remix
summary: ball game remix is a video game that you can play

name: Battle Sage
summary: BattleSage is a 3rd person single player Flight Action Adventure game. An adventure set in a vertical world filled with floating villages, towns and temples Along the way, you will meet friends and enemies and puzzles will challenge you to gain more mastery of your flying skills.

name: Bangungot
summary:
Bangungot is a short adventure horror game following the main character, Jake. One night, Jake was riding a train home when it suddenly crashed. Now, he wakes up trapped in a mysterious island with no idea where to go.

What will he discover in this place?

What will happen to him now?

name: Battle Arena Toshinden
summary: A VRT-X model Tiger handheld based on Battle Arena Toshinden.

name: Baneball
summary:
Life goes on after the zombie apocalypse for even the undead need some fun. The favorite game of this new world is the spectacular Baneball - and now it is your chance to be one of the celebrated Sport Managers!

Do you have what it takes to set up a hard-hitting team and lead them to victory in various stadiums all around the globe?

Will you be wise enough to lead and equip your players, manage the resources and train the zombies properly?

Are you so steady that you can reach the world's top by outplaying thousands of opponents in this fast multiplayer action-strategy?

Is it so? Then the glory of Baneball is waiting for you!

name: Battleship
summary: Based on the popular board game.

name: Babes & Balls Vol. 1: X-Treme Beach Volleyball
summary: The first in a series of adult sports games by Redfire Software.

name: Babes & Balls Vol. 2: X-Treme Beach Soccer
summary: The second in a series of adult sports games by Redfire Software.

name: Babes & Balls Vol. 3: Gotcha Babes X-Treme
summary: The third and final in a series of adult sports games by Redfire Software.

name: Back to School: My Worst Day
summary: Personal survival story loosely based on real events set in western Ukraine.

name: Battle Baseball
summary: Battle Baseball is a Japan-only baseball video game developed by Vic Tokai and published by Banpresto for the Famicom on February 19, 1993. A part of the collaborative "Compati Sports Series" (コンパチスポーツシリーズ Konpachi Supōtsu Shirīzu) in the Compati Hero series, it crosses over characters from several popular Japanese franchises, including Godzilla, Ultraman, Kamen Rider and Gundam.

name: Battle Dodge Ball II
summary: Battle Dodge Ball II is a crossover video game in the Compati Hero series and a sequel to Battle Dodge Ball.

name: Battle Formation
summary: Battle Formation was a strategy game for the PlayStation that used villains from the Ultraman, Gundam, and Kamen Rider franchises as playable characters. The player would use mobile suits, kaijin, and Kaiju from various entries of each franchise to conquer an island until they encountered the final boss simply known as Keeper.

name: Bara no Ki ni Bara no Hanasaku Fandisk
summary: Short Story Collection delivering 20 extra episodes featuring heroes of original game.

name: Bad Piggies 2
summary: Unleash your creativity and get ready to build the ultimate driving/flying/crashing machine! Cross the finish line in vehicular challenges full of arcade action and high speed hijinks with yours truly - the Bad Piggies!

name: Bay Bell
summary: A science fiction point and click word puzzle game. Navigate an off-course spaceship, and find a way toward returning home. The end is near… Can you save the Bay Bell?

name: Bandit Realms
summary: A medieval turn-based strategy card game with a procedurally generated world map to explore and conquer.

name: Bandai Namco Flashback Blast!
summary: Features NES/Famicom versions of Pac-Man, Dig Dug, Galaga, Galaxian, Mappy, Sky Kid, and Xevious. Pac-Mania is included in Wal-Mart while The Tower of Druaga is included in other stores.

name: Bandai Namco Arcade Blast!
summary: Features Pac-Man, Pac-Mania, Dig Dug, Galaga, Galaxian, New-Rally-X. Mappy, Sky Kid, The Tower of Druaga, and Xevious.

name: Basho's Frogger
summary: A short game based on one of the most famous haiku by Matsuo Basho.

name: Barold
summary: A hard 2D fantasy platformer with unique boss fights and bullet hells.

name: Backrooms: Escape Together
summary: A visually lifelike 1-6 player co-op survival horror made in Unreal Engine 5. Explore procedurally generated levels that host liminal environments, puzzles, and entities with new levels and content added regularly. You are at the mercy of what's lurking and must do whatever it takes to escape.

name: Backrooms Hide and Seek
summary: Team up with your friends online with this MMO, Massively Multiplayer version of Backrooms. You heard me right. This is Backrooms Hide and Seek Hide, be sneaky and beat the other players online. This game features up to 100 online players around the world. Play as Monsters or Humans

name: Back to Home
summary: Help the hero to return home in Back to Home! An epic adventure that fuses the Metroidvanias and the Souls Like and makes you travel fantastic places like forgotten caves, high snowy mountains and dark forests created in a “Dirty-Pixel Art” 2D style.

name: Barbershop Simulator
summary: Become the best barber in town! Brush, shave, color, and wash customers' hair based on their requests. Keep your shop and tools clean and your customers happy by serving coffee while they wait. Get cash for your cuts and use this to upgrade and customize your very own barbershop today!

name: Bargain Platfomer
summary: You will have to run, jump and dodge traps in this old-school platformer game. The ideal game to play in your lunch break.

name: Battle Thunder Front
summary: Battle Thunder Front is a unique casual turn-based war game. The background of the game takes the Vietnam War as the theme, and players can fight in the form of small teams or large forces. The game also supports personalized configuration of battle mode for playing

name: Bass Angler Championship
summary: Bass Angler Championship is a plug-n-play fishing game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005.

name: Battle Thunder Front: The Lost Red Sea
summary: The background of the game is based on the fictional Red Sea War, and players can fight in the form of small teams or large units. The game also supports custom play mode configurations for combat.

name: Battleship
summary:
Battleship is a 1993 video game based on the board game of the same name.

The object is to sink the opponent's entire fleet without them sinking the player's fleet first. In this updated version, both the player and the computer get extra firepower from military aircraft and support weapons. There are even scenarios that start a player off in a pre-played game that he must resume (and overcome a bleak scenario).

name: Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!!
summary: The authorized mobile game "Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!!" , will take you back to your childhood, and have a classic mini 4WD race! Come on Let's & Go!

name: Bad Piggies HD
summary: An HD version of Bad Piggies, released on September 27, 2012, which was the same day that the regular version came out on iPhone and Android. It can be played on iPad and for the 2nd time also on Android but mainly for tablets. It became the only HD version to be on iPhone in 2020.

name: Backgammon: Board Game Puzzle
summary: Welcome to backgammon - the popular board game all over the world! The goal of the game is to bring all your pieces into the house and remove them from the board before the second player does.

name: Basketball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
summary:
A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Arcade" series!

This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!
Purchase and play our new Christian themed video games releasing every Sunday morning in the PlayStation Store today!

name: Battle Grounds
summary:
Set during the American revolutionary war, the Battle Grounds is a Half-Life Modification where you and your teammates will need to fight together strategically in order to overcome the enemy forces.

In The Battle Grounds you can play as a soldier in one of two opposing armies: 'The British Army' and 'The Colonial Continental Army'

name: Bananas in Pajamas: It's Fun Time
summary: Children join B1 and B2 on a wonderful adventure through the fun-filled world of Cuddles Avenue. With spectacular 3-D graphics, songs, and the Bananas humour, children will have fun as they develop important learning skills such as critical thinking, pattern recognition, and environmental awareness.

name: Battle of Elemental Burst
summary: "Battle of Elemental BURST" is a 3D spatial fighting action game coming to Nintendo Switch where you can enjoy tense, high-speed one-on-one battles!

name: Banana Quest
summary: An RPG Maker Game. You want a banana. so what are you waiting for? go get it!

name: Barji Kart
summary: Race head-to-head against up to 9 friends in BarjiKart! Choose from different Items to aid you in finishing 1st place! Race in an arcade-style old school karting game where only one player may remain victorious!

name: Battle Axe: Special Edition
summary: Battle Axe is an arcade top-down hack & slash featuring high-quality visuals created by veteran pixel artist Henk Nieborg, true to form game mechanics, and music from the legendary VGM composer Manami Matsumae – retro gamers rejoice!

name: Battle Billiards
summary: Battle Billiards is a billiards game where no one takes turns and everyone goes at the same time.

name: BadSmith
summary: We play as a young blacksmith who looks after the forge of his father, who disappeared no one knows where.

name: Band Space
summary: Band Space is a co-op VR rhythm game for one to four players.Standing on various stages with lighting show, playing drum set, keyboard, bass or guitar, your band will become rock star!

name: Battle Gear
summary: A zombie virus that began with a meteorite, the surviving humans fled to the sea by boat. To get the world back, And for the victory of the human race, Solve the problems, As a troubleshooter for the UN, that's your mission.

name: Barrel Full of Monkeys
summary: Run from monkeys, hold onto ammo, and search for an exit! Can you escape the maze?

name: Battle X Death
summary: The game uses elements such as sandbox and tower defense. Players need to upgrade their bases and cultivate partners to resist the invasion of zombies. You can also team up with your friends to explore new maps, search for materials, and continue in this waste earth world.

name: Bacchikoi!
summary: The young transfer student, Toshu Kanada, gets himself recruited in a nearly-falling apart baseball club. His once small world opens up as he gets to know his teammates Ichiru and Masaru. Lead Toshu with his choices and take teamwork and friendship to a whole new level!

name: Bacchikoi!: Expansion Pack
summary:
