Genji Tadano, a quirky yet responsible coach from Yakyusha Baseball club wanted nothing but the best for his team. Helping them grow in confidence and skill to make his team excel with their own abilities.

With his teammates Ichiru, Masaru and Toshu by his side he has a unique way of showing his affection towards them and helping them in their everyday dilemmas.

A Sequel for the first Bacchikoi story featuring different alternate stories from the original storyline.

name: Barren Depths
summary: Escape a confusing cave system without being eaten in this short, underwater horror game.

name: Barbaric Fury
summary: Barbaric Fury is a third person action adventure set in an ancient and mythical world. Join the Barbarian on her journey to the peak of a sacred and holy mountain as she seeks to stop the desecration wrought on by the demon who awaits.

name: Battleheart Legacy+
summary: In Battleheart Legacy, you will explore a rich and detailed fantasy world, customize your unique hero with dozens of powerful skills and items, do battle with hordes of enemies, encounter quirky characters and discover the stories of a troubled realm. Will you become a powerful wizard, or a notorious rogue? A noble knight, or a savage barbarian? How will you forge your legacy?

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Elite Fishing Equipment Pack
summary: Fish like an Elite Angler with the new Elite Fishing Equipment Pack! Represent your roots as you hit the water with nation-based boat wraps & clothing. Conquer Mastery Challenges for items such as the unique Taku Time items and fine tune that fishing loadout with kit from Abu Garcia and Berkley.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Predator Equipment Pack
summary: Become the ultimate predator and dominate the competition! The Predator Pack will set you up nicely to hunt and fight those lunkers into your boat so you can take your spot on the stage with the biggest bag of bass.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Synthwave Pack
summary: Light up the lake with the radiating Synthwave Cosmetic Pack. With the Synthwave boat wrap, clothing, and glasses, you will glow neon bringing your bass fishing to an electrifying new level. Night-time’s not for sleeping anymore, find those midnight lunkers and let the neon spill across the water.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Throwback B.A.S.S. Pack
summary: Flashback to old school bass fishing with the Throwback B.A.S.S. Pack. Celebrate the early days of Bassmaster and kit your angler & boat out with vintage Bassmaster colours, designs, and clothing that include original badge patches.

name: Battle Arena Toshinden
summary: Battle Arena Toshinden was ported to the Game Boy by Takara in 1996, titled Nettou Toshinden in Japan. The game is based mostly on the original PlayStation version, but it includes a slightly altered story mode and an early appearance of the character Uranus and the Battle Arena Toshinden 2 version of Gaia (without his armor).

name: Battle Arena Toshinden 2 Plus
summary: Battle Arena Toshinden 2 Plus is a version of Toshinden 2 released only in Japan for the PlayStation on The Best range (equivalent to the Greatest Hits and Platinum ranges in North America and Europe). It features enhanced graphics, improved control and tweaked CPU AI. It also makes some balancing tweaks to the characters' attacks. An option to save results, option settings and unlocked characters to a memory card was also added.

name: Battle for the Galaxy: Ice Bastion Pack
summary: This DLC includes additional content which will become available in-game after purchase and make your space outpost a lot stronger!

name: Battle of Empires : 1914-1918 - Victory Pack
summary: This free DLC includes the "Battle for Berlin" multiplayer mission.

name: Battlerite Royale: Legendary Adventure Pack
summary: There’s an entire world to see - you need the right gear for the journey! The Legendary Adventure Pack contains everything you need for your travels - six Legendary Outfits, three Royale Chests, and the exclusive Baby Storm Wyvern Mount to fly around the Battlerite world upon.

name: Battlerite Royale: Legendary Adventure Pack Vol.2
summary: The Legendary Adventure Pack Volume 2 contains another pack of gear you'll want to take to Talon Island, with a new Mount to carry you into the fight!

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Modern Ships Pack
summary: From the behemoth Mercury class battlestar, to the iconic Modern Basestar, this ship pack contains six ships of the modern era of Battlestar Galactica.

name: Baby Shapes for Kids
summary: Fun and intuitive matching game for your baby or toddler! It helps to learn shapes and colors in game. Learning shapes is easy and entertaining and your child will love it too!

name: Baseball Brat Badventure
summary: Puzzle Platforming for Playdate

name: Balldventure
summary: The story of Mr. Ball going on a trip, With simple operation, Dodge the small and round Mr. Ball from all kinds of obstacles and structures and climb to the top. A difficult journey is expected, but do not give up and join Mr. Ball's journey.

name: Battle Drones: Red Rock Resistance
summary: Battle Drones: Red Rock Resistance is a 3D top-down drone shooter game set in a reimagined version of Red Rock, New Mexico. Upgrade your drone, improve your loadout and defend yourself against the ominous intentions of the A-EYE. How long will you survive?

name: BattleCrypt Bombers
summary: BattleCrypt Bombers is a pixel-packed arena combat game for up to four local players. Collect and lob bombs but be careful - explosions set off chain reactions that are deadly to everyone! Play competitively or cooperatively across two different game modes.

name: Ball laB 2
summary: Roll and jump through challenging but interesting levels in a minimalistic style!

name: Bad Santa
summary: Bad Santa is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about the girl Florance, who broke up with her boyfriend. She hasn't had sex in a very long time. And for Christmas she asked Santa to come and fuck her! Her wish came true!

name: Backrooms: Surreality
summary: Noclip into the backrooms and never get out =) Explore several infinite levels of the backrooms and survive in an environment inherently hostile to any human. God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you.

name: Battle Heroin Crisis: Heroin Pack - Satellizer Another & Cassie
summary: A beautiful heroine [Pandora] who fights an unknown enemy that threatens mankind.BHC's additional Pandora character DLC appears! Join in the unique encounters and battles.Experience two new and exciting episodes!

name: Battle of Britain, Norway and Atlantic
summary: A real-time WW2 naval and air warfare simulation game on tactical/strategic level that features 18 scenarios covering Battle of Britain, Norwegian campaign and Battle of the Atlantic .

name: Battle of the Lost Continent
summary: What's the secret behind my ring?

name: Bavovna included!
summary: Bavovna included! - a satirical, casual indie game in the Shoot 'em up genre with pixel graphics about Russian troops in Ukraine.

name: Battle Robots
summary: Do you like fast games with the grinding of metal? Try to take part in fights with robots. Your task is to come out of the battle victorious, deftly inflicting crushing blows on your opponent. Upgrade your armor, and then head to the arena to fight. Start playing now!

name: BattleLore: Command: Locust - Expansion Pack
summary: Unleash the power of the Doombringer and Grotesque, or defend Terrinoth with the help of Greyhaven Battlemages and Ironbounds! The Locust expansion offers 4 new units, 5 new multiplayer battlefields and 3 all-new Uthuk missions!

name: Bad 2 Bad: Extinction
summary: Bad 2 Bad: Extinction is a simple & fun action mobile game

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Classic Edition
summary: Play the 2022 Bassmaster Classic today! Get ready to experience the thrill of competitive big bass fishing and the official Lake Hartwell 2022 Bassmaster Classic in Bassmaster Fishing 2022 Classic Edition.

name: Bazooka Boy
summary:
Blast through levels and destroy everything before you with a bunch of amazing weapons! Collect all and master their different and unique qualities! Send your enemies flying, explode their bases and crush their buildings! Satisfying destruction and unlimited possibilities to shoot your way to victory! Fun ragdoll enemies and crazy explosions with levels upon levels of awesome content and challenges, go and wipe out all the enemies to win!

Flashy exploding effects and awesome physics make each level a unique action puzzle.

Can you solve them all without crushing yourself with a bad shot?

name: Bail or Jail: Character DLC Bundle
summary: Maisy, with her bright red hood, and hunter extraordinaire, Hunt, have arrived!

name: Back 4 Blood: River of Blood
summary: River of Blood will feature a new story campaign with an enthralling five map mission that has players traveling upriver, stopping at different points along the way to collect supplies and take on new enemy threats. There will a new Cleaner that joins the roster with this new expansion. She is called Tala, a former cultist outcast, who has now turned Cleaner and is accompanied by a Ridden companion called Jeff, a friendly Tallboy that can be summoned to assist the team. Tala can summon Jeff with a whistle or other Cleaners on her team. Rivers of Blood will feature eight exclusive character skins and 12 exclusive weapon skins. It also has new weapons, accessories, and cards.

name: Balls of Fame Holiday Bundle
summary: The Balls of Fame Holiday Bundle features 5 games developed by FarSight Studios!

name: Bacchanalia
summary: As an extra actress, you are chosen by Mysterious Theatre, which will change your life. This is not only a huge gift from Gods, but also a great challenge to human nature. Will the rising star be devoured by temptation, or stand with the Mr.Right to fight against the Gods?

name: Bad animals: Rabbit
summary: Adventure Platformer Mix Supraland Blend, Bear Simulator, Grounded Explore, find secret improvements, solve puzzles, fight monsters, find new abilities that will help you reach new secret places. Travel time: 3-10 hours

name: Bandits
summary: Bandits is a low poly open world survival game where your only objective is to survive. Build your base, craft your weapons... and if you're lucky, you might live to see another day.

name: Basement of Hellish
summary: Basement of Hellish is a survival horror game with zombies in 1st person. Survive and struggle to find a way out in this horror game with tense and dark atmosphere.

name: Bat Enchanter Witch
summary: Take control of the witch Evelyn and escape the evil queen's castle by running, jumping and using magic to turn the bats into helpful allies.

name: Barbie Epic Road Trip
summary: In this interactive adventure, Barbie goes on a cross-country trek with friends and makes big decisions about the future. Which dream will she choose?

name: Battle Night
summary:
The most unique cyber fantasy mobile game, a completely new hardcore gameplay, which will immerse you in a modern 21st century underworld

It is the year 2098, the end of the century is near, the great alliances of the world are in a great cold war with each other, while neon lights flash around the borders city under the thick fog, but the people of the city are still unaware of the situation. This city is one that lives outside the law, and is far from all countries, and has gradually become a battleground for all camps. Conflict between advanced technology and the decadent civilizations has become irreversible, and Cyberpunk has finally opened his curtains after long nights.

It was around this time on one of the street corners in a little humble detective agency, a sharp and keen detective sensed a change in the air, he quickly needed to round up a team to go and search out the hidden scheme that was in the making...

name: Bakuchou Retrieve Master
summary: A fishing RPG where you play as a boy on his summer vacation and hunt for the legendary black bass.

name: Bayonetta Origins: Cereza and the Lost Demon
summary: Long before this trainee of the dark arts would come to be called Bayonetta, she took a fateful journey into the forbidden Avalon Forest. Alongside her was Cheshire, her very first demon, possessing Cereza’s stuffed toy. Play as both Cereza and Cheshire and search through the treacherous forest to look for the power to save Cereza’s mother.

name: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden
summary: Hunt ghosts as two memorable characters in a story-driven Action-RPG where your decisions carry dramatic consequences. Torn between honoring your oath to the living and saving your departed partner, how far will you go for love?

name: Barbie for Girls Volleyball
summary: Barbie and Skipper team up for a fun game of two-player Beach Volleyball against Midge and Teresa. Control Skipper and Barbie and decide if you want to pass, set or spike the ball. First team to 15 points wins the game!

name: Barbie: Malibu Mysteries
summary: Search for clues, find objects scattered around Malibu and sort words into word families. Help Barbie spice up her style by using word recognition to choose fabulous accessories that match her outfit. Create a custom spelling list—just for your child! Then spell words to power the glitter-rific silk screen machine.

name: Battle City
summary: Game Boy port of Battle City.

name: Bad Girls Tough Love
summary:
As a teacher-in-training, you've landed an internship teaching a senior high school class. Sounds easy, right? It turns out you've been assigned the roughest class in the school—the students are rowdy, no-good misfits who would much rather hit each other than the books. When the principal reveals that the school would much rather see the class fail, you realize that you can't just sit idly by!

The three toughest students are also the ones who gravitate towards you first; the gang leader, the sleepyhead, and the pampered princess. How will you get the three girls to focus on their schoolwork when they all seem more focused on you?

name: Balloon Monster
summary: Balloon Monster is a clone of the arcade game Pang for the Famicom. It was made and released by NTDEC in 1991.

name: Battle of the Youstrass
summary:
Battle of the Youstrass is a shareware Japanese-style tactical role-playing game.

The game takes place on the world of Youstrass where two countries share a single continent and where technology and magic co-exist. One of the countries, Kradion, is largely frozen. Its people are famous for their mercenary soldiers and mechanical fighters. The other country, Welfrad, is prosperous and fertile. Kradion depends on imported food. When the great famine struck there was no food available and times were hard, so Kradion attacked Welfrad, all but destroying Welfrad's royal knight units. Just a few ace units survived because they were not in the capital when the attack came.

Among these is Ryuke, aka Blue Wing, chief knight of the royal army, who pilots the elemental fighter Huben Drake. The game starts with Ryuke separated from surviving units. He must survive and join his comrades to wage guerrilla war on the enemy.

The game consists of large-scale tactical battles, which are played on an isometrically viewed map, only part of which can be seen at once. There is a mini map in the lower left of the screen which shows the whole game area and the location of any other units, both friends and foe. During actual battles between units the game switches to a different view which displays the combat. As combat progresses the character collects experience points, special items, and additional special abilities.

name: Batty Zabella
summary: A horror point-and-click game made with 30% nostalgia, and 70% sass.

name: Baby Shark Run Away
summary:
A mysterious and beautiful adventure with William and his friends.
Be the main character of a thrilling story with friends from all over the world.

name: Babbdi
summary: Find your way out of Babbdi. A short, first person exploration experience.

name: Balls of Steel Community Project
summary: Map design philosophies in the main maps include: kind to blind players, balance for players who don't find secrets, balance between routes, mappers are competent at beating their own maps. Lots and lots of playtesting...

name: Batman Begins
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Batman Begins.

name: Ball-e
summary:
Ball-e is a singleplayer platformer with roguelike elements.
The player has to beat challenges and bosses to reach the top and become the ultimate Ninja Ball Warrior.

Many characters can be unlocked and various abilities and upgrades can be found during a run.

Additionally the player can compete in smaller challenges and become the fastest on the leaderboard.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts & Bolts - L.O.G.'s Lost Challenges
summary: Enjoying Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts & Bolts? With L.O.G.’s Lost Challenges you can tackle a whole world’s worth of new Jiggy Games and a grab bag of bonus multiplayer scenarios. Ever wondered how the Test-O-Track would look as a fully fledged Game World stuffed full of characters and challenges? Here’s your chance to live that crazy dream! Test drive new vehicles, win new Jiggies and unlock even more content (two words: Klungo’s Arcade). Wide-ranging new multiplayer game types are also included for the benefit of players who would rather trash-talk real people than moles or aardvarks.

name: Baba Files Taxes
summary: Baba needs help filing taxes, and the deadline is tonight! Help Baba in order to make it in time.

name: Banana Bugs
summary: Banana-eating bugs are ravaging the village food supply and you're the only monkey brave enough to take them on! Shoot ropes to wall off bugs and stop them in their tracks. Earn bananas to build up Monkeytown, play mini-games, and get valuable power-ups, like Coco Bombs and Hurricanes, to help fend off the hungry hordes.

name: Banners of Ruin: Moonstone
summary: A unique new hero to start your campaigns with! Comes equipped with a tailored set of talents and equipment, and offers many new exciting scenarios and opponents.

name: Backdate Hero
summary: Backdate Hero is an action Rogue lite game that integrates many elements. The game builds a completely elevated world with multiple civilizations as the core. The main character played by the player will become an important key in the world to save the world destroyed by meteorites.

name: BallZ
summary: Roll our balls into a hole. and do it again. Easy, Fun, And highly addictive! Come on Come play with our BallZ

name: Bargain Toader
summary: Drive the toads to their goals.

name: Back to Brother
summary: Explore magical worlds in search of lost tools that will help you find your brother

name: Bazzle
summary: Bazzle combines sliding puzzles with Rubik's cubes and offers you puzzles of different difficulties, with a variety of challenges and tasks that are fun and will keep your brain busy. Develop strategies to solve the puzzles efficiently.

name: Ballotron Oceans
summary:
Welcome to the next part of Ballotron!
You also shoot balls but everything happens underwater.
Make the Blue Ball hit the Green Ball to achieve the goal.
This time the level solutions will be even more fun!

name: Ball
summary: A Mario themed port of the original Ball, released exclusively in Game & Watch: Super Mario Bros.

name: Bad Pixels
summary:
Have you ever wondered what a FPS game would look like in 8-bit? It's gotta look bad, right?

Introducing Bad Pixels. A first person shooter set in the old west, using computer graphics from about the same era!

name: Backrooms: The Game
summary: Backrooms is a creepypasta that contains randomly generated office rooms that seem endless. The walls are mono yellow in color. It is also an eternal paradox.

name: Banana Grab
summary: An Adobe Flash version of the minigame was playable on the official DK: Jungle Climber website as well as the Nintendo Arcade section on nintendo.com, where it was listed among other promotional games. The browser version is largely the same as the original minigame, although it does not have a goal score to surpass.

name: Banana Bonanza!
summary: An Adobe Flash version of a minigame from DK: Jungle Climber was playable on the official DK: Jungle Climber website. The browser version was largely the same as the original minigame, although it did not have a visible time limit.

name: Barrel-Blastapalooza
summary:
Barrel-Blastapalooza was an online Flash advergame hosted on the now defunct Donkey Kong Country official website, as well as in the Nintendo Arcade section of nintendo.com. It promoted the Game Boy Advance release of Donkey Kong Country 3.

Much like the game it advertises, Barrel-Blastapalooza stars Dixie Kong and Kiddy Kong.

name: Bargain Invaders
summary: Fight your way through space and avoid beeing blown to bits.

name: Ball
summary:
Remake of Game & Watch Ball released as unlockable in Game & Watch Gallery 2.

The player must control a Yoshi, Mario, Wario, or King Koopa as they juggle various objects. In Classic Mode, the player needs to juggle balls as long as they can.

name: Baker Street Breakouts: A Sherlockian Escape Adventure
summary: "Baker Street Breakouts" combines the thrill of an Escape Room with the storytelling of an Adventure. Use your superior deduction skills in this story-driven mystery to help Sherlock deducing his way through an old film studio to finally face his arch nemesis Moriarty. Become a Master of Deduction!

name: Basketball Games!
summary:
Dunk the ball through the hoop and aim for the perfect swish! Jump and rebounce from wall to wall up into the infinite sky.
Are you ready for this new challenge against time?

name: Band Land
summary:
How many bands can you name?
Find it out in the most comprehensive music bands trivia game in the app store!
Write the name of the pictured band to clear a level. Do it as fast as you can and earn high scores and earn Band land coins!
Stuck in a band you can't name? Use the coins to get valuable hints or ask your friends to aid you via Twitter or Facebook.
Levels are unlocked progressively, but don't forget to clear them completely in order to get all the achievements and the highest ranking in the GameCenter leaderboard!
Featuring more than 200 bands to guess divided in 10 levels of ascending difficulty: from the most popular classic to the most obscure title only true audiophiles will be able to identify!

name: Banzai Dice
summary:
BanzaiDice is a fun little puzzle game that is easy to pick up but hard to master. Beginners will find the controls very intuitive and the game easily accessible but advanced players will still have their strategic planning abilities challenged!
To get started, simply slide the dice up from the row below so that they form "strings" - sequences of dice of consecutive values or sequences of the same die face. The more strings you can get in one move the higher your score will be! Simple, yet dangerously addictive!

name: Baby Blocks: Swipe & Tap Letters, Spell Words Fast
summary: Experience the child like delight of 4 letter word matching and play Baby Blocks today! Tap or swipe letters, form words and advance through 100 exciting levels and 3 challenging skill levels. Learn new words every day with the word of the day feature. Create huge scores with multipliers like speed and color bonus. Use powerful boosters like freeze time to aide you in your word matching endeavors. It’s time to swap those blocks. Baby Blocks, it’s wordilicious!

name: Ball
summary: A port of Ball released in Game Boy Gallery.

name: Bardy's Maze: The World's First Zard-PG
summary: This delightful new Bardsperience follows Bardy on his quest to be the best, as he beatboxes his way across to cornfield in an attempt to sway his father on the value of percussive mouth movements!

name: Bazooka Bois
summary:
A web3 2d shooter about having a blast blasting your friends with bazookas of all kinds.
No problem is too big for bazookas, if you are missing spice in your love life, add eggplant bazookas to it, if you are missing your marriage anniversary add bouquet bazookas to it, if you're missing gangsta rap, ain't nothing to it add bars bazookas to it.

name: Battle of Heroes: Land of Immortals
summary:
LEAD YOUR HEROES TO VICTORY! Discover a new fantasy world in the pursuit to conquer the Golden Plains of Évagar.
Train lethal units, control powerful Heroes and cast devastating spells in epic multiplayer battles in order to rule all the territories and to reach the top of the league!

name: Back Rank Chess
summary: Do you like the Endgame in chess? Here's a brand new chess variant! Defend the back rank against the onslaught of enemy pawns. Easy to learn , advanced artificial intelligence , 76 hand-crafted stages.

name: Base Under Attack!
summary: Can you save your base and protect your planet from hordes of alien ships, commander? Arm your base with advanced arsenal of turrets and unique upgrades in this highly addictive action packed defense game.

name: Badaboom
summary:
Badaboom is a rhythm game that brings the player to a pre-historic world of Dinos and Cavemen, where you must play the drums in the right time to command Obo (our hero) to fight and conquer his food, his weapons and, above all, his right to live in peace.
The game has 2D platform style, with simple controls that allows to command Obo through the combination of drum's sounds. Combining 4 sounds like "Ba Boom Da Bing" Obo starts to get aggressive and attacks it's enemies with a spear.
With upgradable weapons and calling the help of Natural Elements, Obo can use many strategies to beat a level and to do it in the less time possible, going on to other scenarios and facing bigger challenges.

name: Battle Tap Tap
summary:
This is a tapping battlefield. You get 1 minute to tap as many times as possible
It is simple but challenging. Can you be the final winner?

name: Bat of Dead
summary: You are waiting for adventure and emotion. 2 for the price of one.

name: BattleSquared
summary:
BattleSquared is a fun turn-based pass and play game that relies heavily on both strategy and luck. Your objective is to eliminate the entirety of your opponents forces by finding items throughout the map and utilizing them against your opponent while simultaneously avoiding environmental roadblocks.
Dodge strafing runs, mortar shells, and enemy gunfire all while trying to hunt down weapons and armor to defeat your opponent!

name: Backrooms: Apprehension
summary: A terrifying and immersive multiplayer horror experience with social deduction elements. Survive as a scientist stuck in the Backrooms, just be very careful who you trust, someone is not what they seem!

name: Bad Cat Sam
summary: The cat, named serious Sam, is very upset when the house is in order and everything is in its place. Help Sam get inner peace.

name: Bantumi
summary: Kalah for the Nokia 3310

name: Bazooka Cat: First Episode
summary: Bazooka Cat is a lovingly crafted platform game inspired by the old school games of the 90s with new technologies.The game takes place in a sci-fi fictional world somewhere on the edge of the universe. The story tells about the difficult fate of the cat Lucky and the robotic assistant M.U.R

name: Battle of Vukovar: Rain of Steel
summary: Join the historic battle for Vukovar at the end of the 20th century through multiplayer combat. Play in teams choosing one of the five modes or outside the team in a free for all mode. Accomplish your goals using real weapons from the war while moving through an accurate simulation of the city map

name: Backroom Warfare II
summary: Fight for survival in the Backrooms. Play with friends in multiplayer or solo against AI bots. Unearth the terrifying monster scorestreak and get ready for an intense experience!

name: Balance Helicopter
summary: Balance the helicopter with its two engines! Navigate through increasingly harder levels and different challenges!

name: Battle Golf
summary: Fast‑paced, arcade‑style golf challenge where players aim to sink balls into a variety of hole positions — including floating platforms and the heads of their opponents — using a single‑button control scheme. Features both solo time‑attack mode and competitive two‑player mode on the same device

name: Banjo-Kazooie: The Hidden Lair
summary: Banjo-Kazooie: The Hidden Lair is a passion project by Daveyx0 and Oldum77. It shows a possible continuation of the series, with possible events after Banjo-Tooie. It features a new area of the original Grunty's Lair that acts as the main hub, called the Hidden Lair.

name: Batman & Robin
summary: Batman & Robin is an unreleased game for the Sega Saturn. It was a port of the PlayStation game of the same name, however was cancelled before release, presumably due to negative reception.

name: Banana Attack VR
summary: Shoot zombie limbs off and watch their ragdoll bodies fall then cook their delicious remains over the fire and feed it to your cute little fox!

name: Baff 4
summary: Minimalist, hardcore and challenging game in the genre of avoid-em up that will test your reflexes, timing and planning! This game is hard as hell!

name: Battle of 2048: Fantasy Edition
summary: Join Prince Olwyn on a quest to save his kingdom. Fierce warrior, stealthy rogue, powerful mage and skilled cleric will join your party as you fight enemies and strive for victory in this new take on the classic 2048. Can you and your team emerge triumphant and restore peace to the realm?

name: Ballads and Romances
summary: Investigate the origins of the literary debut of Adam Mickiewicz, a XIX century-famous Polish poet. In an immersive visual novel, discover the secret of his love, friendship, and artistic inspirations!

name: Bandit
summary: Bandit is an RPG-survival with an open world and elements of tower defense, where you can build own base, gang and vehicle.

name: Baseball Clash
summary: Baseball Clash is a multiplayer baseball game.

name: BattleReign
summary: “This is a Free to play Third Person Shooter Game Set for Henna to challenge and Liberate Nexirus. It is designed to create a challenge between role playing weapons and Sci-fi weapons. Dive into Henna's world and set yourself on a deliverance quest.”

name: Basements n' Basilisks: Storms of Sorcery
summary: A visual novel paying satirical homage to the world’s greatest TTRPG. Make important choices, roll countless dice, build lasting relationships, explore magical lands and experience all the rest of the crap you expect from a fantasy game without the hassle of finding actual friends to play with!

name: Battle Grid
summary: Face relentless alien hordes, collect their resources and assemble an unstoppable squadron of mechs! In this Action Roguelite, discover game-breaking synergies, mix and match weapons and units, unlock upgrades, harvest and conquer an alien planet.

name: Battle Titan Rainbow
summary: Crush the enemy with "Rainbow" Battletitan!!

name: Backrooms Mainframe
summary: Backrooms Mainframe is a 1-6 player co-op horror game. Explore the labyrinthes while avoiding entities and other dangers while finding your way through.

name: Barrel of Monkeys
summary: Players can now enjoy a barrel of laughs and fun with this new video ticket redemption game, Barrel Of Monkeys.

name: Bank Robber
summary:
Harry, a bank robber aims to rob a government bank, so he choose the day that the bank is open to visitors, and takes the opportunity to carry out the robbery. Upon arriving at the bank, learns some routines, of how things work and then begins to put his plan into practice.

The game takes place on a bank, in the center of the city, where you can explore various areas of the bank, as long as you have the appropriate access card, thus having different levels of security. In addition to that, you must complete some objectives to complete your mission. You will only have a rifle and a pistol as work tool, and you should assemble a strategy to position it properly, as the bank has metal detectors. You will have to face an area full of security, with strategy.

You will control Harry, in first person and you will have to do some tasks to successfully complete the robbery, disguising yourself as a bank clerk and arriving at the vault at the right time, all this with a lot of action, since the bank will be full of security guards, making it possible for you to complete your objective stealthily, without drawing too much attention. Enter the bank, loot the safe and try to get out alive.
The game experience provides a mix of strategy with a little suspense and action.

name: Backstage Pass
summary:
Want our girlboss star presenter, Priestess Synergy-12, to break into your mind and mold it as she sees fit? We have great news for you: in Backstage Pass, you can experience exactly that!

Get tranced out, loaded into a hypno pod, and have your mind molded to become the perfect secretary in this new interactive erotic hypnosis experience from Nyx Gaming!

name: Battle Pinball
summary:
Battle Pinball is a 2-player versus game, played on a single device. Play with your friends, against AI or set two AIs against each other. Simple fast-paced fun.
Game is best played locally with a tablet sized device.

name: Balls Away!
summary: Balls Away! is a game with phenomenally realistic ball physics. Simply tilt your iPhone or iTouch and get the balls to the goal as quickly as possible.

name: Baseballoons
summary:
Swing for colorful balloons and avoid the bombs in this home run contest!
Earn coins to unlock the full cast of wacky characters!
Score as high as you can to rank up on the leaderboard!

name: Bad Hop Baseball
summary: Baseball crossed with pinball / pachinko. Skill and luck combine in this chaotic casual sports game. A new take on a vintage arcade classic.

name: Ball Punchers
summary: Ball Punchers is a high-intensity, fast-paced, beat 'em-up party game. Fight your friends and ruin friendships!

name: Backrooms Cycle
summary: Outrun the deadly backrooms as you navigate procedurally generated levels, battle terrifying creatures, and gather powerful items. Get more efficient with each attempt, pushing yourself to become Faster than Backrooms.

name: Battle of Orion 10: First contact
summary: A hundred years have passed since the events on Cronos X transpired. The USN have not taken the warnings from Cronos to heed and is unprepared for the onslaught of the alien armada. Now, you must take point in fighting the brutal alien armada that is tearing through the outer rims!

name: Balloon Man
summary: Action, Puzzle, Soulslike, Platform

name: Bargain Blocz
summary: In bargain blocz you have to fill up the boards without loosing much time.

name: Bad Friends Shooter
summary: Play against your friends on one device in this action packed game! Available for up to 4 players on one device.

name: Battle Bros.
summary: A hand drawn, turn-based, card battling hybrid. Collect cards and build your deck to conquer your opponents! Outwit and ultimately outplay them with a superior strategy!

name: Baker Business 3
summary: Manage your very own bakery. Discover recipes, bake tasty treats and sell them to your customers. Unlock upgrades such as ovens and display shelves to expand your bakery. Customize the interior and exterior style to create your dream bakery.

name: Babel of Ystilia
summary: Turn-based roguelike with minimalistic, fast-paced combat. Loot equipment, pray at shrines, outsmart enemies, defeat Seraphs and save Ystilia from the divine lunacy.

name: Baalzebub
summary: A turn-based infernal dungeon crawler.

name: Baseless
summary: Baseless is a challenging planet-jumping shooter that defies gravity. Shooting = Movement: blast from planet to planet with 360° gravity, creatively demolishing every enemy in your path to save your family. Fire powerful weapons, adopt cute friends, and discover a galaxy worth fighting for!

name: BattleZ
summary: 3 years after the first case of the "Z" virus, the infected would still be roaming the world, whether by land or sea. And here, on Tristan da Cunha, a remote island with around 250 inhabitants is where our game takes place.

name: BandRoll
summary: The platform flows to the rhythm of the music and the player slides. Train your reflexes in a 3D neon universe trying not to fall! You can experience different styles of music with a fluent visuality, and you can open different levels according to your musical tastes.

name: Backrooms Descent
summary: If you are not careful enough, you may end up in that place, the place some call The Backrooms. The Backrooms of existence, a hellish dimension of infinite maze-like constructs, each level pushing deeper into the despair. Could you, a normal person find the way out? Dive deeper into the horror

name: Bat Hero
summary: Equipped with your favorite weapon of choice, a Bat, embark in a whole new adventure with this brand new arcade action game and defeat the great evil that lurks in the shadows gathering new powers along the way. Ready ? Swing Away !

name: Balance 100
summary: This game requires controlling your hands to cure that slight OCD, Maybe occasionally drive you crazy, But don't worry. You'll probably be able to do it.

name: Bar Simulator
summary: Create a real oasis in the Arizona desert and be forever marked with golden letters in the history of fried chicken! Develop your own recipes that will make your coatings stand out from the competition, as well as provide efficient guest service, by which you will ensure their constant flow!

name: Balloon in a Wasteland
summary: When your balloon crash-lands in a wasteland of fowl creatures, its time to survive. Upgrade your weapons, fort, and turrets while you try to fix your balloon. Balance your free time between battles so you are prepared for future waves. Try to escape as soon as you can!

name: Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean
summary: Players will have the opportunity to discover or rediscover the emotional journeys of the Baten Kaitos series, which features distinct card-based RPG systems that allow for split-second decisions that edge participants closer to victory. Players will take the role of a Guardian Spirit, guiding each game’s protagonist and their companions through their journey.

name: Baten Kaitos Origins
summary: Players will have the opportunity to discover or rediscover the emotional journeys of the Baten Kaitos series, which features distinct card-based RPG systems that allow for split-second decisions that edge participants closer to victory. Players will take the role of a Guardian Spirit, guiding each game’s protagonist and their companions through their journey.

name: Baten Kaitos I & II HD Remaster
summary: Two RPG masterpieces return. Originally released for the Nintendo GameCube, Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean and Baten Kaitos Origins are back with improved graphics and new features to aid game progression, making them even more accessible for new players.

name: Battle Mage
summary: Battle Mage is a rogue-like/souls-like/Metroidvania. It features fast responsive sword, bow and spell combat, in an endlessly repeating randomly generated environment. With a narrative that takes the player throughout the massive maze-like world.

name: Backrooms: No Return
summary: Explore the poolrooms in a inmersive cooperative horror game. Immerse yourself in the story of scientists who are exploring the depths of the poolrooms and end up encountering various obstacles in order to find a way back to reality.

name: Battle for Borders
summary: The purpose of the game is to demonstrate the military weapons of different countries and their use in combat conditions.

name: Barbelé
summary: Do your time, one way or another. Barbelé is an Action and 3D Fighting, 3rd person game. It's a story driven adventure in a french prison which offers players dialogue choices.

name: Back to Dust: Hold it Together
summary: You and your daughter are in a conflict zone and running low on food, you must travel to the border and try to enter the neighboring country. The path to the border is full of other refugees asking for your help. The more refugees you accept in your party, the tougher will be your journey.

name: Battle Cars
summary:
Welcome to the world of Battle Cars.
Battle Cars is a classic arcade top-down racing game with fast mini cars and funny weapons to destroy your opponents!
Play the career mode to upgrade your cars and unlock new tracks, or go online to play with your friends

name: Backrooms Break
summary: Experience the ultimate psychological horror in Backrooms. Armed with only a hammer and revolver, you must fight for survival in a never-ending maze of abandoned rooms. Can you keep your sanity long enough to escape the clutches of the Backrooms?

name: Bank Tycoon
summary: In a world where banks control countries, finances and armies, manage your bank and army to dominate the world. Based on actual banking principles, create relationships and strategies to manage finances and armies and lead your bank in turn-based grid game play

name: Bat N' Ball
summary: Bat N' Ball VR: Challenge your batting skills against robotic pitchers and compete for the highest score in this fast-paced and realistic virtual reality baseball game.

name: Batsugun: Saturn Tribute Boosted
summary: Batsugun is a vertical scrolling shooter arcade game released in 1993 by Toaplan. The game attracted attention for the large number of bullets shot by both enemies and allies. This led many games to adopt the same kind of play. Batsugun thus became the pioneer of the bullet hell genre. The “Special” version of the game was then released on home consoles. The Special version offers new features with a better sound.

name: Bagdex
summary: The journey begins! Collect over 160 creatures inspired by Brazilian culture, manage and customize your base, conquer challenging battles, and unravel the mystery behind this fantastic world!

name: Banny Sammy
summary: The jungle is full of foods for our cute monkeys and bears, Sammy and Banny. One problem: Obstacles prevent the animals from reaching their favourite treats. Try to find the path that leads them to bananas and honey jars and more.

name: Batman: The Enemy Within - Shadows Edition
Ball Animals
summary: Animal Ball is a local party game, where 2 to 4 animal balls fight against each other...Use your bouncy belly to bounce others away!

name: Babs' Potion Shop
summary: Have fun bullying our sheep/witch Babs! 15 transformations in 1.0 and a juicy victory screen starring Babs and her loved one.

name: Backroom
summary: Based on Alice in Borderland, SCP-096 and The Backrooms Saga. Explore, think, interact, fight, but be careful, SCP-096 could be hidden anywhere...

name: Battlezone: Battle Grounds
summary: The NSDF and CCA forces are at war again with 45 new Instant Action maps and 50 new multiplayer maps for Battlezone!

name: Battlezone: The Red Odyssey
summary: The Red Odyssey begins... with the two new armies: the Black Dog Squadron and the Chinese Army; new unit capabilities such as the Chinese Cloak; 23 new missions and 3 new planets.

name: Battle of Guardians
summary: Forgotten Guardians returned to save humanity from a demonic invasion. Battle of Guardians, is a real-time online multiplayer PVP and PVE free-to-play fighting game.

name: Battlemon
summary: Battlemon is a third-person shooter based on fast-paced skirmishes and dynamic map events. Until the last drop of juice!

name: Baking Success
summary: Join Fay on her Flying Bakery and travel the world, serving delicious baked goods in this challenging Time Management game!

name: Balls & Beats
summary: Balls & Beats is a colorful and casual game where you automatically jump to the beat of the music.

name: Bayonetta
summary:
Remaster of the first installment of the Bayonetta series, first made available in the "Bayonetta & Vanquish 10th Anniversary" Bundle.

Bayonetta. The last survivor of an ancient witch clan who keep the balance between light, dark and chaos. Entombed to protect herself – and the world as we know it – Bayonetta is discovered and revived after 500 years, sparking a chain of events with cataclysmic repercussions.

name: Bad Boys Do It Better!
summary: Bad Boys Do it Better! is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You are transferred to a school where it's nothing but delinquent boys and you're also living in a dorm with five of your classmates, where you fall in love with one of them.

name: Bala na Manga
summary:
A mobster stole you, get back what's yours in turn-based duels!!
You must choose between to shoot, to reload or to dodge.

name: Ball vs. Zombie
summary: A stationary strategy tower defense game. Place balls to block zombies Don't let zombies into the house Player's hand speed, strategy matching, ball matching, Protect the surviving humans, the ball warriors protect the humans

name: BasketBall Street Hero
summary: Let’s play basketball, be the real basketball champion and play the basketball machine with your skills as a hoops, showdown, slam dunk, dribbles, shoot and win!

name: Babel
summary: Game Boy port of Babel.

name: Basketball Party Shot
summary: Basketball Party Shot is a multiplayer dunk shot game with ability to play up to 8 players on one device. Play with your friends or become a basketball star in arcade mode!

name: Battle Crush
summary: The beginning of an explosive action brawl! Battle Crush is an action-packed game with simple controls and intense battles. Smash your enemies with spectacular skills in this electrifying arena filled with explosive energy!

name: Baldur's Gate 3: Collector's Edition
summary:
Gather your party and prepare for the launch of Baldur's Gate 3 with the limited edition Baldur's Gate 3: Collector's Edition.

Each Collector's Edition contains a digital copy of the game, a custom sticker sheet, a 25cm Mind Flayer vs. Drow battle diorama, a 160-page hardcover art book, a cloth map of Faerûn, a set of D&D-inspired origin character sheets, a metal tadpole keyring, a Magic: The Gathering booster pack, a custom-engraved metal d20 based on the dice from Baldur's Gate 3, and a certificate of authenticity, all within a mind-flayer-inspired collector's box.

All of the Digital Deluxe Edition DLC content is also included with the Collector’s Edition, which gives you 72 hours Early Access, a unique dice skin, a collection of Divinity-inspired items, and the Adventurer’s Pouch, along with the digital downloadable OST, Artbook and Character Sheets. In addition, Collector’s Edition owners will receive an exclusive in-game skin based on the physical Metal D20.

name: Bayoen Syokin Sougaku 50,000 Yen Sohdatsu Quiz
summary: Arle has some questions.

name: Battle Cry of Freedom: Blood & Gore
summary: Experience the brutal and gruesome reality of the 19th Century with the Blood & Gore DLC for Battle Cry of Freedom. With the Blood & Gore DLC you can expect to see new and improved death and wounded animations including decapitations, dismemberment and more.

name: Backrooms: The Project
summary: Backrooms: The Project is an immersive first-person found footage horror adventure game. Explore the different levels of this mysterious liminal dimension known as the Backrooms, finding and utilizing items to aid you in your escape. Be careful though...you are not alone.

name: Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse
summary: 'Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse' is the sequel to 'Bad 2 Bad: Delta' and 'Extinction', armed with a vaster world and richer content. Apocalypse follows the story of the Delta Team, led by Major Pan, saving and reconstructing the world ravaged by a virus from the Human Forces. Join the Delta Team on their journey from survival to rebuilding the world.

name: Bangalore Auto
summary: Twist and dodge out of control traffic including cows,elephants and insane bus drivers as you pick up passengers that throng the roads of Bangalore,India.

name: Balls vs. Maze
summary:
Welcome to Balls vs Maze.
Rotate 50 mazes and release 50 balls from each!
Simple controls and satisfying gameplay.
Features fun physics with twisty mazes!
Twist to escape the Maze!

name: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
summary: A Batman: Gotham by Gaslight game could've taken fans to the cobblestone streets of 19th-century Gotham, but the project never saw the light of day. A Batman: Gotham by Gaslight game nearly followed the release of 2008's Batman: Arkham Asylum, but the project was sadly canceled before it could see the light of day.

name: Bandit Bites
summary:
Help Nev rescue his 3 favourite things - jam, ducky and ice cream from Bouncer Boy's evil cat, Bandit.
Use the cursor keys to direct Nev around the maze and pick up the items, collecting discs along the way. You have 45 seconds to try and save all the items and collect as many discs as you can without getting caught by Bandit. Find the gold disc and you'll hold Bandit off for 5 seconds but he'll soon be after you again! If you're successful and don't manage to get caught in the 45 second limit, you can move onto level 2 where you'll have to look out for an even faster Bandit.

name: Ball Sort
summary:
Sort the balls and clean up the mess!
Press & hold to pull the balls up. Release to drop them. Switch colors to get the balls you want.

name: Bassmaster Fishing: Digital Collector's Edition
summary: Experience the thrill of competitive big bass fishing and climb the ranks to become the Bassmaster Classic champion. Dive into the fully licensed content from the Bassmaster series from amateur to elite events. Manage your sponsors, equip your dream setup, and customise the look of your angler to tackle the Bassmaster series.

name: Battle Tanks: Arena
summary: Capture cities and destroy enemy tanks in breathtaking firefights. Protect your comrades from attacking enemies. To defeat a dangerous enemy, come up with a plan of action in advance to destroy as many enemies as possible with less loss...

name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
summary: A cancelled DS port of Batman: Arkham Asylum.

name: BadMan
summary: BadMan is a game where you shoot BadMans with your gun and they keep spawning faster as you kill them. You just shoot some 2D characters called BadMans and try to survive

name: Bare Witness
summary: Bare Witness is an adult visual novel that will have multiple endings, in which choices will play a major part in how the story resolves.

name: BanHown
summary: There was a widespread epidemic crisis, causing utilities and industry to halt, resulting in famine until the city became uninhabited. This forced people to rely on themselves for survival. However there is a family area coming and have decided to return to live in other provinces.

name: Ballooni
summary: Happiness has a name: Ballooni! Just play Ballooni and have fun!

name: Battle of Hořice 1423
summary: Relax alone or with friends while experiencing the 15th-century battle and all that came with it - explained simply and casually in a popular way.

name: Ballistic: The story of Marble and the Energy Core
summary: Ballistic is a top-down roguelike casual game divided by level, with a completely new take on the gameplay invented by Breakout in 1976, and enhance later by other games like Arkanoid.

name: Baseball Kings 2015
summary:
Get your pro baseball league stars in shape so that they can play at best like a allstar players.
You can also raise batting average and improve the ball’s speed up to 110MPH !
Work hard and build yourself an unbeatable derby team.
Battle your team to World Series Champion !

name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
summary: A Wii port of Batman: Arkham Asylum developed by Red Fly Studio that was cancelled during early development.

name: Baking with Lizzie
summary: a sweet story

name: Battlestar Galactica Online
summary: A port of Battlestar Galactica Online for the cancelled Panasonic Jungle.

name: BallisticNG: Neon Nights
summary: Neon Nights introduces 5 new tracks, all playable in forward and reverse, a new campaign covering 48 events and a new set of liveries.

name: Barnstormers: Determined to Win
summary: Travel back in time to the era of Negro League Baseball. This immersive experience sets you in the 1940's where legends of the game were making a name for themselves in spite of the oppositions set against them. Experience the story first hand as a player during this pivotal time in history.

name: Bang Bang Land
summary: Take part in a number of marksmanship challenges while you explore Bang Bang Land an abandoned theme park designed by a Gun Nut that had to be closed down due to serious Health & Safety concerns! Can you help it to reopen?

name: Baldo: The Three Fairies
summary: During a visit to his aunt in Forra, a while before his main adventure in Guardian Owls, Baldo finds himself in a quest to rescue three fairies and, with their help, stop a terrible evil that lurks in the shadows.

name: Baldo: The Elemental Temples
summary: Baldo's free update, The Elemental Temples includes enemies you'll encounter and more, featuring four new dungeons and more. The update is a new standalone adventure for lovers of complex dungeons, and the story follows the events after the Three Fairies DLC and before the Guardian Owls.

name: Banshees: The Game
summary: Banshees: The Game distils the film’s plot. You play as a pixelated version of Brendan Gleeson’s character with a singular motive: get to the pub and grab a couple of pints. Annoyingly, Colin Farrell and his beautiful eyebrows are on a mission to repair your friendship, so you’ll need to avoid him, grab five fingers, and sneak to the pub on a Pac-Man grid.

name: Bases Loaded
summary: Swing for the fences! Reach level 20 to win.

name: Backbeat and Hexagroove: Music Strategy Bundle
summary: Two unique takes on music games, together at a great price. Enjoy contemplative puzzling in Backbeat, and fast-paced rhythm action in Hexagroove: Tactical DJ.

name: Bagels
summary: Bagels is a mastermind game where the player must guess the computer's code. Codes consist of three numbers. After each guess of the player, the computer answers fermi (one digit is at the right position), pico (one digit is in the code but on a different position), or bagels (none of the digits are correct). The goal is to guess the number in as few tries as possible, so players must use the answers to infer the right code.

name: Bang Bang Tennis
summary:
Get ready for... Bang Bang Tennis! A fun and crazy fast paced tennis game
Take on the world’s best and become the Bang Bang Grand Champion in this fast paced Bash and Smash Tennis game.

Bang Bang tennis, a new kind of tennis, with barriers to stop the ball from going out, the goal is simple, smash the ball past your opponent.

name: Battletoads / Double Dragon
summary: 16-bit port of Battletoads & Double Dragon.

name: Balance Weight
summary: Arrange your cats and other items to 2 sides of the scale to balance. Sound easy right? But it will blow you mind when you actually solve it.

name: Backrooms Exploration
summary: Traverse your way through this Atmospheric Psychological Horror! Explore the 9 eerie levels of The Backrooms, a place where everything seems familiar, with a constant feeling of something or someone watching you. Why were you chosen to enter The Backrooms?

name: Ball til You Fall
summary:
Ball til You Fall is a lighthearted basketball shooter with attitude.
Swipe the ball at the hoop to score, but beware! Missed shots come with a penalty. If you hit the backboard, you risk pushing the hoop off of the edge!
Collect gems to win new balls with mysterious new abilities that can give you that competitive edge.

name: Ballsvoid
summary: Difficult game of skill and reflexes where you have to help the character to escape. Take your controller and prepare to die many times.

name: Battery Check
summary:
Battery Check is an action game with strategic elements. So it comes down to dexterity, but you will have to think regularly. It's all about batteries and the mechanisms they power. When those batteries are empty, everything comes to a standstill, and you can't get any further. So you have to make sure you keep things running...

Battery Check was given away for free by Stibat when returning 15 empty batteries between May 9 and June 20, 1998. The goal was to give away 50,000 units, but due to its popularity, it ended up being 220,000.

name: Battle Konchuuden
summary:
Battle Insects Den is a strategy role-playing game for the PlayStation and was released by Jaleco in 1999.

The game progresses through a series of strategy and adventure parts.

In the strategy part, the player controls an allied insect on a battle stage that resembles a chessboard, and when it comes into contact with an enemy insect, the game shifts to a command-selectable battle.

In the adventure part, the player controls the main character on the overlooking map, talking with other characters and shopping.

You can also connect your PocketStation to play mini-games and bring the items you obtain into the main game.

name: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance.

name: Baker Business 3: Spring Pack
summary: Welcome spring into your bakery! Bake fresh spring themed recipes, hunt for hidden Easter eggs to earn tickets, put out baskets full of candy for your customers, and decorate your bakery with flowers, butterflies, and more!

name: Banana Man: The Space Monkeys
summary: In a world full of Ape Men, you are a Banana Man struggling to survive in a space station. Build platforms, catch bananas and restore the space station to become the commander.

name: Basilisk 2000
summary:
Explore an unfinished RPG through its level editor.

The spiritual successor to the unreleased Super Nintendo game Basilisk. This project seemed far more ambitious, but somehow almost became lost media.

Developed around Y2K by an unknown studio, the game was thought to be lost until a fan designed a wrapper program in Unity to load its level editor. Now the potential can finally be seen and its mysteries laid to rest.

name: Back to the Dark
summary: Singleplayer medieval-fantasy extraction looter with melee combat and the occasional arrow and spell. Demo available!

name: Ball Drop
summary: Ball Drop is a puzzle platformer game. The ball rolls down using gravity and you must use the mouse to move platforms to guide the ball to the goal line. The objects in the game rotate following the mouse and you can use them to solve puzzles and navigate around hazards.

name: Baseball Battle
summary: Step up to the plate in Wil & Shelby's Baseball Battle and take on the world in classic pitcher-vs-batter duels. Hit and pitch with ease using intuitive multi-touch controls. Earn points to increase your power, accuracy and intuition with each victory. Featuring input from 2013 Rookie of the Year Wil Myers and St. Louis ace Shelby Miller, the battle for baseball supremacy is on!

name: Basket and Ball
summary: Tap the jump button to bounce the living ball as if you are dribbling it! Lead the stray ball into the basket passing acrobatic trials and solving puzzles. Test your throwing aim every 3 levels. Use the time stopping bonus to get out of difficult situations. Avoid robot cops and fire traps, jump over spikes, dive into water, and propel yourself with explosions on 120 challenging levels. iCade and MFI gamepads are fully supported!

name: Bad Piggies: Create Your Own Angry Birds Levels!
summary: Bad Piggies: Create Your Own Angry Birds Levels! is a cancelled webgame meant to release in 2011 by Rovio Entertainment, the game was never mentioned or announced by the company and was left in mystery until a website was found in 2021, and its data was already deleted from the server thus it wouldn't load, but an earlier version of the game was found that actually worked, but you need to have Adobe Flash though for it to load.

name: Bad Piggies Build
summary: Bad Piggies Build is a cancelled webgame meant to release in 2012 by Rovio Entertainment, however, this game was never mentioned or announced by the company and was left in mystery until a SWF download was found on the Appspot link.

name: Battle Monsters
summary: Battle Monsters is an early German RPG-Maker Pokémon clone by Pascal Cattarius.

name: Bakken: Ski Jumping
summary: Bakken: Ski Jumping is a winter sports simulation game. To go for gold you have to jump as high as possible, you have to fly as long as possible and you mustn't forget the telemark landing!

name: Battle Shapers
summary: Battle Shapers is a blazing-fast, sci-fi FPS roguelite in which you shoot and smash your way through swarms of corrupt robots. Wield powerful weapons, abilities and game-changing new powers stolen from ruthless Overlords to bring New Elysium back to the utopia it once was.

name: Bartenders
summary: Bartenders is a chaotic single or multiplayer tavern management game set in medieval times. As you develop and upgrade your own tavern, try to satisfy the customers' orders in a physics-based environment.

name: Back Alley Chronicle
summary: One summer afternoon, Saeki is invited by his friend Maeda to go to an old book festival. . . By chance, the self-proclaimed genius scientist Nanaban asked him to search for the lost book! A mysterious incident happens there!？It's that kind of story!

name: Back to the Collis
summary: Back to the Collis is a story-rich, fully hand-drawn 2D Point & Click adventure puzzle. Embark on a journey alongside the main character, Benjamin, to solve lots of engaging puzzles and explore the town of Collis, outstanding by its memorable populace.

name: Bad Dream: Purgatory
summary: Explore a hauntingly surreal landscape filled with unused characters from a cancelled project in Bad Dream: Purgatory. Will you give them purpose, or will they be doomed to suffer?

name: Basketball Showdown: Royale
summary: 50 players meet on one court. Grab your ball and shoot like your life depends on it in Basketball Showdown: Royale!

name: Backgaminion
summary: Backgaminion is an atmospheric board game with deck building as its essential element. You experience dungeon crawling in a mystic fantasy world and turn your cards into powerful minions and magic effects on the board.

name: Baphomet: Eternal Flame
summary: Prepare to unleash your inner demon and dominate the mortal realm as the Demon Lord Baphomet! Wreak havoc with a powerful array of demonic spells and abilities to crush cities, towns, and villages, and build your demonic empire to reign supreme over all those who oppose you.

name: Bakushou!! All Yoshimoto Quiz-Ou Ketteisen
summary: Taking on the theme of the popular Japanese TV quiz show of the popular "Yoshimoto Club", the player participates in a quiz game with multiple choice answers, the goal being to earn as many points as possible to win a prize.

name: Battery Navi
summary: The content of the game is made up of information revolving products by the Furukawa Battery Co., Ltd. After brief reading, the player has to play quizzes as multiple choice questions.

name: Ballz Deep
summary: Ballz Spawn at the top of your screen and fall to the end. There are obstacles in the way and it's up to you to upgrade to make the map easier!

name: Backgammon Live
summary:
With Backgammon Live, you can play online backgammon on iPad in HD and you can play on iPhone and iPod Touch as well. Internet connection required.
Play internet backgammon games or matches or tournaments, chat, compete, make new friends!

name: Banana Heroes: Fruit Survivor
summary:
While our Banana hero is powerful and capable of learning and using vast majority of weaponry and skills, we needs YOU to guide it through the endless waves of evil zombies to become the ultimate top gunner and save the day.

As our Banana Heroes gains experience through hard fought battles, you decide which weapon it 'll learn and use

Are you a fan of Survival - Top gunner - Pixel Arcade game? Are you a fan of Survivor Games? From a complete basic to the mightiest hero, combine the best skills to destroy zombies and become the last survivor! You can create thousands of unique skill combinations to overcome the challenges and survive every wave of enemies’ attacks.

name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold
Batman Begins: Fear the Bat
summary:
BE THE BATMAN!
- Four action buttons let you control Batman's punches and kicks as he battles ninjas attacking from all directions!
- Throw Batarangs to take on surprise weapon attacks ands core bonus points@
- Auto shut off after 30 seconds of no play.

name: Batman Begins: Fast Pursuit
summary:
MULTI SCREEN TECHNOLOGY TAKES YOUR GAME TO THE NEXT LEVEL!
- Exciting multi screen technology lets you view a map on one screen while driving the Batmobile through the streets of Gotham City on the other!
- Map plots your location and gives advance notice of bad guys hiding out behind buildings. Defeat them by pressing the Throw button to throw Batarangs!
- But be aware of approaching road blocks and barricades on the driving screen. Control the fate of the Batmobile by moving left or right to avoid oncoming obstacles or press the Jump button to activate this feature just like the Batmobile in the movie!
- Auto shut off after 30 seconds of no play.

name: Batman Begins: Batmobile
summary:
RACE THROUGH GOTHAM CITY!
- Press any button to turn the game on.
- Race the Batmobile through the streets of Gotham City moving left and right to avoid oncoming obstacles and score points!
- Auto shut off after 30 seconds of no play.

name: Batman Begins: Batarang
summary:
BATTLE THE NINJAS!
- Press any button to turn the game on.
- Press the Move button to move Batman left or right.
- Press the Throw button to throw batarangs.
- Auto shut off after 30 seconds of no play.

name: Basketball: Electronic Game
summary: A fast-paced electronic basketball game released in 1979. The player uses buttons to control movement and scoring in a simplified LCD interface designed for handheld gaming.

name: Barbie for Girls Softball
summary: Barbie and her softball team are ready for the big game. It will be a tough nine innings, but, with your help, Barbie's team will win!

name: Barbie for Girls Soccer
summary: Barbie and her friends take to the field in one of their favorite sports. Control Barbie's team as they try to pass and kick their way to a victory

name: Barbie for Girls Shopping Adventure
summary: Can Barbie get a new outfit in time for her date with Ken? Help her avoid the crazy shoppers on her way through the mall.

name: Barbie for Girls Mountain Bike Riding
summary: Barbie is ready for the big mountain bike race. On your mark, get set, GO! The race has begun! Barbie needs your help to win the race.

name: Barbie for Girls In-Line Skating
summary: Barbie cruises to the beach on her cool in-line skates. Help Barbie make it to the beach before the sun goes down.

name: Barbie for Girls Horseback Riding
summary: It's a beautiful day in the mountains as Barbie saddles up her horse and goes for a ride. Get ready for lots of excitement as Barbie trots along the mountain path.

name: Barbie for Girls Hearts & Stars
summary: Can you turn all of Barbie's hearts into stars? Taking turns with Barbie, try to fill up the board and capture all the hearts - but don't let Barbie capture your stars.

name: Barbie for Girls Beach Adventure
summary: Barbie and her dolphin friend are having a busy day at the beach. Join them as they swim through the ocean helping swimmers safely reach the shore

name: Bandai Namco Flashback Blast!
summary:
Have a Blast! with the home versions of the greatest arcade classics of all time. Play Pac-Man, Dig Dug, Mappy and take control of some real characters. Or better yet, blast into outer space and take on attacking alien hordes with your Galaxip starfighter in Galaxian. The fun is out-of-this-world with these timeless video game favorites!.

Features 8 of the greatest classic Atari games built-in: Pac-Man, Dig Dug, Galaga, Galaxian, Mappy, Sky Kid, The Tower of Druaga, Xevious

name: Backrooms Project: The Lost File
summary: Backrooms Project: The Lost File - it's a horror exploration game, with many puzzles

name: Backrooms Society
summary: Backrooms Society is a 1-8 player co-op horror game. Make your way through unique levels of the backrooms while trying to survive and avoid mysterious entities. Scavenge each level for gear and resources, bring it back to The Hub where you can sell valuables and buy/craft new gear.

name: Battery Samurai
summary: Get batteries to get stronger! Enjoy your adventure now! Recover lost parts and get various skills.

name: Backgammon Pro for Nintendo Switch
summary:
Utilizing AI machine learning and game record analysis, this is as authentic as Backgammon gets!
It even supports online multiplayer!

name: Baseball
summary: Port of Fantasy Baseball from the Sport Vii.

name: Basketball Odyssey
summary:
Shoot hoops and unlock new worlds on this addictive and relaxing basketball game!
Basketball Odyssey is a different basketball experience. A journey of calm and relaxation due to its music and ambient sounds, while you feel the satisfaction from overcoming a challenge.

name: Ball Blaster
summary: Same as the VT3xx-based Ball Blaster gameplay-wise, though the graphics are unique; featuring a girl using the launcher and a small creature in the bottom-right. It does not seem to be based on either of the Disney Game It! Zuma clones in coding.

name: Baby Arms
summary: Clone of the Game & Watch game Donkey Kong 3.

name: Back to Childhood: Classic Games Collection
summary: Meet and play with familiar faces from your childhood in this bundle that feels like a cartoon break after school

name: Ball Avalanche
summary:
Help Torgui dodge the avalanche of balls heading towards him.
The challenge of the game is to last as long as possible dodging the balls without being hit by any or the game ends. So prepare your reflexes and your skills to be the best in the world dodging the avalanche of balls and get the best time of your game! Challenge your friends and compare the leaderboard to get the best score in the world.

name: BaseballOut!
summary:
BaseballOut! is inspired by old school games from the nes, the playstyle is like Classic arcade games meet baseball where you have to face different leagues and be the champion , each of the rivals has a different style and throws different shots, try to get the gold medal with each of them!
You can unlock collectible cards with extra info about the characters of the game , new outfits with special characteristics and use them to beeat your rivals.

name: Ball Wall
summary: Can you avoid all enemies in time? In this fun game you have to get as far as possible between the enemies and you can collect coins. You can use the bottom wall, but also the top wall. The further you progress in the game, the more types of enemies you will encounter.

name: Bad Times at the Silver Lake
summary: Immerse yourself in the story of Sarah and her dog Shibu. Solve the mystery of the terrible virus infection and save the city of Salt Lake. Solve puzzles, shoot zombies and learn the terrible secrets of this city.

name: Barro T23
summary: The new gen for the T version!

name: Baseball with Heads
summary: Heads! Another wacky installment in the "with Heads" series, Baseball with Heads is a sports collector's dream! Enjoy baseball all year long! Baseball with Heads is a simple yet addictive pitching game. How long can you strike out batters before messing up?

name: Ball
summary: Classic paddle battle in tiny cocktail form, for Playdate.

name: Bale Out
summary: Bale Out is a short, relaxing puzzle game with a unique puzzle mechanic: AI prediction. Save barnyard animals by learning their movement patterns and manipulating the environment!

name: Backrooms: Realm of Shadows
summary:
Backrooms: Realm of Shadows is a horror game that takes place in a seemingly endless maze of interconnected rooms and hallways, known as the Backrooms. The game is based on the popular internet creepypasta about a mysterious place that exists between the walls and floors of buildings, a place where people can become trapped and lost for days, weeks, or even years.

In the game, you play as a person who has become trapped in the Backrooms, and your goal is to find a way out before the endless maze drives you insane. The Backrooms are a surreal and unsettling place, filled with strange noises, flickering lights, and mysterious creatures that seem to be watching you from the shadows.

As you explore the Backrooms, you'll need to find keys, solve puzzles, and avoid dangerous traps and obstacles. You'll also encounter other lost souls who are trying to escape, but not all of them can be trusted. The deeper you go, the more unsettling the Backrooms become, and the harder it is to tell what's real and what's just a figment of your imagination.

Backrooms: Realm of Shadows is designed to be a tense and atmospheric horror experience, with a focus on exploration, puzzle-solving, and survival. It's a game that will keep you on edge from start to finish, as you try to find your way out of this terrifying and otherworldly place.

name: BananaGuy
summary: BananGuy returns for a new epic adventure! Collect "Power Coins" and explore goofy worlds in the ultimate search for the legendary golden banana!

name: Battle of Zodiacs
summary: Fully competitive game, where the goal is to dominate your enemy's land! To fulfill their objective, each player will assemble a team of heroes and a deck composed of items and spells. Get ready to enter an epic battle that unites the zodiac signs with the medieval fantasy world!

name: Battle Plan: Jester's Knife
summary: Battle Plan: Jester's Knife is a sliding tile strategy game with hand-drawn animation and combat. Choose from fantasy characters, plan tile sequences, and defeat opponents in turn-based, real-time or one tile move modes. Compete online or locally in PVP with a time limit. Be the ultimate strategist.

name: Battle Kart 64
summary:
Battle Kart 64 is a rom hack by Triclon for Mario Kart 64 that brings new features and options to the game’s Battle Mode. It is console compatible (note: Expansion Pak required).

New Game Modes:

- “Hot Potato” featuring a timer on whoever was hit last and counts down to zero. Whoever is the “hot potato” when the timer reaches zero loses 1 HP.

- “Squish” where you need to hit, lightning shrink, and then run over the shrunken player to score.

- “Capture The Flag” where you must capture a flag and bring it back to your base to score.

- “Keep Away” where there is one flag to fight over and each player must try to hold onto it as long as possible.

Plus new scoring options, AI bots, item toggling, the original 16 race courses playable in battle mode and much more. It is still being actively developed with new modes and options planned.

name: Bat Blitz
summary: Bat Blitz is a top down arcade shooter where you shoot bats to get gold to buy upgrades to kill more bats.

name: Barrel It: The Water Adventure
summary:
Are you ready for the ultimate barrel-riding adventure? In this hilarious hyper casual game, you are on top of a rolling barrel and you need to avoid obstacles, and collect water to get to the finish line.

Sounds easy, right? Wrong! The barrel is unpredictable and will bounce, spin and roll in all directions. You have to balance yourself and steer the barrel with your finger. Watch out for rocks, logs, spikes and other hazards that will knock you off or slow you down.

And don't forget to collect water along the way, because you need it to keep the barrel rolling. The more water you have, the higher the chances of success are! The less water you have, the more likely you are to fail.

Can you make it to the end of each level without falling off or running out of water? Find out in this crazy and fun game that will test your reflexes and your sense of humor.

name: Banished Monsters
summary: Follow the story of a Fomorian bunny, a creature that gets banished to earth and has to adapt to earth and its lifestyle.

name: Barbie and the Magic of Pegasus
summary: Take off on a magical quest with Annika and her sister, Brieta - a flying horse! The evil Wenlock has turned everyone in the kingdom to stone and it's up to Annika and Brieta to reverse the spell! Play exciting mini-games and solve puzzles to defeat the wizard to restore the kingdom!

name: Batman Beyond: Return of the Joker
summary: Game Boy Color port of Batman Beyond: Return of the Joker.

name: Bartolomeu Odyssey
summary: Bartolomeu Odyssey is a side scroller based on the tellings of the flying priest, Bartolomeu de Gusmão, in which you need to dodge the birds, vultures, and other dangers that dominate the skies of this reality.

name: Battle for the Void
summary: You will annihilate your opponents with an arsenal of over 40 types of weapons across multiple online game modes. Strange creatures and the destructible environment will make each gaming session unique! Level up and obliterate everything around you! Are you ready for the void?

name: Bang Average Football
summary: Experience the thrill of the beautiful game in Bang Average Football - the fast-paced, addictive, easy-to-learn football game for 1-4 players! Play against your friends for footballing glory in multiplayer, or turn a hopeless club into national champions as player-manager in Story mode!

name: Banana Yetti
summary: Banana Yetti is an addictive and fast paced arcade game that will keep you on your toes. The game features a cute and adorable yeti character that the player takes control of.

name: Bail Force: Cyberpunk Bounty Hunters
summary: Hunt cybercriminals in a brutal action roguelite where enemies adapt to your fighting style. Play as Angel or Lea and choose your path through revenge and redemption in a dystopian society.

name: Barro F22
summary: Barro F22 is the new generation for the fast version of Barro, now with a new style of race tracks but, with the good old toy car/ go kart arcade style!

name: Barro GT
summary: Barro GT is the new generation of Barro, now with a new style of race tracks but, with the good old toy car/ go kart arcade style!

name: Bay Lynx
summary: Clever, fast, and fun. Bay Lynx honors the mascot platformer formula with classic gameplay mechanics and smartly designed levels.

name: Barold: Inferno
summary: "Barold: Inferno" is an action-packed dungeon crawler game where you play as the knight Barold, fighting demons and gods in the depths of hell using different weapons and abilities.

name: Backrooms: Wit's End
summary: Backrooms: Wit's End is an immersive coop survival horror game, featuring procedurally generated, non-linear level progression and dynamic gameplay mechanics. Explore the different disturbing levels with your friends, while trying to escape from many puzzling entities.

name: Basketball Showdown 2
summary: Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone worldwide in a head-to-head Basketball Showdown!

name: Baseball Superstars 2023
summary:
The fun never stops in Baseball Superstars 2023!
This time, we've got three friends from Com2uS's Minigame Party join Baseball Superstars as trainers!
Meet these adorable trainers who know how to hit massive home runs and throw incredible pitches!

name: Barrett Foster: Chapter One
summary:
Barrett Foster a realistic puzzle game in which you play the famous inspector solving a dramatic personal investigation: The disappearance of Emma and Gabriel, close friends of Barrett.

Explore your environment and solve different puzzles to progress and find answers !

name: Balls and Coins
summary: Are you looking for a definite solution to boredom? Then you are in the right place. Physics-based running game Balls and Coins promise excitement, tranquility, and peace of mind, while also pushing your limits.
