Avoid enemies and obstacles, collect coins, and be the who achieves the highest score.

name: Back Rooms: Ground Zero
summary:
A Backrooms fangame.

Traverse the backrooms like it's 1986, in my game inspired by Famicom visual novels and adventure games.
Move room to room, in hopes of finding anything. And discover if there was ever a way out to begin with.

name: Basketball Arcade Stars
summary:
How many baskets can you score in 40 seconds?
Basketball Arcade Stars is an addictive game designed for real basketball fans of all ages.

name: Backroom: Constructions
summary: This game is a strange object where you, as a "Player" will have to construct a Backroom, but you are a human being, so getting something to eat is a task you should accomplish too,

name: Banbard
summary: An RPG focused on character customization for combat, and having characters break there own fate to grow and build upon themselves. Customize your play style as you see fit, build relationships with your party and grow to overcome any personal or interpersonal challenge that comes your way.

name: Backrooms VS
summary: Ever dreamt of chasing your friends in a backrooms style game? Ever wanted to be the entity in the backrooms? Ever had the thought "I wonder what fear looks like in VR"? Well, this is the game for you. Backrooms VS has all that and MORE. With plenty of game modes for a night's worth of fun.

name: Battlefield 2042: Elite Edition
summary: Packed to the brim with value, Battlefield 2042 Elite Edition brings 4 Seasons worth of content. Battle on 17+ maps, wield over 35 weapons, deploy as 14 Specialists, and enjoy the “Lost World” Epic Bundle.

name: Back Fire
summary:
A standard horizontal shoot'em up. The main weapon can be powered-up to provide faster and more powerful shots. Weapons such as lightning or three-way shots appear as power-ups. There are 18 levels to complete the game. If you use a credit to continue in levels 14 through 18, you will start back at level 13.

This game is a prototype or had a limited release.

name: Bandit
summary: Driving game released by Data East USA in 1989.

name: Battle of Zama
summary: Battle of Zama is a video game about one of the most important battles in history. Scipio from Rome’s Army met Hannibal’s Army on the battlefield in Carthage. Battle of Zama is inspired by old Avalon Hill and SPI games.

name: BattleGuild
summary: Introducing BattleGuild, an action-packed top-down dungeon crawler set in a grimdark fantasy world. Join the ranks of an esteemed guild of Adventurers, undertaking dangerous quests to slay monstrous creatures and protect the realm. Forge your own path to glory.

name: Balatro
summary: Balatro is a deck-building roguelite in which players construct poker hands to earn chips and overcome enemy blinds. The game features mechanics for enhancing a deck of playing cards, purchasing Jokers that modify hand effects, and discovering synergies to progress through increasingly challenging encounters.

name: Barkelona
summary: An immersion-style game for Spanish learners

name: Battle For Cosmos
summary: Battle For Cosmos is a fast-paced, action-packed RTS set in space. With a focus on the battle it is perfect for those who want a thrilling and engaging strategy game without the unnecessary filler. Take control of your empire, build your defenses, and conquer the cosmos!

name: Ball Bash
summary: Ball Bash is a fast paced social racing game, where you can use customized ability sets to gain an advantage over your opponents. Dash through procedurally generated tracks and environments, and use your skills to avoid the incoming obstacles. Be the last one standing!

name: Barbarossa
summary: Join the swashbuckling fun of Barbarossa, an open-world pirate game. Battle pirates, trade goods, conquer islands, and become a legendary captain. Experience thrilling adventures and a simulated economy in this exciting pirate-themed game!

name: Bash It!
summary: A game of pesky moles!

name: Back 4 Blood: Day One Steelbook Edition
Base of War
summary: Base of War is a next generation 4x RTS game.

name: Baby Steps
summary: Play as Nate, an unemployed failson with nothing going for him, until one day he discovers a power he never knew he had… putting one foot in front of the other. Explore a world shrouded in mist, one step at a time. Hike the serene mountains by placing each footstep yourself, in original physics-based gameplay from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It. Take in the sights, fall in love with the local fauna, and try to find meaning in a wasted life.

name: Battle Recruits
summary: Battle Recruits is a fun, fast-paced 'Snake'-like Tower Attack game, where you can choose to play as one of many unique Heroes, all with specialized abilities! Gather your troops on the battlefield while avoiding the dangerous obstacles, then unleash them in order to destroy the enemy castle!

name: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden – Collector’s Edition
summary: Get the Collector's Edition of Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden now to get a modular statuette of Red and Antea, the game's official book, a steelbook, two Banishers signet rings, and the game on the platform of your choice with the Wanderer Set DLC!

name: Battle Snails
summary: Create a snail and join the battle. Take control of the backyard with Battle Snails! Climb walls, hang upside down and move anywhere. Team up with your friends for a tank game unlike any other!

name: Balance The Hat
summary:
Tilt heads and balance hats!
See how long you can keep your hat on, and watch out for bombs!
Lots of playable hats to collect—including a top hat, chicken, boombox, beanie, birdcage, cat, rocking horse, fish bowl, soccer ball, cactus, and many more.

name: Bad Burgers
summary:
Let's get ready to rumble!! It's Food Vs Food!
Bad Town has been over run by Bad Burgers with attitude.
Play as Ninja Burger and rid the town of this madness and become King of the Burgers.
Play your favorite Burger in VS Mode against your friends.

name: Bana Simulator
summary:
A hilarious bullet hell adventure where a Bana (sentient banana) goes on a quest with his friends to defeat the tyrant Shadow Bana and save the world!
Travel the world to collect treasures, build new weapons, vanquish numerous bosses, and more!

name: Bayoen Wars: Daimadou Senryaku Monogatari
summary: Released in Vol 5, Daimadou Senryaku Monogatari is a turn-based strategy game.

name: Bandit Brawler
summary: Robberies, mugging, stealing, picking pockets, and wreaking havoc in a beautiful medieval world - it all waits for you in Bandit Brawler. Follow orders from a magical rooster, pick fights with everyone around, and blow up a couple of patrols. You know, like back in the ol'days.

name: Battle Bows
summary: Grab your bow and rain magical arrows down from your castle tower. Defend the castle heart against increasingly challenging waves of evil balloons and defeat difficult giant bosses in this epic VR tower defense game. Play online co-op mode or solo and climb to the top of the seasonal leaderboards!

name: Ball of Woe
summary: It's bizarre! It's dark! It's colorful! It's cute! It makes you want to brush your teeth! It's.... Ball of Woe!

name: Backrooms Rec.
summary: Dive into the haunting Backrooms, where reality blurs and nightmares lurk. Survive, explore, and uncover dark secrets. Solo-developed, immersive, and coming soon to Steam Early Access. Shape the future. Adventure awaits!

name: Backrooms Abyss
summary: Explore and survive levels based on the popular creepypasta lore. Each level offers various escape routes but also introduces perilous obstacles. Players can immerse themselves in the seemingly boundless and unsettling levels of the backrooms, experiencing the game's eerie and intricate mazes.

name: Battle Store
summary: Battle store - IDLE game where you take management of a small street food point under your control. Watch your employee work, gain money and upgrade your store!

name: Backpack Battles
summary: The inventory management auto battler! Buy rare and legendary items to build powerful setups. Then battle other players with it.

name: Battlefield Waltz
summary: Battlefield Waltz tells the story of village girl Ran, who obtained massive power from a cursed magic sword after losing her parents and hometown. She ended up at an ultranationalistic military school known as Nirvana. It was a unique school, a country in its own right gathering boys and girls that excelled in combat.

name: Barely Working
summary: Try to get your work done while being the office slut.

name: Backdoors
summary: Enter the twisted realm of the Backrooms. Explore 100 procedurally generated rooms, and survive with up to three friends in intense co-op action. Unravel the secrets, beware of lurking entities. Find the way out or become lost forever in the depths of the Backrooms.

name: Balance Board
summary:
Hello. How's your balance...
Touch either side of screen to rotate the platform board, keep the ball from falling off. Double Tap and hold for faster rotations.
Hit the star coins with the ball to score points, get highest points then pat yourself on the back.. Congrats champ !

name: BathDoom
summary:
A Doom II mod of a fashionable bathroom. GZDoom recommended to play.

It is 2149. You are in the middle of killing demons when you remember your house on Deimos still needs its bathroom remodeled. The task is perilous, as one wrong move will send the upper floor into the depths of Hell. Be prepared...for BATHDOOM.

name: Batman: Arkham Trilogy
summary:
A bundle including the three main entries of the Batman: Arkham series: Batman: Arkham Asylum, Batman: Arkham City, and Batman: Arkham Knight.

It includes all previously released DLCs.

name: Bakeru
summary: A 3D action game starring taiko drum-wielding tanuki boy Bakeru, who assumes the form of a human, going on a journey to save Japan from the clutches of a festival army led by the notorious Oracle Saitaro.

name: Barcode Kingdom
summary:
Scan barcodes, Get unique units and items!
Build your own kingdom.
The world named 'Barcodia' is comprised of the magical power of barcodes.
Barcodes in the real world is a magic circle that transmit the magical power from the real world to 'Barcodia'.
The barcodes around you will become your army.
Summon various units and items, and make the strongest army.
Share good barcodes and fight against the monsters with your friends.

name: Basalt Breaker
summary: Basalt Breaker is a fresh, 3rd person, isometric take on a beloved puzzle game. Explore classic rooms, perfect your skills on replay-able daily puzzles, or try uniquely shaped custom floors. The perfect comfort game to play while queuing for a match or sitting through a tedious meeting.

name: Bad Boro
summary: Ever imagine a Souls-like set in an early 2000’s cartoon world? Well, look no further: Explore the cartoony & dystopian city of Badlerboro with its unique districts, wacky citizens, and unforgiving enemies.

name: Baby Shark: Sing & Swim Party
summary: Swim across the wide ocean with the Shark Family to enjoy the Fin-tastic Festival. Choose from five customizable characters and play either in the runner or rhythmic game mode. Sing and swim to fin-omenal songs and get rewarded with tons of musical cards to add to your album.

name: Basketball Simulator
summary:
See if you have what it takes to lead a basketball team to glory by testing out your coaching skills with Geeked-Out Basketball!
Use your knowledge of strategy and tactics to get your players performing on the court, while also keeping the locker room on your side and building chemistry within your team.
Your dreams of becoming a top basketball coach have never been closer to reality. All you need is right at your fingertips.

name: Backdraft
summary: Backdraft is a deckbuilding adventure that transports you to the magical world of Arcadia. Defy monstrous adversaries, wield the raw power of your cards, and carve out a legacy amidst a relentless battle for survival.

name: BabyRace
summary: 《Baby Race》is a multiplayer casual game. Players will compete with other players on the same stage, competing in various modes such as parkour, survival, racing, and bomber etc. Eventually, they will continue to compete in rounds of battles until only one player is left to win the game.

name: Bail or Jail: Character DLC Bundle 2
summary: Sharlie, the feline shop clerk in-training, and Lulu, the chaos-loving poltergeist, are here! This DLC contains the following: • Sharlie • Coffin Lantern • Lulu

name: Battle 3D: Zombie Edition
summary: Military strategy game with zombies. Handle your units from above or handle the unit you want individually. Edit your own missions by adding units wherever you want.

name: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures
summary: Design every room with your own style. Meet my BFFs and puppies! Join us for a bunch of fun activities: baking, dancing or epic pool parties! Plus, dress me and my friends up in fashion-forward looks to get picture ready! Follow us on exciting adventures in the Dreamhouse where anything is possible!

name: Bad Rats Revenge
summary: Bad Rats is a physics puzzle game where rats finally get their bloody revenge on their new prisoners: The cats. Come up with creative solutions for each puzzle using physics, functional objects, and your specially trained Rats

name: Barbarossa Remake
summary: A Fantasy Top Down level based game that features around a little mage that has special abilities

name: Balance The Stick
summary: stick

name: Battle Support: Ultimate Edition
summary: The three factions fight for the entire area, build your own army and your two opponents to compete for the area and seize the enemy's supplies You can manage the supplies and troops in your own area Use vehicles and military technology to support your troops and obtain victory.

name: Battle Support: Deluxe Edition
summary: The three factions fight for the entire area, build your own army and your two opponents to compete for the area and seize the enemy's supplies You can manage the supplies and troops in your own area Use vehicles and military technology to support your troops and obtain victory.

name: Banana Cat Jump
summary:
Save Banana Cat.
Banana Cat keeps crying and needs saving. Jump to get to the top and make Banana Cat happy.

name: Backyard Rain Soundscape
summary: Nature soundscape audio. Seamless loop for background listening.

name: Battle-X
summary: Battle-X is an indie fighting game available on Xbox 360's Indie Games store.

name: Bad Roads
summary: Go as far as possible with your shipment.

name: Babe Balloon Blast
summary: Players need to fire bullets from the turret below the screen to hit the balloon in the screen. Eliminate all balloons. In the middle of the screen, there will be fish swimming to resist bullets. If a player's bullet comes into contact with a fish, their health will decrease.

name: Battlepopes
summary: Battlepopes is a multiplayer online 2D MOBA in a sidescrolling arena, featuring cooldown-based combat. Stuck in hell forever, as punishment for their wicked lives, ancient Popes and Antipopes fight in the eternal inferno. Come rot.

name: Baron of Shell
summary: Baron of Shell is an expert-difficulty Kaizo hack of Super Mario World focused on shell physics.

name: Backrooms Cycle
summary: Backrooms Cycle is an immersive exploration FPS horror set in the backrooms. You will explore and scavenge, build up your arsenal and gain powerful perks. Every time you begin a new cycle, you will meet new threats and opportunities in a procedurally generated world.

name: Baby Shaker
summary:
Baby Shaker was a controversial iOS game released on April 20th, 2009, where you shake your iPhone to stop a crying infant until two X marks appear on their eyes.

The game was pulled from the App Store two days later, after it was noticed by the review site KRAPPS and later picked up by other news sources and non-governmental organizations related to Shaken Baby Syndrome who were outraged, with a spokesperson from Apple stating that "this application was deeply offensive and should not have been approved for distribution on the App Store".

name: Back to Basics
summary:
After making a large map with slopes, scripts, all new resources and whatnot, I felt like making something very basic.

Also used this opportunity to get some maps that were gathering dust finished and released; a very old episode 2 project (although I have released e2m1 of that project before as e2m1er.wad), and a project for EDGE that got to 1½ levels (Rust). The maps were converted to use vanilla resources only (except for the sky).

E2M5-E2M9 however are brand new levels for this release. The wad is tested to be vanilla compatible, though during mapping it has mainly been tested with ZDoom for convenience's sake. Also found to work with Eternity. But as it is vanilla compatible, any port should work.

name: Bam Boost
summary:
Bump other players and try to be the first of this epic run !
You won't want to leave this pixel environment which is full of crazy characters.

name: Bambie
summary: Enjoy an approachable erotic simulator that boasts immersive character physics and supports on-the-fly changes. Gameplay is quick to pick up and hard to put down. Get up close and personal as you configure your Bambie doll into the perfect positions for a fashion-tastical climax!

name: Baby Adventure
summary: Baby adventure is a nice and funny platformer 2d game.

name: Base Ganymede: Complete
summary: A 3 episode vanilla megawad for Doom 1 containing a total of 27 maps. Set on one of Jupiter's moons called Ganymede, this wad should provide a challenge for a wide variety of skill levels ranging from the humble newbie to veteran speedrunner. Each episode has it's own progression rather than the usual base -> hellbase -> hell.

name: Baskin-Robbins: Enter the Flavour-Verse
summary: Baskin-Robbins: Enter the Flavour-Verse was a web game based on the movie Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse. The game was made as a part of Australia's promotional campaign for the movie.

name: Bacterial Takeover - Idle game
summary:
The most unique and addictive of the idle clicker games is here!
Become tycoon of deadly bacteria and take over the Universe. This idle clicker game will take you on a new space journey. Expand and grow big numbers of bacteria with enchantments in idle production and rare minerals. Take on the challenge and discover the best gameplay and idle strategy to destroy as many planets as possible!

name: Baunsudaun
summary:
See how long you can survive in Baunsudaun and compete for your personal best score.

In Baunsudaun you control 'Blob' by moving him left or right. There are 7 different types of platforms that will spawn all with different effects. Your goal is to avoid the spikes on the ceiling, and avoid touching the fire at the bottom by trying to use the platforms to keep Blob alive as long as possible. While all this is going on, the lines will continually move faster making it more difficult the higher your score gets.

name: Backrooms Doors
summary: Backrooms Doors - This is an atmospheric first-person horror game. Explore spaces that can't exist in the real world and find your way out before the entities find you.

name: Battle Craft
summary: Battle Craft is a real-time online strategy game with unique heroes, settlement development, and conquering other players online. Strategically place defenses, level up heroes. Experience the one-of-a-kind realistic physics in epic battles on the Steam platform!

name: Balloons
summary: Balloons is a single-player 2D racing game with roguelite elements. You can play as different emotive head balloons, breathe to gain lift, and enjoy fun and challenging tracks. The game has random map generation, different skill combinations. Win by reaching the finish line first.

name: Badlands Crew
summary: Create, customize and command your battle wagon to conquer crazed enemy factions and save innocent survivors scattered throughout the lawless Badlands in the aftermath of a devastating apocalypse. Do you have what it takes to Build, Evolve and Fight to survive?

name: Bad Egg
summary: One little egg vs an army of zombie chickens! Get to the chopper or you're clucked. A free-range frenzy of arcade action from the yolked-up eggheads behind Shell Shockers.

name: Ball-istic
summary: The goal is simple, get fast. Every level can be completed in thousands of different ways, but only 1 is the fastest. Your first try might be slow, but by your 10th try you'll be flying through the level at insane speeds. The more levels you complete the easier finding the fastest paths will become.

name: Backrooms Exploration Liminal
summary: Dive into a retro liminal space, adventure. Explore the enigmatic Backrooms, freely navigate eerie corridors, and unveil secrets of this liminal realm through immersive storytelling. Experience haunting gameplay with atmospheric audio, and captivating scenery!

name: Back to Home
summary: Back To Home is a short adventure where you explore a beautiful world and solve puzzles Throughoutthe journey, you will uncover an interesting story about the past of the main character.

name: Backswamp
summary: Survive the flood aftermath alone. Secure food and water, use debris for survival, Explore the reef when tides recede, find resources,and mind your backpack and seawater conditions. Craft tools, avoid creatures, and advance technology to escape. You are your only hope.

name: Ball King Jam
summary: Join with friend or play solo against enemies in this silly physics-based take on basketball. Use trampolines, boosts or catch pigeons to help you win the game. Visit fun locations like pirate ship or stick to the cool street courts and show of your dunking skills!

name: Battlecore Robots
summary: Customize your own mech: Use swords, bombs and all kind of weapons to defeat your oponents in frenetic battles with unique abilities! Play up to 4 players locally or online with Steam Remote Play. Enter the Battlecore arena!

name: Barbie as the Island Princess
summary: Nintendo DS port of Barbie as the Island Princess.

name: Barbie as the Island Princess
summary: GBA port of Barbie as the Island Princess.

name: Barbie: Groom and Glam Pups
summary: Nintendo DS port of Barbie: Groom and Glam Pups.

name: Basics In Intermediate Filmmaking
summary: Basics In Intermediate Filmmaking is a pre-apocalyptic puzzle horror. You explore an abandonded power plant in order to document what happened to the infamous Fortitude Electric power company. Use your camera to solve different puzzles around the facility, and try to survive.

name: Bankwave: Neon Networth
summary: Inspired by cyberpunk and synthwave influences, Bankwave: Neon Networth is a narrative-based customer-service simulation with escape room elements. The game features dozens of quirky characters, multiple endings, and an immersive paperwork simulation.

name: Bandit Knight
summary: Step into the boots of a master thief in Bandit Knight! Outsmart enemies, steal legendary treasures, and navigate a vibrant 2.5D pixel world. Customize your tools, unlock upgrades, and rise to become the ultimate King of Thieves!

name: Baro Kart
summary: Help Baro and his friends to save the universe from the evil witch doctor, race is the main challenge, and you are the savior.

name: Bare Knuckle Sandwich
summary: Bare Knuckle Sandwich is a 2D fighting game with side-scrolling exploration and a character-driven narrative. BKS tells the story of a young, directionless guy, Gunner, who joins an underground bare-knuckle boxing ring.

name: Battle for the Board
summary: Adventure through a colorful tabletop-themed world, strategically rolling special moves and attacks to defeat enemy pieces in this turn-based action strategy game!

name: Battle Tea
summary: Battle Tea is a simple yet competitive word game where you fight against your friends until there's only one man standing. Play up to 8 players, or find people to play online. Are you tea master you may think your are?

name: Basemental Drugs
summary: Basemental Drugs is a collection of functional drugs for The Sims 4. It features custom drugs, custom animations, altered walkstyles, altered moods, altered needs, come-ups, peaks, comedowns, hangovers, addiction, rehabilitation, and loads more.

name: Basemental Gangs
summary: Basemental Gangs is a mod for The Sims 4 that add gangs to the game. It features rivalries between gangs, micromanaging your own gang members, use gang members as drug runners, run your operations through your own gang headquarters, exclusive new opportunities from your right-hand man, and much, much more.

name: Baja or Bust
summary:
From the makers of Motocross Elite comes a whole new game, Baja or Bust—inspired by Mountain Dew Baja Blast, a legendary DEW flavor at Taco Bell that’s finally available in stores, this summer only!
Race through 12 worlds of amazing environments en route to the ultimate destination: Baja. Get on the podium, complete tricks and finish worlds to earn points!

name: Battle of Tarlis
summary: "Battle of Tarlis" is game where you explore many areas to get the best gear or highest level to defeat bosses or survive the hardest zones!

name: Battery Hunter
summary: "Battery Hunter" is a 2D pixel-art style linear level game where player must ensure their ability to defeat the final boss.

name: Ballistic Showdown
summary: Prepare for an epic ball arena battle in Ballistic Showdown! master powerful moves, and compete against players from around the world. Get ready to dodge, shoot, and score your way to victory in this ultimate ball game. Play now and become the ultimate champion!

name: Bad Student Driver: Swing Ride
summary:
Are you the best worst student driver? Can you earn your license? The Bad Student Driver returns with Swing Ride!
Drive your car as far as you can down the road, avoiding the traffic cones, wild animals, and the curb as you veer to the right, then to the left, and back again. Does your car badly need a front-end alignment, or are you just that bad of a driver? We're not sure, but the results are hilarious!

name: Barbie Girl
summary:
Barbie Girl is a single, limit-removing complevel 2 (doom (strict)) map for DOOM 2.
This was made in response to a Doomworld post that nobody should ever use a MIDI of the pop song "Barbie Girl" by Aqua in a Doom map.

name: Banners of Ruin: Iris
summary: Summon spirits that augment your party with the haunted fox, Iris!

name: Battleship Lonewolf
summary:
Flight through space, command your ship, and wage epic war in galaxy.
Five star space tower defense shooter!

name: Balance
summary: Do you have feel of balance? Try and you will see....

name: Bauhaus
summary: Four medium sized maps in the style of Bauhaus-art.

name: Baker's Dozen
summary:
13 levels for any limit removing port

Map01 was made for First Demo Contest on iddqd.ru

Maps 2, 3, 11 and 13 are from Speed Map Contest on iddqd.ru. Each of them is made within 4 hours. Yeah, map13 too. Do you believe it?

Maps 7, 9 and 12 were made for Plutonia2 and were rejected. Map07 is retextured.

name: Banmeng Yexing: A Journey on Limbus
Ball Master Up!
summary: Ball Master Up! is an addictive arcade game where you play as a small ball and compete against time and your skills. Your goal is to eat as many bubbles as possible to get the maximum score.

name: Bald Man Climbs Up
summary: A bald man with a unique weapon attempts to get as high as possible

name: Barbie Fashion Show: Eye for Style
summary: Design fashion shows to help Barbie get ready for Fashion Week in Paris

name: Barbie Magical Fashion
summary: Barbie Magical Fashion lets players design their very own Barbie, mixing and matches different outfits, hairstyles, tiaras, makeup patterns, accessories, wings, mermaid tails, and more. Players can transform avatars into princesses, mermaids, fairies, or even create a unicorn. Each step is simple and uses touch mechanics to let players choose and customize. There is a special gift box minigame for each character, where if the player discovers and opens the magical gift box in the correct customization step, they will unlock its reward for all characters.

name: Battle Slugs
summary:
Playing Battle Slugs, you take command of a well-trained army of the finest slugs, either green angelic slugs or red devilish slugs (you can decide which, based on what you did last night).
Slug it out across a variety of hexagon-celled playing fields, each with its own sweet spots and bottlenecks, using strategy to claim the most territory and conquer the field. The game includes colorful cartoony graphics, plus changing backgrounds and custom soundtrack music.
Your progress is saved and sent to the Game Center high scores list.
Take on a friend or go up against the cold logic of the CPU on one of three levels of difficulty.

name: Barbie Superstar! Music Maker
summary: Join Barbie and her musical friends on a concert tour through Barbie’s world! At every location, you can express yourself through music by creating amazing music videos while wearing awesome outfits! You can even join the show with your own dancing and singing skills using your device camera and microphone! You’ll be a superstar in no time! Let’s rock!

name: Barbie: Dreamtopia - Magical Hair
summary:
Join Barbie and her younger sister Chelsea as they welcome you to Endless Hair Kingdom!

With Barbie as your mentor, use your imagination and creativity to design magical hairstyles. Play with whimsical hair accessories to wash, cut, brush, style and color! Rinse and repeat to express yourself and bring inspiration to Wispy Forest and its princesses.

name: Barbie Color Creations
summary: Join “Brooklyn” and “Malibu” on a colorful adventure in painting, sketching, designing and more! Explore an ever expanding bedroom of coloring books, tools, designs, locations and items. Bring Barbie’s memories to life with creative design challenges. Embark on a creative journey by customizing items and characters from your favorite Barbie movies and series, then save your designs as stickers and play with them in 2D locations. Earn unique rewards for completing design stories, and use them to decorate your personal studio. Download any drawing as an image to your device, so you can show it off to your friends and family.

name: Balloo's Mall
summary: Balloo's Mall - single-player horror game created by indie developer. Complete the puzzles and tasks to find out your friend who worked in the mall.

name: Balls of Glory Pinball
summary:
Your favorite hit TV shows - Family Guy, American Dad!, Bob's Burgers, and Archer - come together in the Balls of Glory pinball pack!

Each official pinball table contains over 15 exciting and hilarious modes based on fan favorite characters and episodes.

name: Bahamut2-Come on, Fight
summary: Roguelike combat mode, every battle is a new start, choose your favorite transfer route, learn new skills, face different enemies, and challenge the invincible devil. Bahamut 2-Bride of the Dragon parallel time and space, what different stories will there be?

name: Barbie PC Fashion Design & Color
summary:
Introducing a whole new world of fun!

Now, you can enhance your child's creative potential with the new Barbie PC Fashion Design & Color! It's an explosion of fashion, color, and fun!

This menu-driven software program lets your child select, then color Barbie fashions. Thousands of combinations to choose from for hours of fun. Available for IBM or IBM-compatible PCs in 3½ inch and 5¼ inch Disk versions.

name: Baphomet's Satellite
summary: Baphomet's Satellite (Important: play with complevel 11) is an adventure map in outer space. You'll have to explore and traverse some kind of space station built entirely from Hell's corrupted reality! Manage your ammo carefully and explore as much as you can. You can always turn around and look for supplies before engaging with the demons.

name: Balance Balls
summary: Use the right and left arrows to balance the red ball. How long can you survive?

name: Balance Balls 2
summary: Balance the red ball for as long as you can. Now with power-ups!

name: Ball O
summary:
Ball O is a fresh and unique physical collision game.
Classic LCD minimalistic style with wood and metal sound.
Ball O only need one tap to play.It is easy to learn, hard to master.Shooting balls is easy, find good angle is hard.Maybe need some luck too.

name: Battletoads
summary:
Genesis/Mega Drive port of Battletoads.

Battletoads are here to fight aliens form other words. Get into the battle with the most baddest toads on the planet! These toads are here to kick some rear end and chew gum...and they are all out of chewing gum. The aliens are attempting to invade the planet and all that stands in their way are these mutant toads. Battle aliens through intense and challenging levels. Shoot the invaders as quick as you can.

name: Ball Out
summary: Link 7 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. provides souls in balls for the player to rebirth. The research log indicates that the physical properties of the disc may not be completely inert.

name: Baker Business 3: Halloween Pack
summary: Invoke the Halloween spirit and invite autumn into your bakery. Bake spooky recipes, decorate your bakery for the season, hand out candy to your customers and spend tickets in the Halloween shop!

name: Bashtronaut
summary: Suit up, Bashtronaut, there’s been another invasion! Grab the nearest blunted weapon you can find and clock into this hack-and-bash adventure where you play as a seemingly ordinary exterminator in an extraordinary setting.

name: Baseball Club
summary: Baseball club is finally here! Pitcher-batter duels, cool items and upgrades to unlock, and most importantly - intuitive and engaging gameplay - this is the quick baseball game you’ve been waiting for!

name: Baker Business 3: Christmas Pack
summary: Bring Christmas cheer and a cozy winter vibe to your bakery this holiday season. Bake festive recipes, decorate your bakery for the holidays, hand out candy canes and receive gifts from your customers!

name: Bareback Reincarnation: It's Just That Easy to Brave a Different World
summary: The protagonist, a weary corporate slave, found himself unexpectedly transported to an Isekai during overtime work. Embark on an exciting adventure as a wandering traveler in this fantasy realm, wielding the powers of a "Demonoid" to conquer the hearts of the girls.

name: BattleLand: Warrior vs. Monster
summary: Challenge global players in Arena. Keep a close watch on your avengers. Start game with 10 classes, 20 roles, 40 skills and 500+ equipments.

name: Back & Forth 2
summary: Back & Forth 2 is fresher, leaner & meaner. And the best part, now you can play for free until your obsession takes over.

name: Baldi's Farm!
summary: Your friend wants to eat some corn, so he kicks you out to buy corn, but you don't have enough money on you, when Baldi finds you and he wants to invite you to his farm! It would be better if there was corn, and I believe you will definitely have fun on the farm!

name: Bars of Black and White
summary:
You can't remember the last time you left your room. When you receive a barcode reader in the mail, you discover that the world around you is not what it seems, and must escape the bars of black and white.

"Bars of Black and White" is a game in the room-escape tradition with hand-drawn line art graphics and novel barcode-scanning action. Is the world insane, or is it you?

name: Backrooms: Run For Your Life!
summary: This is a Backrooms game created by fans. In this game, the main experience is the "Level!" in Backroom(or "Run For Your Life").

name: Bananarang: The Scattered Shards
summary: The coolest, weirdest, wackiest and most fun 2D platforming game you'll ever play!

name: Battle Records of Rota
summary: Battle Records of Rota is a straightforward action shooting RPG game, mainly for players who like anime and action shooting games. Players will play Luota, a girl warrior, to help the little prince defeat the witch and regain the throne.

name: Bandido
summary:
Mobile adaptation of the cardgame.
A light-security prisoner is trying to escape through tunnels starting underneath his cell. Will you be able to join forces and cards to stop him? Bandido is a cooperative game of strategy and observation for the entire family.

name: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden - Red Echoes Edition
summary: The Red Echoes Edition of Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden contains: an ancient, leather-effect notebook illustrated with Red's memories, an ink writing set, the game on the platform of your choice and the Wanderer Set DLC!

name: Bahamut and the Waqwaq Tree
summary: Discover a once-thriving ocean, now tainted by enigmatic dark forces. Your quest: decipher the mystery and rekindle the ocean's radiant light.

name: Battle for Treasure
summary: How many secrets and dangers lie in the vast expanses of the oceans and seas! In just one look at the immense waves, a spark of a thirst for adventure, a desire for wealth and fame is hidden in the very soul of every Viking.

name: Battle Stations Blockade
summary: Arm the turrets and take aim as you take command of a gunboat in dangerous waters! Battle Stations Blockade is an intense 3D rail shooter presented in voxel style.

name: Backrooms: Infinite Halls
summary: Backrooms: Infinite Halls is a game about investigating and researching the Backrooms, going deeper and deeper down these unending spaces, roaming their halls and avoiding their horrors.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Curse
summary: Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Curse was the cancelled Game Boy Color incarnation of what would eventually become Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Revenge.

name: Bar Oasis 2
summary: Enjoy the continued story of Bar Oasis in the visual novel styled story mode as Vic returns from Hong Kong in pursuit of his love interest, only to find that Boss had left everything to a rookie girl and did a runner on the job and left the bar to a new girl, Carla. As Vic tries to undo the damages that the bar suffered during his absence, more people join the ranks of regulars at Bar Oasis.

name: Bancroft Academy
summary: "Bancroft Academy" plunges you into the vibrant and unpredictable world of college life, with an enchanting twist. In this adult visual novel, every choice you make shapes the narrative, leading you down thrilling paths of romance, mystery, and magic.

name: Background Memory
summary: A playable music video featuring Hatsune Miku. Second in the series.

name: Backrooms: The Phobolore
summary: Backrooms: The Phobolore is a cooperative multiplayer online horror game for 1-4 players. In this game you will take control of a character who woke up in an unknown place and does not remember anything, your task will be to pass the game levels trying to remember who you are...

name: Balloon Chase Journey
summary: A cute art style, 2D scroll casual action adventure game, you need to play animals flying in the air on a balloon, fight and trample the balloons of others to win. You will see diverse natural scenery, face unknown challenges, start a joyous adventure, bring back the balloon fight fun of childhood.

name: Battle Leet
summary: Dive into Battle Leet - a 3D PvP arena where skill & strategy reign. Customize your Leet, earn rewards, and dominate in NFT-fueled battles. Be the ultimate gamer in this digital showdown.

name: Barbarian Saga: The Beastmaster
summary: A classic hand-drawn 2D Metroidvania action game, it's time for revenge! Use your Beastmaster skills to unleash your inner beast, fight with your heart-devouring sword and end the threat to Arborea, you decide the ending.

name: Battle Cross Fever
summary: Prepare yourself for this brand-new age of fighting game with never-before-seen mechanics!

name: Baby Climbing
summary: baby climbing is a 3d third person game where you control a baby in a dream where you have to climb platforms in order to reach the end. climb the platforms and complete the mission without falling and overcoming the obstacles

name: Bang Bang Simulations
summary: Players play the role of an amnesia "exile", looking for their own past in the end of the world. Gradually awaken your ability in the battle, collect and upgrade all kinds of powerful weapons to defeat the enemy blocking the way!

name: BastogneBreakout
summary: Hex, Counter and Card simlation of the battles around Bastogne during the Battle of the Bulge in 1944. You play against yourself or play as Germans against Allied AI. Units are regiments, battalions and kampfgruppen. New Supply procedures make the Germans keep an eye out on the road network.

name: Batora: Lost Haven - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Batora: Lost Haven - Digital Deluxe Edition Includes:

Batora: Lost Haven - Full Game
Batora: Lost Haven - Original Soundtrack
Batora: Lost Haven - Digital Artbook

name: Battlegrounds: At Enemy Gates
summary: BattleGrounds : At enemy gates is a quick to learn tag of war strategy game. Deploy tanks & planes in this strategy-focused war game. Receive donations from your allies worldwide to aid your battles. Combine the best war vehicles and come up with the best battle formations to overwhelm your enemies.

name: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story
summary: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story is a crafting RPG set in the whimsical world of Bandle City. After a party goes wrong, the portals that connect your home collapse and throw everything into chaos! Using your knitting magic and backpack house, restore the portals to reunite Bandle City.

name: BazookaCat
summary: simple 2d shooter game for playdate

name: BattleCross
summary: Unique fast-paced card battle where each players takes turn controlling the shuttlecock's position and speed with cards, until one side fail to receive. The basic concept of the card battle is simple enough to understand without prior badminton knowledge, but deep enough to provide challenge for anyone who loves CCG and deck building card games.

name: BadukPop
summary: Learn the rules of the ancient Chinese board game Go - also known as Baduk or Weiqi - with a fun, interactive tutorial. Sharpen your Go skills with daily random Go problems (Tsumego) at your choice of difficulty level. Play games online or with a variety of AI opponents, each with its own unique playing style and strength.

name: Battle of Rebels
summary: Fight off waves of zombies in this a single-player or multiplayer cross platform first- and third-person shooter game. Battle of Rebels Winner of the Unreal Florida Game Competition

name: Bad Dreams: Free Dive
summary: Bad Dreams is a Solo VR Horror game with immersive gameplay based on real gesture. A unique experience, where nightmares become reality.Fight, Run, Jump, Wipe your eyes, Cover your ears... while avoiding the game's traps and puzzles, you won't come out unscathed!

name: Basilisk
summary: Shmup. Unlock. Customise. Experiment. Upgrade. Basilisk. Petrify. Easy.

name: Back to Reality
summary: Oh no, this poor boy is trapped in a mobile game ad. Unfortunately, he's also completely incompetent. So please help him not to die. And to earn a living. Sounds awesome, right? Right? Now who is actually trapped here? Him or you?!

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Magic Eggs
summary: A mod that implements new eggs mechanics.

name: Badventure
summary: Badventure is a kooky player-directed RPG, like DnD but tastier and more unhealthy. One player will become the dungeon master, creating rooms with obstacles, enemies, and traps. The rest of the players band together as a party of adventurers to overcome the challenges set for them. Huzzah!

name: Baby Shark
summary: Play exciting games with the Baby Shark family.

name: Battleship
summary: A modern Naval warfare game.

name: BattleSide
summary: BattleSide is a 5,000 player MMOFPS persistent Land, Sea, Air, and Space war game where you and your buddies defend and capture control points to gather resources for your faction in battles of endless fun.

name: Balvenie's Birthday Party
summary: Balvenie's subjects are preparing a party for her birthday, you must help her getting ready for it.

name: Balling Up
summary: Immerse yourself in a colorful journey through universes that does not forgive any mistakes. Jump well in the ball parkour game, where falling can cost you everything!

name: Bayern Munich Club Football
summary:
Club Football is a soccer series designed to re-create the individual team experience. A total of 17 games released in the Club Football series are tailored to the specific European teams on which they are based, including character facial mapping from each of the 22 position players on the roster.

Each game features bespoke content - including media archive clips of great goals and famous victories - and allows fans to add themselves to the 2003/04 starting line-up of their favourite side.

name: Bayern Munich Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Battle Sea
summary: Captain, it's your time to shine! Rule the seas in Battle Sea – a new version of the classic game 'Battleship'!

name: Balance the Bottle
summary:
Lift the bottle from below with your finger and see how long you can balance it.
Use randomly collected stars to buy presents and unlock more fun things to balance – like a kitty, a volcano and even… a magic hat!

name: Battle for the Sphere of Chaos
summary: This wad has 4 levels including a hub. The action takes place in parallel world of Hexen, where instead of Korax, world Cronos was attacked by D'Sparil and with the help of his army brought the chaos and destruction to this world. The task of heroes - crush the D'Sparil and destroy the Sphere of Chaos, which he uses to control his troops.

name: Battle of Genesis
summary: This is a Idle RPG game, you are a hero born in the chaotic world, in order to save the world, you fight against the evil forces to the end, at this moment there are other chaotic heroes have been born. Who can save the world? Who can have the most beautiful goddess in the world?

name: Battle of Words
summary: Battle of Words is a Taboo game, or in another words simple, addictive, incredibly funny word guessing party game.

name: Basketball Grand Slam 2024
summary: "Basketball Grand Slam 2024" is a real-time basketball competitive game. The game uses real-time synchronization technology to ensure fair competition among players. Smooth operation, smooth touch, and real dynamic capture system create a 3D basketball world. Welcome to your Basketball world!

name: Balloon Trip
summary:
You're floating high above the majestic ocean, held aloft by balloons as you gaze your surroundings. But this is no ordinary, leisurely flight! Your goal in Balloon Trip is to collect as many balloons as possible, all the while avoiding electric sparks that will pop your balloons and bring a tragic end to your journey! And if the sparks didn't provide enough danger for you, the water below is also treacherous, full of aggressive fish that will leap into the air to pull you into the murky depths below! So be sure you keep an adequate distance between you and the water, as you don't want to become fish food!

Balloon Trip is a one player game using a joystick plugged into the left controller jack. Pressing the fire button allows you to flap upwards. You'll need to press the button repeatedly in order to ascend. Pressing either left or right on the joystick will allow you to flap towards the respective direction

name: Baby Time Simulator
summary: Escape the busy daily grind and become a baby again! The ultimate game for recapturing the pure joy of babyhood that everyone has forgotten.

name: Baby Frogs
summary: Baby Frogs are cute curious creatures and love to hop, crawl & jump around but there is danger to them everywhere. Your job is to keep each frog safe, where you can see them and from dangers of hungry fish, attacks from birds of prey and just getting stuck in mud. These and many more dangers can take your baby frogs from you. Dragonflies can distract you from your task. Rocks and cattails can steer your frogs into trouble. There are 30 different frogs to discover and more to come. Collect them all!

name: Bad Roads Go
summary:
You need to arm yourself with patience, dexterity and luck to safely climb hills, descend on steep slopes and overcome all the obstacles you encounter on your way.
The goal? Go as far as possible with your shipment. But beware, if you end up dropping all of your boxes, you will only have to return to the starting point.
With different landscapes and its cars ready to unlock, "Bad Roads Go" is a game that will delight all players looking for a casual, fun and original game.

name: Bakufuu Slash! Kizuna Arashi
summary: This Eye Toy game is a bit different from the rest of the pack. Included with the game is a "nail" controller which you place over your favorite finger and use to make commands in the game. Your goal as young Arashi is to bring peace back to the world by defeating an evil king. To do so you'll take on enemies in real time battles where you use the nail controller to trace out patterns on the screen, with more complex patterns leading to more advanced attacks. To help popularize this franchise, SCE is also releasing some non-game related products for this game. A comic will appear in Japan's popular Coro Coro Comics comic book simultaneously with the game's release. Card decks will be released for the game and will have an effect on the gameplay experience. Placing a card in front of the EyeToy will make the game read the card and will give you access to new skills.

name: Bakushou!! Jinsei Kaidoh: Nova Usagi ga Miteru zo!!
summary: Bakusho!! Jinsei Kaido NOVA Usagi ga Miteruzo!! is a Japanese party game for up to four players, licensed by NOVA and the Tong King Show.

name: Baseball Live 2005
summary: Baseball Live 2005 is a Sports game, developed and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Battle Dodgeball 3
summary: Become the "Battle Ball King" in Battle Dodgeball 3, a bonus disc game released only with the Twin Battle Box, a special edition of Great Battle Fullblast, a game in the Compati Hero Series. It was released to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the Great Battle franchise. Like the other Compati Hero Series games, it prominently features characters from popular Japanese tokusatsu live-action shows and mecha anime, including Ultraman, Gundam, and Kamen Rider. The main game is a story mode that tells about a legendary dodgeball ("Battle Ball") tournament. During a time of peace, three mysterious artifacts appear from the ocean and a tournament is announced. The winner will be the one able to gather all of them and be crowned the new Battle Ball King. There is also a Super Battle League Mode, which will pit you against up to 15 different teams, or you can have practice versus matches in the Training Mode.

name: Baryoland
summary: Baryoland is a whimsical rage platformer starring baryo, a cluster of atoms shaped like a cat. He must collect the quarks and avoid the antiquarks.

name: Baby Wild Katzen
summary: Baby wild cats can only be kept in the wild or in the zoo? Until now! With Baby Wildcats, young players can nurture, care for and spoil their very own sweet wildcat on the Nintendo DS. After choosing from eight different species - tiger, lion, panther, cheetah, puma, jaguar, white tiger and lion - players spend the whole day together with their darling: the little wild cat climbs trees, plays with balls of yarn in the garden, it being cuddled or romping around with toys. With the DS microphone, both listen to the radio or exciting bedtime stories. And if the kitten can't fall asleep, the players simply sing him a lullaby. Depending on how trusting it is, it can even learn fun tricks in the fitness room. But the little wildcat also needs attention and affection in other areas: great all-round care with a shower, hair dryer, grooming and of course a wildcat toilet in the bathroom, feeding in the kitchen, choosing suitable clothing, taking care of small ailments or gifts such as a new toy mouse for a birthday and room decorations. Fun with the cute baby wild cats is guaranteed! Features: * The first NDS game with a focus on cute baby wild cats * Nurture, nurture and pamper 8 species * Each wildcat baby develops its own character: from shy to rebellious * 6 environments to customize: from the bathroom to the garden * Use of microphone and stylus: sing lullabies, blow dry, caress... * Fun accessories to play with and dress up * Practice great tricks like somersaults...

name: Bae Yong-joon to Manabu Kankokugo DS: Test-Hen
Bae Yong-joon to Manabu Kankokugo DS: Date-Hen
Battlesmiths: Blade and Forge
summary: Battlesmiths is a role-playing strategy game with a deep crafting system and tactical combat

name: Balloon Fight
summary: The New Wide Screen version of Balloon Fight for the Game and Watch. The game is similar to the NES classic Balloon Fight, particularly its Balloon Trip mode. The model number for the original version is BF-803, while the model number for the New Wide Screen version is BF-107. The BF in the model numbers stands for Balloon Fight.

name: Bardic: Quest for Love
summary: Having just arrived in the great port city of Deepharbor, humble bards Edmond and Edna are suddenly tasked with running a Tavern. Recruit fellow adventuring heroes, manage your tavern, and possibly find romance? This is your Quest for Love!

name: Barbarian
summary: Remake from Atari and Amiga Game to Sega Megadrive

name: Balloon Invasion
summary: You are the commander of the anti-air defense in the area. The enemy is invading from the open sea with enormous battle groups of bomb-armed balloons. Win battles, gain experience, level up and use your commander points to gain access to upgrades and various weapons. The fate of your country is in your hands. Good luck, Commander!

name: Baff Halloween
summary: Minimalist, hardcore, and challenging game in the avoid-em-up genre with a creepy style that will test your reflexes, timing, and planning! This game is as hard as hell!

name: Bane Murrain
summary: Dayne Muren, a nervous wreck of an engineer working on the K.R.E.V research station, is thrown into the midst of a biohazard bloodbath when a meteorite collision turns his crewmembers into mutated creatures.

name: Ball Breaker
summary: Crie combinações malucas e esmague todos os insetos atirando bolas com vários efeitos e aprimorando seus poderes. Sobreviva o máximo que puder e faça as combinações mais selvagens que puder. A cada rodada, você fica mais forte, mas os inimigos também...

name: BassDuel
summary: BassDuel 2.0 is a two player fishing game. Two anglers fish simultaneously from the same boat, just like the real thing. There are loads of customization options with lots of roads, baits, and colours to choose from. Heavy simulation mechanics make this a deep fishing game.

name: Banana Sbang
summary: Banana Sbang is a LCD game from VTech's Time & Fun Series created in 1981.

name: Bastion of the Underworld
summary: Q3stone/metal styled fortress of epic scale, with a few new monsters in lots of horde combat (about 300 monsters in total) and othe custom gameplay additions.

name: Bad Dark Cistern
summary: Medium-sized brick/cistern-themed level for single player and deathmatch, based on Quake's stock levels DM5 and DM6, with an underwater DM4 below. The GPL map source is included.

name: BAM
summary:
Step into the thrilling world of BAM, the ultimate multiplayer battle game designed for mixed reality (MR). Whether you’re a seasoned gamer or new to the virtual realm, BAM offers a unique and captivating experience that transcends boundaries.

In BAM, you wield unprecedented control over your battlefield. Set up the tabletop arena anywhere you want, and adjust its scale and rotation. Then take charge of your miniature robot puppeteer-style.

Engage in an adrenaline-pumping fast-paced boxing match. Fire up your jetpack to take the battle up in the air. Collect power-ups to gain special powers, including an innovative “point-to-action” mechanic, offering a fresh perspective on third-person shooting in MR.

BAMs colorful, vibrant arenas pop in every room and are the stage for different game modes. Seize the crown, lose the bomb, or punch your opponents out of the field. Easy-to-master controls and stunning visuals redefine MR gaming, making BAM a must-play experience for all ages.

Play against AI-bots, or challenge other players all around the world. BAM guarantees instant fun and excitement. Competing against friends in the same room makes BAM the perfect party game.

Dive into the future of MR gaming. Enter the electrifying world of BAM.

name: Backstab
summary: Players will play as samurai who have been sent to a mysterious island, adventure with other NPCs who have been teleported here, and experience backstabbing together, and former enemies may become allies, and eventually everyone's beliefs will be unified, and a new "Kingdom of Faith" will be born.

name: Bad Boy's Bad Day
summary: 3D beat 'em up featuring stylized graphics, an extensive movelist, and free flowing combos.

name: Bad Guys Good Boys
summary: Follow the life of a ringleader of an evil organization who wants to change his evil ways and become good. In an attempt to change his organization, he has to teach and convince his henchmen to get rid of their evil habits and encourage them to do good deed.

name: Baito Fight
summary:
From the makers of HANA, comes a life sim JRPG for Playdate and PC about living in an apartment complex that's infested with monsters.

Use your sick baseball skills to exterminate monsters from your neighbors' apartments as a part-time devil hunter!!

Save up money for convenience store runs, and to pay off your overdue rent!!

CRANK to use the elevator and baseball bat!!

name: Barbican Of Hell
summary: Small runic level. The map source is included.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Cut-Throat Coast
summary: A nautical-themed Banjo-Kazooie ROM hack that takes place in a gloomy seaside town.

name: Badpak
summary: Small episode with 4 maps of medium size, each with a different texture theme (Base, Metal, Wizard) and a few custom monsters, namely grenade Grunts, nail and rocket Enforcers, and a buggy, poorly executed and out-of-place nail goblin (or something). There is hardly any information in the text file; apparently, the pack was released in an unfinished state, hence the ugly console image and the lack of a boss map. However, the four featured maps are very nice.

name: Babes Reloaded
summary: Babes Reloaded is a reasonably fast-paced romp through a Babeland resort and a WSYC facility

name: Back in Business
summary: An entirely new episode of 4 levels with various themes: city/casino, nature/industrial, snowy/hi-tech and prison/nature. Each level has a strong mission objective to complete.

name: Battlethorne
summary: Battlethorne is a third person Conquest game with rpg elements and large scale battles.Conquer bases in a large open world, gaining loot and vanquishing your foes. Fight against multiple factions in a four way war across a 4.5 km2 open world using six unique weapon classes.

name: Bad Mineral
summary: A gritty local multiplayer, controller-based platform shooter with one heal per round.

name: Barton Lynch Pro Surfing
summary: Barton Lynch Pro Surfing pits you against the world's best surfer's at the most exotic locations on the planet. More speed = more moves! Pump control uses the wave's power so you can surf faster and unlock more tricks. BL Pro Surfing features 12 world famous locations from point-breaks, to beach-breaks or deep water reefs. An in-depth leader-board sports game played out over an expansive world tour, or if you prefer just cruise the open world locations. Cutting edge graphics meets hardcore physics & at times, beautifully brutal waves. Pump, smash that lip, get sooo barreled and launch airs from waves that barrel, peak, break left, right, or just foam crumble. Customize your own character to within an inch of your life, or, play as some of today's top pros including: Yago Dora, Clay Marzo, Nathan Florence, Soli Bailey, Mahina Maeda, Vahine Fierro, Felicity Palmateer, and of course the legendary world champion, and Pro Surfing commentator Barton Lynch.

name: Baskerville
summary: A sci-fi visual novel reimagining The Hound of the Baskervilles (1902). Follow Vornovians Sherr-Lok & Watt-Sun as they try to uncover the legend behind a old family curse.

name: Bargain Puzzle Grid
summary: A Casual But Challenging Puzzle Grid. Roll and Rotate Column's and Rows of Cube's to Make islands of like cube's. You try to get the highest board score you can. it has a familiar feel of classic puzzles

name: Ball Jumper
summary: Do you like colors and jumping? This is the right game for you. Jump from one colored blob to another colored blob and get the highest score.

name: Battle Record: Graizor
summary: As a war threatens to engulf the world, a small rebel army with there new mobile weapon, Graizor, may be the world's last hope for peace. Destroy enemy mechs with the combination of a sword and energy rifle on your journey to bring an end to a devastating war.

name: Back into the Coffin
summary: Back into the Coffin is a 1-4 people CO-OP horror gameAs a vampire hunter in a universe terrorized by vampires, you can work alone or with your team to use various magical equipments to find the vampire's class and send it back to its coffin.

name: Bad Weekend
summary: A 7 level episode with two secret levels (nine levels total)

name: Battlefield 3
summary: One very large map with over 2000 enemies.

name: Banka
summary: Duke visits a bank to withdraw his funds there

name: Bank Roll 2000
summary: Reimagination of E3L2 "Bank Roll"

name: Babes
summary: This is a modified version of babes map which was released a long time ago

name: Back to Hearth
summary: A cozy narrative-focused exploration game in which you repair the houses of an abandoned forest settlement to bring the former inhabitants back home after the Calamity has occurred.

name: Ball Hentai Puzzle
summary: Ball Hentai Puzzle is a puzzle solving game with the objective of reaching the end with at least one life remaining. This game allows you to have calm and relaxing moments. Enjoy beautiful women while solving your puzzles.

name: Baldr's Squid Isekai: A Parody
summary: Baldr’s Squid Isekai is adult parody RPG with lots of cartoon violence and sex!

name: Battleships General Quarters
summary: Battleships General Quarters is your classic board game that lets you play as a commander of a fleet of battleships attacking another fleet. You take turns bombing each other, hoping to sink each and every ship of your opponent. It's fun, thrilling, and is challenging - all of that in one old but gold game.

name: Bargain Wargame
summary: Naval Grid Based , turn based Hard core Wargame. A.I. can control any ship so no need to micromanage , it has a live database to find targets. there is a supply mechanic, all ships need supplies fuel and repair and rearming , transport ships and major base's supply everything.

name: Back to the Fooker: Zombie Fooker 2
summary: No persons under the age of 18 permitted.Join Doug Fooker, Nunya Bidness, and Kim Aginavi as they try to cure the zombie virus by going back in time to find a pure form of the virus.

name: Barbie: Fairytopia
summary: 3 Barbie games in 1. Collect stolen Rainbow Gems to save the Crystal Palace.

name: Baugarten
summary: Baugarten seamlessly blends empire building with STEM. Opt to use math and science for resource optimization or focus solely on empire expansion. A single dynamic experience where STEM is always integrated, but you decide its role. Join Baugarten to shape your empire your way!

name: Ballionaire
summary: BALLIONAIRE is a physics-based pachinko-builder. Find and exploit outrageous synergies. Theorycraft and bonk your way to victory. Welcome to the autobonker genre!

name: Bail or Jail: Character DLC Bundle 3
summary: Thieves Alisa and Alex and Officer Patches have arrived on the scene! This DLC contains the following: • Thief Alice • Thief Alex • Officer Patches • Treasure Lantern

name: Banjo Kazooie: Tooty Adventure
summary:
Tooty Adventure is a Banjo Kazooie mod that reverse the roles with
Banjo together with a new story, custom scenes and mechanics.

Mod is console compatible with the expansion pack.

name: Baker Street Breakouts
summary:
"Baker Street Breakouts" combines the thrill of an Escape Room with the storytelling of an Adventure. Use your superior deduction skills in this story-driven mystery to help Sherlock deducing his way through an old film studio to finally face his arch nemesis Moriarty. Become a Master of Deduction!

"Baker Street Breakouts" focusses on puzzles and deduction. Instead of combat or grinding, the game challenges players to use their superior deduction skills and the ability to combine items in order to solve riddles and progress through the game. Explore, investigate, combine, deduce!

name: BattlePlan!
summary: Where fun meets chaos: Set in Pixel Vault's mashup universe, step in, apply your strategy and compete in our 3v3 auto-battler.

name: Battle Poet
summary: Battle demons with poetry to reclaim the Holy Mountain in this Strategy Roguelike about combining lines of poetry in turn-based combat.

name: Battle Junk
summary: This game is a 3D bullet hell action game. You can possess enemy characters and switch them with your own. Featuring 3D graphics with a pixel art aesthetic!

name: Basketballverse
summary: Basketballverse is a real-time basketball multiplayer with immersive gameplay & awesome digital assets. We’re empowering millions of basketball fans to build their careers in a digital era of basketball. Built by basketball fans for basketball fans!

name: Back from Void
summary: Collect magic shards and solve different puzzles with your elemental magic and your mind.Listen to local residents and help them so you can get Back from Void.

name: Backwoods Town
summary: Backwoods Town is an atmospheric forest survival simulator. Build your base, grow crops, fight bosses and rebuild the destroyed settlement, finding all its inhabitants along the way.

name: Ballapalooza
summary: Roll around and collect rings to progress through several levels with various abilities. Become a true baller!

name: Balance of Superpower
summary: Balance of Superpower is a 67,000-word interactive sci-fi romance novel by Rustem Khafizov. It’s entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects. Play as a superpowered person at an academy for people like you in Washington, D.C., in 2075.

name: Battle Wave
summary: Get ready for a world filled with determination, skill, and strategy! Battle Wave calls upon you to survive against waves of incoming enemies and enhance your character.

name: Banzai Escape 2: Subterranean - Tesla Technology
summary: Tesla Technology provide player with new energy base weapon and Nanoplugin

name: Battle Alchemy: Autobattler
summary: Forge your own weapon and master alchemy, Battle other players to see who is the best!

name: Bat Blast!
summary: Bat Blast! is a 2D game about magical bats. Take control of one of many magical fruit bats, and blast your way upwards through the minions of 'The Master' as you strive to escape his tower.

name: Banana Co.
summary: Banana Co. is a first person horror game in which you're placed into a terrifying banana factory where you have to avoid the dangers that await you. You're given no instructions but to collect bananas around the factory.

name: Baphomet
summary: Baphomet is an Action RPG that immerses you in sumptuous settings. As a knight, you are sent by the King to face an evil threat. With a sword and some magic powers, face your enemies and deliver the world from the the evil that is spreading.

name: Battlechat
summary: As a content creator you will be able to interact with your followers through this game. Let them compete against each other while you direct the game or be another player.

name: Battlecade
summary: Welcome to Battlecade, A fast-paced frantic arena shooter pitting you and another opponent against eachother to see who comes out on top.

name: Ball Pit King 3D
summary: Ball Pit King 3D is a fun and addictive puzzle game where you drop, stack and merge quirky 3D balls with hilarious faces to create the ultimate King Ball! Play and see if you can rule supreme over the Ball Pit!

name: Battle of BackYard
summary: Engage in thrilling household air battles in this wacky game. Choose your role as a skilled pilot or a sharp-shooting gunner, and customize your aircraft to fit your preferred playstyle. Take on daring missions or challenge friends in multiplayer combat. Relive history and dominate the skies!

name: Ba Quartet X
summary: Ba Quartet X (バカルテットX) is a fan-made Touhou Project Mega Man X series-like action-platformer game, featuring the bakartet: Cirno, Mystia Lorelei, Wriggle Nightbug, and Rumia. It was created by Penpenmushi no Koucha

name: Banzai's Addon
summary: Banazai's Add-On (also known as Caleb's Revenge and previously Game Leader's Unofficial Add-On) is a single episode fan add-on for Blood featuring seven levels, last updated on November 9, 1998 by Team BANZAI. Partly to facilitate its final release and to lower the download size in the days of largely dial-up connections, it features only new levels and does not contain any new textures, weapons or monsters.

name: Bamboo
summary:
Bamboo is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly running and cutting bamboo that grows in random places. You score points by collecting bamboo. You can run through yellow bamboo to collect it. When bamboo becomes green, you have to cut it multiple times to stop it and you don't get any points from it. Your goal is to stop bamboo from growing and reaching the top.

The game is over when bamboo reaches the top of the screen.

name: Battlezone
summary:
A Port of Battlezone for the Atari 2600.

Commonly considered the earliest progenitor of first-person shooters (FPS), Battlezone is a 3D tank game initially released in the arcades, and later converted officially to many systems. Earth has been invaded, and you and your tank lead the defensive effort. You drive around the battlefield from a first-person view, targeting and firing at tanks, planes and UFOs. You have a radar to help you see where the enemies are in direction and distance. Objects can be used as strategic cover.

Controls simulate the tracks of a tank realistically, so the direction and speed settings are varied - combining forward right and backward left movements (as you can on keyboard versions) sees you change direction more quickly. A standard enemy tank is worth 1,000 points when destroyed; a supertank is worth 3,000 points; and the flying saucer is worth 5,000 points. The guided missile is worth 2,000 points when destroyed. Each of these targets can be destroyed with a single shot from the player's tank. One bonus tank (a bonus "life" or "man") is awarded when the player's score reaches 15,000 points; an additional tank is then awarded at 100,000 points. The player can hide behind the solids or maneuver in rapid turns once fired on to buy time with which to fire himself.

name: Barrhell
summary: Within the depths of a sinister cave, a man, cursed by an evil barrel has been transformed into a demon. To find freedom he must use his newly aquired tail to escape.

name: Basterd Blitz
summary: Basterd Blitz is a top-down 3D arena shooter roguelite where you play as an allied soldier with up to 3 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of Nazis during WW2. Choose from a variety of characters with different traits, buy items and upgrade weapons to create unique runs and kill some Nazis.

name: Ball of Poo
summary: Help Dung Beetle Chan get the dung ball to the goal!

name: Banana Quest
summary: Banana Quest is a simple but challenging game where you must collect the Sacred Bananas, which were stolen, through seven levels of pure fun and excitement.

name: Barbarous: Family Secrets
summary: Help Emyr save the world in a Time Management game full of adventure and comedy!

name: Battlecry Berserkers
summary: A never repeating dungeon. Fight your way trough waves of enemies and make your own path. Unleash new powers and defeat mighty foes, in order to find and take to the gods' justice the responsible for this attack!

name: Bar Stella Abyss
summary: Bar Stella Abyss sees players take the role of a faceless wanderer who is drawn to Stella Abyss, a bar hidden in a mysterious corner of the city. Players will build a party and explore the dream-like Drunken World.

name: Bacon Grease
summary: Bacon Grease is a rather typical city map with particular attention payed to a grimy mood and a strong sense of place. You'll make your way through the streets of a besieged city, encountering a mix of commercial, residential, industrial, shopping, and transit locations.

name: Backbone's Rampage
summary:
You play as the treacherous Backbone in his quest to spread villainy across a city full of super heroes, with splendid surprises awaiting you!
Made for the GMTK game jam 2023 in under 48 hours.

name: Barbarians & Beasts
summary: Choose your barbarian character to hack and slash many beasts. Swords and magic will fight alongside you against the beasts to free the kingdom.

name: Battle Queen: Saikyou Fighters Retsuden
summary:
Battle Queen is all about fights between beautiful young women. In the beginning of the game the player is given the option to choose one of the three available fighters. Each one has an introduction story. Sayaka witnesses the murder of her father, a circus acrobat, by a witch known as Lavender; her story begins with a fight against her. Mai's and Mercedes' stories are one and the same; they are fighting for dominance in modern-day Japan, and fight each other in the first round of their stories.

Despite looking like a fighting game, Battle Queen is strategy-, not action-oriented. The fights are turn-based. The player can choose between different moves, including four kinds of attack, jump, defend, special attacks, etc. Special attacks can only be executed after performing a sufficient amount of other moves.

Each move is displayed as an anime-style image. The girls lose parts of their clothes when being hit. Defeating the opponent results in a sex scene.

name: Baca
summary: In this Columns clone, you must stack bricks to form lines which will fade as you progress. The difficulty increases as you progress.

name: Battlefield Commander WWII
summary: Battlefield Commander WWII is a real-time tactical game where you lead the soldiers and vehicles that battled across the globe during this time in history. Play hundreds of unique units across dynamic campaigns, skirmishes, and online PvP.

name: Banana Drama: All Animals Pack
summary: Get all animals of the Banana Drama universe! With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama.

name: Banana Drama: Alpaca
summary: Alpapaca! Get the incredibly fluffy Banana Drama alpaca with this DLC. He has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama aimals. Unfortunately, he is allergic to bananas and therefore often sneezes - his sneezing is often mistaken for spitting.

name: Banana Drama: Balanced Animals Pack
summary: Get all "balanced" animals of the Banana Drama universe! With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama.

name: Banana Drama: Cockatoo
summary: Fly cockatoo! Get the incredibly agile Banana Drama cockatoo with this DLC. He has incredible offensive capabilities and is able to run/fly faster than others. Similar to his best friend "Kiki the cockatoo" his abilities are often underestimated due to his cute looks!

name: Banana Drama: Cow
summary: Cow (moo)! Get the incredibly sassy Banana Drama cow with this DLC. The cow has incredible defensive capabilities and is able to collect resources faster than others. The cow is very self-confident and often likes to show off its beautiful udder!

name: Banana Drama: Deer
summary: Oh deer! Get the incredibly shy Banana Drama deer with this DLC. He has incredible defensive capabilities and is able to collect resources faster than others. It's lucky that there are no roads or cars in Banana Drama, because that would be fatal for the deer!

name: Banana Drama: Giraffe
summary: Helicopter giraffe! Get the excited Banana Drama giraffe with this DLC. She has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders. Sometimes she gets so excited that she can't stop spinning her head like a helicopter. Let's hope she doesn't fly away!

name: Banana Drama: Strong Defense Animals Pack
summary: Get all "strong defense" animals of the Banana Drama universe! With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama.

name: Banana Drama: Strong Offense Animals Pack
summary: Get all "strong offense" animals of the Banana Drama universe! With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama.

name: Banana Drama: Lion King
summary: Roaarrrr - the Lion! Get the incredibly proud Banana Drama lion with this DLC. He has incredible offensive capabilities and is able to run faster than others. A lion throwing bananas is a little unusual at first glance, but he has learnt this effective fighting technique from the monke(y)s!

name: Banana Drama: Tiger
summary: Wow a tiger! Get the incredibly cute and sleepy Banana Drama tiger with this DLC. He has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama animals. He is particularly proud of his beautiful coat and regularly impresses many female tigers with it.

name: Basketball Arcade
summary: The Basketball Arcade Machine simulator.

name: Back To School
summary: 《Back to School》 is a first-person open-world campus game where you can study hard to get scholarships and participate in sports activities such as basketball, football, swimming, and more. Of course, you can also do something that you haven't experienced in campus life before.

name: Babava's Playspace
summary: Babava's Playspace is a horror puzzle adventure game. In your search for the answer you will have to go through puzzles, difficult moral choices and slip past monsters lurking in the shadows. Are you ready to play outside the rules and win?

name: Battle of Fate
summary: Battle of Fate is a first-person PvE shooter in which players fend off waves of enemies in a variety of environments created by randomly selecting maps, weapons, monsters, and items.

name: Based Refueling
summary: Oh boy, it's another Refueling Base remake! An aggressive, limit-removing, single player take on the original with similarly open-ended and challenging gameplay in more modern terms.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass
Bayonetta 2
summary:
This Switch port adds amiibo support.
