Bayonetta’s back and more powerful than ever. Wield wild weapons and execute deadly moves—like the powerful Umbran Climax—to take out angels and demons in this breathtaking action game. You can even team up with friends in 2-player online or local wireless co-op fights (additional accessories required; sold separately.) Bayonetta is a butt-kicking, havoc-wreaking witch who wields sweet weapons like pistols, whips, hammers, flamethrowers, and poison bows. But it’s not just about brawn—it’s also about style. Bayonetta is deadly but sleek, with moves like Witch Time that slows down time itself, and the all-new Umbran Climax—a special magic attack that summons Infernal Demons to devastate enemies. The Bayonetta 2 game also features an online and local wireless 2-player cooperative mode where players bet halos on their performance and work together to amplify their sass, cause destruction, and score some riches.

name: Bayonetta
summary:
The port to Nintendo consoles adds Nintendo themed costumes and touch controls.

Wreak havoc as the foxy witch Bayonetta.

Bayonetta is a butt-kicking, havoc-wreaking witch, and she’ll shoot, whip, slice, and burn angels as she uncovers the truth about her own past. Her weapons and moves are all stylishly over-the-top, but she can also dodge attacks to slow down time, and inflict Torture Attacks on her enemies.
This is the prequel to the Bayonetta 2 game, and it’s every bit as sassy, destructive, and epic as you’d expect. Bayonetta is the fashionable and foxy unholy offspring of an Umbra Witch and a Lumen Sage, and she’s lost her memory after being asleep at the bottom of a lake for 500 years.

Use Wicked Weaves to summon Infernal Demons, dodge enemies’ dangerous attacks to slow down time, and punish angels with deadly devices. You can even dress Bayonetta up in four Nintendo-themed costumes—Princess Peach, Princess Daisy, Link, and Samus Aran.

name: Baldur's Gate 3: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The multi-award winning RPG Baldur’s Gate 3 released to the mortal plane.
Fill your mantelpiece with feelies while you fill your heart with adventure.
Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, sacrifice and survival, and the lure of absolute power. Mysterious abilities are awakening inside you, drawn from a mind flayer parasite planted in your brain. Resist, and turn darkness against itself. Or embrace corruption, and become ultimate evil. Choose from 12 classes and 11 races from the D&D Player's Handbook and create your own identity, or play as an Origin hero with a hand-crafted background. Or tangle with your inner corruption as the Dark Urge, a fully customisable Origin hero with its own unique mechanics and story. Whoever you choose to be, adventure, loot, battle and romance your way across the Forgotten Realms and beyond. Gather your party. Take the adventure online as a party of up to four.

name: Babies Dream of Dead Worlds
summary:
What do babies dream about when they’re too young to remember?

Before we have memory, before we know what this world is, we dream. Babies dream of what came before, of universes that are no longer there. Babies dream of dead worlds.

name: Baba Yaga learns to read
summary: Educational game for learning to read

name: Baldur's Gate 3: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Digital Deluxe Edition upgrade content includes in-game cosmetics, such as a unique custom dice skin to show off to your friends, as well as practical in-game items such as the Mask of the Shapeshifter from Divinity: Original Sin 2.

Listen to the magical music of Borislav Slavov’s Original Soundtrack for Baldur’s Gate 3 or even pick up a pen and play D&D as one of our Origin characters with the handy printable pre-made character sheets. There’s plenty to get stuck into, in and outside of the game.

name: BadDool
summary: Baddool is a rhythm based card battler. Explore a dungeon with fun and exciting characters and foes. Build a deck of cards by exploring a dungeon and use your cards to kill enemies and gain more exciting cards! Make friends by helping them out or challenge them to a DOOL to kill them for their loot.

name: Backrooms: The Hunt
summary: You are a member of the newly formed department of Artifact Hunters within the company B.E.I. Your role involves seeking and collecting enigmatic artifacts within the Backrooms. This department emerged following the successful stabilization of a portal

name: BattleProgress
summary: You want to create your own battleplan? Keep the overview and outplay your opponent with brilliant moves! Manage your economy and research whisly to create the perfect composition of units which defeat the opponent and his army, but be carefull: The opponent will try the same!

name: Banished
summary:
"I… am… an OLD GOD…. long ago… I was trapped… Banished!... To another dimension… a thousand years, beyond reflections… however… the barrier has weakened… If only for a moment… long enough!... to consume!….

Will you consume your prey, or will you be trapped in the mirror world forever?Uncover the terrifying mysterious life of the monster from the mirror universe stalking and eating humans! 3 bone-chilling levels. Mirror world mechanic. Different NPC types.

The objective is to find the right moment to grab prey.

Plan your attack, but don't forget to improvise. Travelling through the real world drains your hunger. Eat humans to restore hunger and grow strong enough to reach the next level. Beware! Alerted humans give chase on sight and can destroy you. Use the mirror universe to traverse blocked paths but there are blocked areas there too. Catch the humans unaware. You have 3 respawns per level. You hunger and humans are the only threat to your immortality.

Dank original chiptune trap soundtrack Inspired by: Junichi Masuda's Legendary Lavender Town theme, $uicideboy$, Cardi B, Haarper, Freddie Dread, and Bleed the wicked menace!

name: Backstage at Naked Porn Battle
summary: Welcome to Naked Porn Battle. The most famous glorious fighting championship in the world. There are no rules and any fighting style can be used. The only requirement is simple: Everyone fights naked and the opponents MUST fuck each other.

name: Ball Mania
summary:
ball mania is a puzzle plataformer game where the player can make choices to see what can be the best choice to survive a challenge some choices will be good others will be bad

you play as little puk a pink bouncy ball that must jump and solve the challenges at ,from the hills to the horizon what are the challenges that await you?

the game uses mouse for choosing and the arrow keys for movement

name: Bakunyuu Reijou x Kimo-o Hentai Yome-ka Keikaku: Keppeki Cool Kaichou ga Saikasou no Kusa Kimo Seishi Chuudoku ni!
BattleTubers

name: Battle Chess
summary:
NES Port of Battle Chess

Did someone tell you chess is a civilized game played by civilized people? Forget it. Chess is war - a ruthless, cutthroat battle where one warrior lives to fight again and the other is left on the battlefield. With BATTLE CHESS you don't just imagine the battles, you experience them! You'll hear the clank of armor, as you watch dramatic, 3-dimensional animations of courageous heroes fight to protect their king. BATTLE CHESS is the most incredible chess game you've ever seen - where empires can be won - or lost!

name: Battle Santa 64
summary:
Play as Santa Claus trying to take back the presents stolen by Bowser, Wario, and Donkey Kong!

You have five minutes to collect as many as you can. They will run away so you will need to chase them down, hit them, and pick up the presents they drop. After five minutes you will see how many you have collected, what your high score is, and can restart by holding A and B simultaneously to try again.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: How the Gruntch Stole Christmas
summary: A mod for Banjo-Kazooie inspired by How the Grinch Stole Christmas.

name: Battalion: Nemesis
summary:
Battalion: Nemesis puts you in command of the Rapid Attack and Response unit commanded by Sergeant Tucker. Face off against the insidious Mullen in an epic 10 level campaign!

There are a total of 16 levels to be played, where you can master the rules of tactical turn-based strategy combat.

name: Battle
summary:
Objective is to destroy all 9 of the opponent's tanks.
Men are unarmed and cannot be harmed.
It is possible to reverse the tank.
The cyan man owns the red tanks. The blue man owns the black tanks.

name: Basketball
summary: Basketball is a sports game for Arcadia 2001

name: Baseball
summary: Baseball for the Arcadia 2001 is a passable rendition of America's favourite pastime. Players control each outfielder individually and can throw the ball to each of the four bases, but the computer controls the infielders. When a ball is hit to an infielder, the batter is automatically out. When a ball is hit into the outfield, the perspective switches to an odd close-up angle of the nearest outfielder, who can run right and left to try and catch the ball. Pitchers can throw fast and slow and curve the ball right and left, providing the potential for some crazy- looking pitches.

name: Basketball
summary: A Basketball game for Elektor TV Games Computer

name: Bad Mothafucka
summary: Are you tired of the same old banal blather offered by your current companions? Are you looking for a deep, meaningful relationship with a complex, challenging individual? Are you looking for answers to life's most daunting questions? Then look no further than Bad Mothafucka, the result of years of toil and research, all conducted with one singular purpose in mind: to provide the ultimate companion for Fallout: New Vegas.

name: Bad Santa
summary: Do puzzles and collect presents all while avoiding the big bad santa. Also watch out for whatever lurks in the basement.

name: Backrooms: Eight Levels
summary: "God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you..."

name: Badaboom: Deluxe Edition
summary: A match-3 puzzle game with a twist! Play on multiple maps with unique songs — the more marbles you destroy, the faster you advance through the song. Collect bonuses, chain combos and destroy as many marbles as you can!

name: Battle Shiba Barkade
summary: Dive into the Battle Shiba Barkade, a thrilling collection of three unique games, each offering a distinct and exhilarating gaming experience. Free and packed with action, this trio of games is a celebration of creativity and fun, inviting players to embark on diverse adventures!

name: Battle for Desert City
summary: Battle for Desert City - is great chance to start your journey into TBS genre in wargame settings and test your skills. Learn to think like real soldier on the battlefield and like general in war room at the same time. Achieve hard, well deserved victory fighting overwhelming enemy forces.

name: Barter & Blades
summary: Embark on a medieval odyssey in Barter & Blades! As a budding adventurer, trade goods, shape your reputation, and amass wealth. Engage in dynamic trading, epic quests, and unforeseen events. Are you ready to thrive in the realm?

name: Ball is Life
summary: Ball's a well-rounded fellow, but he soon finds himself in an existential crisis. Take Ball on a challenging and hilarious adventure as he jumps across the globe, scouring the round world for round friends who can help him live his best life.

name: Ball Coin Chapter 5
summary: Ball Coin is an action-packed Move and Dodge game. Control Rocky, avoid enemies, and collect coins to progress. With three thrilling game modes, aim for the highest score on the leaderboard!

name: Basket Zombie
summary: These guys don't stop playing even when they're dead! Choose between four types of balls and three different stages and make the highest score before the time runs out in this zombie basketball game!

name: Battleship
summary: A cancelled version of the board game Battleship for the Nintendo Wii developed by Electronic Arts.

name: Battle Trek
summary: Space based strategy game in which you control several functions of your ship like shields, wepaons etc. in order to win battles.

- Secret Menu

Busy Bee
- Zip-Zap!

- Secret Menu: Order up! Fresh out of the oven, three additional recipes to add to your cookbook.
- Rainbow Egg
- Almost-Perilous Pie

name: Battlefront Trench Warriors: Ops of Warfare
summary: "Battlefront Trench Warriors: Ops of Warfare" thrusts you into the heart of an immersive war experience, where the theater of action unfolds within the unforgiving trenches, meticulously designed underground chambers, and strategically engineered wa

name: Banana Mountain

name: Battle Typer
summary: Welcome to Battle Typer, the ultimate destination for typing enthusiasts and beginners alike! If you're on the hunt for thrilling typing games that you can enjoy directly in your browser, you've come to the right place. Battle Typer offers an immersive and engaging experience for players of all skill levels, from beginners looking to improve their words per minute to seasoned typists seeking a new challenge.

name: Banana Fighting
summary: The banana warriors defeated the invaders, and are living a peaceful life. At the time the banana king is getting old, the village is ready to hold a trump card banana contest, the winner will succeed as the new king, get ready banana warriors, a game of wits is about to begin.

name: Bananaventure
summary: Bananaventure is a small 2d endless platform game with collectable gems and highscore.

name: Batman the rooftop caper

While he was busy with important things, enemies managed to attack Gotham City, and now Batman must quickly eliminate them. Night does not last long, but during this time he has to manage to kill all the aliens. So Batman will be jumping on the rooftops, climbing to the top floors and kill the enemies. During the game, he will be given hints by the Blue Beetle - his loyal friend. Play Batman and help him overcome all obstacles. Collect boomerangs, because it is the main weapon used by our hero. Also collect badges to earn big points in the game. Kill the enemies as fast as possible and try to save your own life. Good luck!

name: Battle Chess
summary: Macintosh Port of Battle Chess

name: Baby Dino
summary: Explore the realm of Raku in this dinosaur-themed RPG. Join clans, engage in battles, and lead ten diverse species to build a new kingdom. Guide Rexy, the last heir, in reclaiming his throne and restoring honor. Uncover the legacy of betrayal and shape the destiny of the kingdom.

name: Backrooms: Steps into the abyss
summary: You are a member of the B.E.I. research team. You have to find a lost report.Your task is to explore these primitive spaces, find the report and return them to the base for further analysis. Use your ingenuity and skills to avoid danger.

name: Backrooms: Realm of Shadows - Full Version
summary: Embark on a thrilling odyssey through the Backrooms: Realm of Shadows and discover what lies beyond the veil of reality. Are you prepared to face the shadows and unravel the mysteries that await in this dark and unforgiving realm? The adventure begins now - if you dare.

name: Backrooms Game No. 999999
summary: Backrooms #999999999 is a singleplayer/4 player co-op horror exploration game. Unlock the puzzles, survive the entities, escape the deadly geometry and try to reach the final level in one piece. Good luck, wanderer!

name: Baderna: Um Conto de Barro
summary: Face the mob with your clay dolls! Baderna: Um Conto de Barro is an action-adventure game set in the magical universe of Northeastern clay dolls. Help Cleiton save his village from the corrupted dolls in insanely challenging levels!

name: Baklava Simulator 2

With customizable features, security, and entertainment, this game is where flavor meets management. Dive into Baklava Simulator 2 and build your baklava empire! 🥮

name: Batman: The Dark Knight
summary: Batman: The Dark Knight is an unreleased action-stealth game for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. The game was based on the movie of the same name. The game was cancelled in 2008.

name: Battle Clash
summary: Battle Clash is a medieval multiplayer PVP game. On spawn, each player is randomly assigned a medieval class and forced to battle against other players. Reach a kill streak to unlock your class's ultimate attack, and dominate the battlefield. When the timer ends, the player with the most kills wins!

name: BattleDrive
summary: Survive, Upgrade, Conquer. Race to victory in a relentless arena battle. Drift, unlock new cars, and defeat unique bosses!

name: BallCore
summary: Precise, multiplayer platformer where you play as ball only able to move left and right.

name: Bass Invaders

Battle using any song from local files or online video with automatic beatmap generation. Nail the perfect run and top the leaderboard on your favourite tracks. Your music will save the world.

name: Battlefall: State of Conflict
summary: Engage in a post-apocalyptic RTS showdown between three factions in Battlefall: State of Conflict.

name: Battle Echoes
summary: Take command of the mech and become the ultimate strategist. Construct impregnable defense facilities, handpick potent skills, lead your troops, and defy relentless enemy assaults. Will you emerge victorious in this thrilling battle for supremacy?

name: BattlePlatform
summary: A 2D meat pigeon game featuring a moveable platform, place your turrets and buildings on a moveable and expandable platform, buy props from merchants and choose exclusive enhancements to create an impenetrable fortress and repel zombie attacks.

name: Battleship
summary:
Take command of a U.S. Naval fleet to wage war against an unknown alien force. Secure the seas, before it's too late.

The Wii/DS/3DS versions feature a turn based strategy gameplay approach not found in the PS3/X360 version.

name: Basketball Shoot

Basketball Shoot is an simple but very addictive game which base on realistic physics.
The quantity of the basketballs is limited,your goal is to shoot them for a better score.

name: Battletoads
summary: An unreleased game for the Battletoads series which never made it past the alpha stage, and it would've used pre-rendered sprites similar to the Donkey Kong Country series. Only 2 stages were close to completion, being a remake of Ragnarok's Cavern and a side scrolling stage similar to Artic Caverns.

name: Battleboom

name: Babel: Break Your Destiny

name: Barn Runner 1: The Armageddon Eclair

THRILL to the chase!

Shoot Small Balls to hit Large Balls.

Break piles of ice and enjoy the atmosphere of winter, presents and holidays.

Battlefield 1942: The Complete Collection

Play through 5 classic top-down pinball tables: Darkside, Barbarian, Firestorm, Mutation, and Devil's Island. Not only that, we've added two BRAND NEW tables in classic BoS Style: Centipede, and Missile Command! Get 7 awesome retro tables in one package!

And fishing support DUALSHOCK controller, real time to quit reproducing. During the fight Ruageji appears, you can learn the rhythm. Set in the diversified fields, with ?Ri?Geyou a big game while moving the boat.

name: Baseball Pro Nami Kusayakyuu
summary:
Belt one outta the field!
We took Sandlot Baseball to all-new levels of fun and excitement! Big League Slugger Baseball gives players the purest form of the game just like in those pick-up games in the sandlots across America! Big League Slugger Baseball No complex rules or impossible button combos to remember - it's just "Hey Batta-Batta! SWING!" for the love of the game!

name: Battle Gear 2
summary: Take charge of military operations, enter enemy's territory from the air, sea and land, attack various parts of the world, battle for World Domination!

name: Battle Gear 3
summary: The long awaited sequel to Battle Gear 2 is here! Get ready for the fight of your life! Battle Gear 3 takes the familiar formula from Battle Gear 2 and improves upon it by adding more units, more strategy, and a greater diversity of upgrades! The whole point of the game is to conquer the world one country at a time by carefully managing your troops! There are tons of upgrades and leveling up to do! How far can you get in this exciting strategy game? Good luck!

name: BattleKnight

name: Bayonetta / Forza Motorsport 3
summary:
Bayonetta/Forza Motorsport 3 is a compilation for the Xbox 360 containing Bayonetta and Forza Motorsport 3.

The compilation is very rare, only being released as part of a console bundle in Japan in 2010.

name: Basketball

name: Battlefield
summary:
Battlefield was an online multiplayer game where the player controlled a tank belonging to one of the four teams, moving around the map and firing at enemies. The game was partially turn-based: while the player gave their tanks commands in real-time, the tanks made their moves in turns. Tanks could also teleport to any spot on the map, lay down mines as traps for enemy tanks, and use a radar to detect hidden enemy mines and pickups.

Fuel played the role of the tank's health, and it was consumed by moving, teleporting, shooting, using a radar, laying mines, or getting shot by enemies. Upon running out of fuel the tank was deactivated and the player had to wait to respawn. It could be replenished by collecting fuel canisters. Equipment could also be acquired; this included better weapons, protective shields, and a long-range radar. Other map features included obstacles which could be moved around by the tank, and ferries used for transport over water.

The game was originally available on the game website Bonus.com, but became defunct when the website closed in 2004. It was later available at the URL playbattlefield.com until 2008.

name: Batman: The Junkyard Challenge
summary:
Do you love Batman, but yearn for more? Do you find the game to be too easy? Are you looking for a challenge? If so then this may be the hack for you.

This hack came about because of conversations with Batman speedrunner junkyard_dave wherein existing hacks of the game were lamented. This hack aims to rectify the situation by providing a new and difficult experience for anyone daring enough to attempt The Junkyard Challenge.

This hack features all new (and significantly more difficult) stages. Other changes that add to the challenge include enemy placements/health and boss AI. The item drop tables have also been changed. Though difficult, note that damage boosts are not required in this hack. It is possible that some maneuvers that require sub-pixel precision to avoid damage have slipped through the cracks, but this would be no more than a few instances. If well executed nearly all (if not actually all) of the game should be playable damage-less.

name: Battle City Remake

Battle City Remake is a remake of the original game produced and published by Namco at the year 1985. The game is a multi-directional shooter where you control a tank that must destroy all 20 enemies in each stage to advance to the next level. The enemy tanks on the other side attempt to destroy the player's base as well as the player.

The remake contains all the original 35 stages of the game, but with improved graphics. Like always the idea of our remake is improve the game visuals, but keep the gameplay the most close possible to the original game.
