name: Battle Minesweeper Online
summary: Minesweeper is now available as a real-time online battle game!

name: BattlePets
summary: BattlePets is a monster collector in which you can capture and train fantasy pets then engage in battles against other creatures and challenge the six evil wizards to free the the island of Enchantia.

name: Back Fire
summary: Back Fire is a full motion video gunfight action adventure game. In the game, players need to make their own choices, which will affect the progression of the plot. The final endings of the story will be different, and the secret hidden in the world of “Back Fire” will be revealed.

name: BattleGlide
summary: BattleGlide is an open world sandbox game where you can move and fight like a super hero.

name: Bad Flesh
summary: A small game made for #lowrezjam23 that missed the deadline. Too busy eating bad flesh.

name: Battle Simulator
summary: You can use the combat simulator to simulate the battle pace under three damage calculation formulas (addition, division, multiplication), and in the settings, you can choose to restart after the battle ends to calculate win rates.

name: BackRooms: Lost
summary: Backrooms: Lost supports multiplayer, allowing 1 to 4 players to navigate mysterious environments, evading lethal entities while striving to escape. All future content updates, like new levels and game modes, will remain complimentary. The multiplayer mode will launch alongside the initial release.

name: Basic Biking
summary:
Physics-based pedaling!

Alternately push the buttons to pedal the bike, one button for each leg. Try to reach the goal without falling down.

name: Baba Is Cool 2
summary: The Baba Is Cool project is back! Twelve new worlds for Baba is You created by 11 years old students.

name: Bazookarrots
summary:
Carrot juice squeezing game for MSX2.

Pick up CARRORS and bring them to the JUICER!

Beware of BUNNIES!

You can use your CARROT BAZOOKA to eliminate the threats!

name: Barraka
summary: Barraka is a claymation adventure game full of puzzles and surprises. Join our brave heroine as she explores the spooky fair in the small town. Along the way, she will encounter weird and wonderful characters and challenges. You will also have fun with bumper cars, whack-a-mole, the haunted house, a mini circus and more! Barraka is a game that will delight your senses and imagination.

name: BallBastic!: Ultimate Pack
summary: For more casual players that want the experience of playing the game without fear of failure, the Ultimate Pack enables Freeplay mode, which gives you infinite lives. Also, you get a cool Eyeball cosmetic ball, so that's always a plus!

name: Ballistic
summary: An exhilarating third-person multiplayer game that redefines the classic game of dodgeball into a fast-paced party experience! Features a variety of ball buffs, maps and cosmetics.

name: BattleCap
summary: Dive into an exhilarating maritime battle for 1 to 4 players! Command bottle-cap vessel that not only transforms, extends, and even fractures but also glues other caps to craft your one-of-a-kind warship. Equip yourself with blessings to fight monsters, or engage in a battle with your friends.

name: Battle Teams 2: Iconic Bundle
summary: Unlock the Iconic Bundle!

name: BAB
summary: We bring you a VR escape game that uses baby's crawling action. In ``BAB,'' you become a baby and must escape from a cursed mansion that loops. Your powers of observation will be tested and sometimes require some strenuous exercise. Please try it!

name: Backrooms: Liminal Conflict
summary: Backrooms: Liminal Conflict is a PvP backrooms game with different factions.

name: Ball-it Hell
summary: Dodge! Strike back! This is a fast-paced barrage arcade game. Move the character to dodge bullets. Pick the right time to strike bullets back and destroy enemies to get gold coins. Unlock more characters and powerful skills. Keep challenging yourself to get higher scores and rankings.

name: Bad North: Jotunn Edition
summary:
Bad North is a charming but brutal real-time tactics roguelite. Defend your idyllic island kingdom against a horde of Viking invaders, as you lead the desperate exodus of your people. Command your loyal subjects to take full tactical advantage of the unique shape of each island. Everything is at stake: fail, and watch the blood of your subjects stain the ground red.

It’s charmingly brutal, with beautiful procedurally-generated islands and adorable soldiers juxtaposed against the blood-stained realities of war. You control the broad strokes of the battle, giving high level commands to your soldiers who try their best to carry them out in the heat of the moment. It’s accessibly deep, with simple player inputs masking a dynamic combat simulation that make it inviting to new players while challenging veterans.

Keep fighting, warriors. Not for power or riches or glory, but for hope of peace to come once again in the harsh lands of the Bad North.

name: Bamboozle
summary: Bamboozle is an adventure themed puzzle game and offers great brain exercises for all ages. Complete quests by navigating the explorer across over 150 unique puzzle boards. Complete all the steps to "discover" an ancient artifact or rare animal. Engaging hand-drawn artwork, a fun soundtrack, and addictive puzzles!

name: Battleships and Carriers 2
summary: Casual WW2 naval turn-based strategy: attack/defend, search & destroy, build ships, subs and aircraft. Clear and simple combat and move. Fast, re-playable board game style strategy, with 70 unit types. Different missions/campaign objectives (Destroy, Conquer, Defend, Escort, Kill-Them-All).

name: Bananamania
summary: Check out our all-new 8-bit banana-style game! We think you'll like it! Let us know what you think! We are working with dedication to bring this game in full to you guys very soon!

name: Ban: The Prologue of Gucha Gucha
summary: 【A richly coloured horror and mystery tale】"BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA” is a third-person horror adventure game. Experience the messy horror from the perspective of the protagonist, who is caught up in the whirlwind of events in a certain town in Japan, Utagacho.

name: BackRooms's 1995: The Lost Footage - Chapter1
summary: My name is Jacob, and I'm 25 years old. I've heard a lot of rumors about an abandoned house where people claim to see strange things. But I'm not here for that. I'm here to find my brother. He disappeared in January of 1970, I'll do whatever it takes to locate him, no matter what.

name: Banana Ranch
summary: Banana Ranch is a Boys Love (BL) / Gay dating sim game, mixed with farming and ranch management gameplay aspect. The story follows Ban (changeable name) who suddenly comes to a world with no human.

name: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002: Beybattle Tournament 2
summary: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002 - Beybattle Tournament 2 was a game released on the Sony Playstation. It was launched on August 1, 2002 in Japan. The game is a continuation of Beyblade: Let it Rip!

name: Ballad of Antara
summary:
In a distant land, a mist-like phenomenon devastates the common world with unknown malice. Begin a perilous journey, seek towering, divine creatures, retrieve those twisted and lost ""essences"" of the land.

-Become Emissaries, powerful entities that wield the force of fundamental essences. Experience unique classes, gameplay capabilities, and enticing, mysterious stories.
-Explore the Para, the otherworldly dimension where danger lurks at every corner. Seek the truth inside, and recover the essences of the world.
-Explore handcrafted gameplay space with intricate, exploration oriented level design.

name: Battle Babes: Love & Death
summary: Battle Babes is a fast-paced strategy trading card game. Collect, strategize, and battle your way to victory with 9 powerful hero decks! Experiment with 300+ unique cards each with their own special abilities. Customize your decks and defeat the Succubus Queen's Court!

name: Basket Brawl DX
summary: Embark on a quest with Himari and her friends! Traverse 40+ rooms, unlock characters, and groove to chiptune tunes in this speedy platformer.

name: Batman
summary: A remake that was in the works for a long time and was on-hold a few times. One of the best games for ZX Spectrum ever created, surpassed only by its successor Head Over Heels, which was also remade by our team. Help BatMan find seven pieces of the BatCraft scattered around the caves, mansion and other places. In the end find the BatCraft and finish this adventure.

name: Backrooms: Between Lost Dimension
summary: Backrooms: Between Lost Dimensions is a horror game that immerses you in the surreal world of the Backrooms. Trapped in an endless maze of monotonous rooms, you must solve disturbing puzzles and face sinister creatures to find an escape. Is your escape just an illusion?

name: Babies vs. Monsters
summary: Babies Vs Monsters is a bullet hell rogue-like game with RPG elements. Designed with cartoonish animations, this game offers various characters, level designs, and challenging boss battles that are both fun and difficult!

name: Bankshot Launchers
summary: Create havoc in this ricocheting arena shooter where precise trick-shots are king. Master a variety of unique weapons and work with your team in challenging levels to achieve victory over your opponents.

name: Ball Bulét
summary: Ball Bulét is an isometric Bullet Hell in which a girl searches for revenge by fighting security guards with...a bouncing ball?! Perform ricochet with your spherical weapon against walls and enemies; Reach the top of the company’s skyscraper and "talk" with the CEO who’s ruining your career.

name: Battimals
summary: Battimals: Combine animal DNA and battle foes in fast-paced matches. Hilarious, strategic fun in quick play sessions. Create your ultimate team!

name: Basketball VR
summary: Casual Basketball game, that allows anyone to play 5-5 matches. It should not cause VR discomfort and it's designed to give you fun and relax, so expect plenty of points scored and opponent that will give you a lot of freedom.

name: BatteryNote
summary: This is an adventure game. You, a mechanic, have picked up three robots from a scrapyard. You can select one of them and charge and converse with them within a time limit. How you treat them will change their reactions, and the ending of the game will change little by little along with their fate.

name: BaroMaro
summary: BaroMaro is a top-down arena hack'n slash rogue-lite featuring hundreds of unique perk cards to collect. Using different weapons, elements and playstyles, OBLITERATE animal kingdom and reunite with your family once more...

name: Barako the Pirate
summary: A pirate themed rpg adventure!

name: Bananametr
summary: Bananametr is a clicker game where you click on a banana! In Bananametr, you click on a banana to get a bigger banana and compare it with a friend's banana!!

name: Banana Cowboy
summary: Play as Banana Cowboy and adventure in fruit-themed universe, rescuing your people from your evil twin who has taken over the Banana Kingdom. Use your trusty lasso and spaceship horse to travel to the Orange Biker and Blueberry Pirate planets and save the universe from the Evil King!

name: Ball Points
summary: It is a third-person platform game where the ball is the main character 3D

name: Backrooms Cats and Lava
summary: Backrooms Cats and Lava is an action-platformer with puzzle elements. Help a small cave dweller escape rising lava by moving boxes to create safe paths. Remember, the floor is lava—don't step on it!

name: Battle Suit Aces
summary: Lead a plucky crew against a star-consuming threat in this charming character-driven, card battling RPG. Brought to you by the creators of the award-winning Battle Chef Brigade, recruit ace pilots, upgrade their mecha Battle Suits, grow meaningful friendships and captain your personalized adventure.

name: Battle Aces
summary:
Welcome to a fast paced and action-oriented real time strategy game where you defend your base, advance your tech and attack the enemy’s core. Battle Aces is a RTS game made for everyone, for those new to the genre or longtime fans, as well.

Customize a specific Unit Deck before each match, limited to 10 minutes, making for intense battles, full of strategic depth at its highest levels of play.

name: Battle Vision Network
summary: Battle Vision Network is an online PvP Puzzle-Battler fusing cozy color-matching puzzle gameplay with deep turn-based tactics. Teams from across the galaxy vye for the ultimate championship title in fast n’ fierce puzzle battles!

name: Banderas del mundo
summary:
‘Flags of the World’ is a quiz game that teaches the flags of all the countries of the world in the most fun way possible. There are 200 flags, 2 game types and 11 levels in this flag quiz game.

Each level has 20 flags and you have 20 seconds to match the flag and country in each quiz. If you choose the wrong flag, you will see the name of that flag.

name: Backpack Survivors
summary:
A crossover between bullet heaven and inventory management. In Backpack Survivors the player fills his backpack with weapons and items which are then used during the bullet heaven portion of the game. During this, the player will kill hordes of enemies and keep upgrading their backpack to grow stronger and even defeat bosses.

Backpack Survivors has roguelite elements with unlockables and a large talent tree, allowing the player even more customizability over the game.

Backpack Survivors is currently in Alpha and is slated for a release into Early Access in late 2024.

name: Banana
summary: A digital simulator of the handheld game of the same name.

name: Baseball
summary: A simulator of the handheld game Baseball by VTech.

name: Basketball FRVR
summary:
Basketball FRVR is a simple and easy to learn, yet amazingly fun Basketball hoop shooting game. Play for as long as you can and get bonus points by not hitting the rim.

Practice your Basketball hoop shooting skills.

The game has no time limit, but the moving basket is a challenge for event experienced players.

If you like a simple basketball challenge, this is the game for you!

name: Basic Platformer
summary: A platformer with puzzle elements made for the Vircon32 virtual console.

name: Ballz
summary: Relax your brain with the ultimate time killer!

name: Ball Dodge
summary:
You are a ball, you must dodge things. It is as easy as that!

Simple one button controls yet still challenging.

name: Battle Grid Arena
summary: Ready for a stress-free strategy game with a twist? Battle Grid Arena lets you transform heroes into beasts, gather ressources, build a base, and recruit monsters mid-battle. Engage in tactical combat and humorous romantic adventures. It's strategy gaming with a smile!

name: Bandit Trap
summary: Defend your home against a bandit invasion using inventive boobytraps as a Trapper, or join a team of three Bandits and try to get away with the loot! Introducing BANDIT TRAP—a fresh 3vs1, chaotically fun, physics-driven online multiplayer game for the whole family.

name: Backrooms
summary: Explore an abandoned liminal space. Uncover dark secrets through eerie exploration and environmental storytelling. Evade unpredictable supernatural entities and face psychological horror. Will you reveal the truth or become another lost soul?

name: Battle Factory Showdown
summary:
Battle Factory Showdown is a Pokémon fan game developed in RPG Maker XP with Pokémon Essentials.
The game is entirely dedicated to the famous Battle Frontier facility "Battle Factory."
Rent a team of 4 Pokémon from over 250 available and engage in an endless series of double battles; will you be able to defeat all the bosses and set a new world record?

name: Babylon X
summary:
Alternative history of the Ancient World: Mesopotamia, 6000 BC. A technological revolution against the backdrop of an impending apocalypse.

Energy, gravity, and its connections with ancient magic were discovered, leading to technological advancements in Babylon and Egypt. At that point, the struggle for resources had begun.

A former prophet who is now a runaway slave and avenger joins forces with a young moon cult priestess to prevent the imminent construction of the Tower of Babel. Betrayed by all, he starts a new life and finds love in a world that is about to end.

name: Bat to the Heavens
summary: A bat and your wit is all you need to surpass any obstacle! Climb and surpass the heavens, and discover the secrets across the valley in this challenging momentum - execution - puzzle game!

name: Bart Bash
summary: Click all the Barts!

name: Bad Omens: 8th Apartment
summary: You play as a student named Lisa, who has just moved in with her university friend. But instead of a carefree student life, Lisa faces events full of despair and fear when she is left alone in her apartment number 8...

name: Battle Robots: Confrontation
summary: Battle Robots: Confrontation is an online PvP shooter in a sci-fi setting. Construct, upgrade and customise your robots, squad up with other pilots and unleash your power in epic battles on maps with many tactical options!

name: Barcode Battler
summary: The second model of the Barcode Battler, known as Barcode Battler II in Japan.

name: Baby Boomer 2: 35 Years Too Soon
summary: Nobody asked for it, yet the sequel to “Baby Boomer” is out 35 years after the original! This is literally breaking the world record for the longest time in-between video game sequels!

name: Baptized In Lunar Dust
summary: A linear moon base map. The sequel to Apprehension Arizona.

name: Basketball Slum Dunk 2024
summary: Can you build a legacy and lead your team to legendary status?

name: Backroom Escape: Labyrinth Horror
summary: Exciting horror about liminal spaces - try to escape from the dark labyrinth!

name: Badminton League
summary:
The most competitive badminton games ever! Take on your friends in 1 vs 1 mode, or win the Badminton League trophy in Tournament Mode!

Customizing your character with tons of items. And level up your ability to do stronger smash and jump!

Now grab your racket to smash, hit the shuttlecock, do a crazy smash to your opponent like badminton star!

name: Backrooms: Maintenance
summary: Welcome to the back office company. I am your manager, Carl. Please complete the task assigned by your superiors. Oh, by the way, be careful, any possible loss will cause damage to the company's property.

name: Bacteria Warfare
summary: This is a bacteria-cleansing game where you can use various weapons to eliminate germs.

name: Babylon Tower
summary: A color-matching puzzle game for the Uzebox.

name: Backpackers Guide to the Universe
summary: Platformer which adds elements of puzzle solving to the mix.

name: Bass Defense: First Memorythms
summary: In Bass Defense's rhythm-based and action-packed 'Soundwave' game mode, you must hit the correct buttons in time with the music to clear your NMYs and save your base with the help of your upgradable power-ups or your sense of rhythm. Try your luck and 5 memorythms in this free episode.

name: Banana-Shaped
summary: Banana-Shape is a clicker Game, in which you click on the banana shape!Win random banana shapes and grow your collection! Come hang out with us and let's become the kings of banana shapes!

name: Backspace Backspace Backspace
summary: In an AI-powered age where original authors have become largely redundant, play as a dejected writer on the brink of losing their creative drive forever.

name: Back
summary:
"Back" is a full-motion live action horror game. Players will take on the role of the “Ren Xing” and experience a suspenseful and bizarre journey in the game. In the game, the player will explore a huge villa. The villa hides a huge conspiracy, players will face different emergencies to choose different ways to respond, and different ways to respond will determine the final outcome.

Ren Xing as a real estate agent (thought at the time), came to a villa for field shooting, but accidentally fell into a horrible plot, players need to choose how to escape the villa. Finally through different choices to start different game endings. Whether the puzzle can be solved, or forever trapped in the villa, depends on the player's search and choice during the process.

name: Bass Defense
summary: Bass Defense combines musical rhythm-based gameplay with strategic elements. You must hit the correct buttons in time with the music to clear your NMYs who try to destroy your base, unless you save it with the help of your upgradable - defensive or offensive - power-ups or your sense of rhythm.

name: Battleship Avalon
summary: Rebuild the remnants of humanity and conquer the Milky Way in this strategy game. Colonize systems and corner markets, or lead your fleets to victory in real-time battles. Reclaim Earth, or terraform new worlds.

name: Backroom Company
summary: Backroom Company studies 'Noclip,' a supernatural phenomenon creating randomly linked backrooms. Its founders and purpose are unknown. Many explorers hired have disappeared in backrooms. Players trace past expeditions, farming unique items. Goal: deliver them to the main control room's dumbwaiter.

name: Backpack Brawl
summary:
Explore the immersive world of Backpack Brawl - a dynamic inventory management 2D auto-battle strategy game.

Unleash your strategic prowess as you purchase and craft potent items to achieve success in the game. Keep the momentum going by growing your inventory, expand your backpack capacity, and adapt to any challenges that lie ahead.

Placement matters! Putting the right items next to each other makes all the difference. Play smart and you'll do well.

Play against other players. You play against other players who have had the same opportunities as you. See what they come up with, and counter them! You might even learn some new tricks looking at what they do.

Choose between multiple Heroes to help shape your available items and inventory and choose the direction you like! Are you a spell-slinging elementalist? A hardy warrior? A long range marksman? As more heroes join the Brawl, the heroes you meet only get more challenging.

Fight your way to the top of the rankings!

name: Battle Babes: Lightning
summary: Battle Babes is a fast-paced strategy trading card game. Collect, strategize, and battle your way to victory with 7 powerful hero decks! Experiment with 250+ unique cards each with their own special abilities. Customize your decks and defeat the Dragon Clan!

name: Backrooms: The Labyrinth
summary: Explore non-linear paths and evade lurking monsters as you uncover the mysteries of this eerie maze. Beware of the sinister entities that inhabit the shadows, ready to drag you deeper into the unknown.

name: Backrooms The Company
summary: backrooms horror game

name: Barrok
summary: An arcade racing game in which you try to be first by beating other competitors.

name: Ball In The Box
summary: Move platforms to get the ball into the box in a challenging minimalist physics puzzle

name: Battle Teams 2: Wishlist Pack
summary: Battle Teams 2 Wishlist Pack.

name: Bagel
summary: "Bagel" is an exciting multiplayer online game. While civilians fight strategically to stop the Enemy, the Enemy does not hesitate to shout to hunt down civilians. Collect weapons, choose your class, and embark on a competitive school adventure!

name: Battleship Athena
summary: A sci-fi real time strategy game that allows you to design or download countless custom combat scenarios and play them single player or online with friends.

name: Barista
summary: A standalone freeware First-Person Shooter powered by ZDoom.

name: Balkan Bloodbath
summary: Become the next great dictator to forge a new Balkan Empire. Navigate the intense world of international trade and the stock market, use cunning espionage tactics to disrupt opponents, and overthrow and conquer your enemies. Strategy and secrecy are your keys to success in the Balkans.

name: BalloonBreaker
summary: Welcome to Balloon Breaker, the addictive and exhilarating game that will keep you entertained for hours! Your mission is simple but challenging: inflate and pop as many balloons as possible using your trusty mouse. Enjoy your balloons!!!

name: Bad Cat Good Dog Alien Force
summary: Bad Cat Good Dog Alien Force is an Arcade Space Wave Defense Shooter. As the forward line, take defense against dimensional invaders and blast your way through waves of incoming enemies. Upgrade your abilities and blast more effectively!

name: Ballad of Angels
summary: Collect power-ups, items, and gear to survive against others in this 2D top-down online pvp arena battler. Hone your skills and learn the tech involved with three combat styles, dashing, jumping, blocking, redirecting, and abilities. Collect power-ups to determine your unique build for the game.

name: Battle Axe & Final Vendetta Bundle
summary: Battle Axe: Battle Axe is an arcade top-down hack & slash featuring high-quality visuals created by veteran pixel artist Henk Nieborg, true to form game mechanics, and music from the legendary VGM composer Manami Matsumae – retro gamers rejoice!

name: Ball Control
summary: You are a ball, and you have to use your finger skills to reach the green zone, where you win and move on to the next level. The ball has gravity and you have to be careful that you might not be careful and break it.

name: Ball
summary: Earn a crate from a unique collection for every 3 hours you play. When you open a crate, you'll receive one random ball out of 15 possible options. The balls are divided into 5 different rarity levels. Do you have what it takes to collect them all?

name: Barbarization
summary: Barbarization is a roguelite dungeon crawler with elements of bullet hell, deck building and strategy. Civilization fell to the dark legions now swarming this land. From the ruins of what is left, unlikely heroes emerge to reclaim it from the scourge.

name: Backrooms: Facility Unknown
summary: Backrooms: Facility Unknown - Is a co-op horror game about exploration of dangerous facility. Wander around the complex alone or with friends. In any case, your task is to do your job and survive

name: Backseat
summary: Backseat is a horror game where you play as a taxi driver forced to transport sinister passengers and survive the ride. An unknown man has kidnapped your wife and demands you gather information on each passenger. Can you survive the night and uncover the mystery behind your wife's kidnapping?

name: Baby Mammoth's Journey to Mars
summary: Help the baby mammoth escape the end of the world! Outrun the avalanche, duck under hungry vultures, and bash through trees in this epic fight against extinction!

name: Balocks
summary: Balocks is a casual arcade game made for people that enjoy arrenging pieces without leaving spaces with a twist, you move all the pieces at the same time!

name: Banana & Tomato
summary: Banana & Tomato is a clicker game, in which you need to click on magic Banamatos to gain even more Banamatos! Play longer and click more often to get more unique items! Welcome to Banana & Tomato world!

name: Banana 2
summary: Banana 2 is a clicker Game, in which you click!!!

name: BathDad
summary: Help Dad Relax and Enjoy His Bath Time in This Fast-Paced Score Chasing.

name: Battle Train
summary: Outthink, outbuild, outblast! Battle Train combines deck-building and tactical rail combat. Upgrade your train, lay tracks, and destroy your rivals with devastating locomotives. The rails are your battlefield—will you be the last train standing?

name: Bargan's Treasure
summary: In "Bargan's Treasure," the player embarks on an adventure to restore a once-thriving village. After a disaster cut off power and water, the villagers fled, leaving puzzles in their wake. Your mission is to solve these puzzles, bring the villagers home, and revive the village.

name: Baseball Navigator
summary: Baseball Navigator is a simulation game in which the player takes the role of the new manager of a japanese baseball team, he can talk to the team members, decide the tactics and other things about the team.

name: Bazaar Simulator
summary: Bring the traditional market experience to the modern world! Arrange vegetables and fruits on stalls and fulfill customer orders. Set prices, hire staff, and expand your market. Online orders, home delivery, and much more coming soon.

name: Barbie Project Friendship
summary: Get ready for the ultimate Barbie gaming adventure as Barbie and Barbie work together to save a beloved Malibu landmark, the Malibu Waves Community Center! Join them and their friends on a fun adventure to transform six spaces into fabulous spots like the Pet Salon, Campsite, Tech Lab, and more.

name: Banana Simulator
summary: Banana Simulator is a story-driven comedic experience where you play through the various genres of games that have existed throughout video game history! Platformer? Check. RPG? Check. Visual Novel? Double check. The possibilities are endless!

name: Barro 2024
summary: Jumping is back!

name: Bananaman: Food Fighter
summary:
Peel the power in this week's exciting adventure, where our hero Bananaman takes on all his foes at once! (Well, more like one by one in hand to hand combat.) Will you take control of our potassium-powered hero, to beat back the baddies? OR will you play as one of Beanotown's villains?

Happy Birthday to Bananaman, Beanotown's very own food-based defender. But when the big blue guy's birthday celebrations get going, things rapidly go wrong. It's veritable villainy as Beanotown is under attack from a cake full of baddies.

Rotten to the core, the evil Appleman is here - but can Bananaman take a bite out of crime?

From outer space, King Zorg thinks this is (once again) the perfect time to take over Earth - can Bananaman send them back to space?

Things blow up when Bubblegum Bert pops onto the scene - can Bananaman burst his bubble?

Captain Cream comes to cause chaos - but can Bananaman make him cry over spilt milk?

The Heavy Mob are here for havoc - but can our hero give them the heave-ho?

The Mole might be making a move - but will Bananaman bury his criminal ambitions?

Things spell doom when Doctor Gloom appears with General Blight - but will Bananaman do what he can and try to win the fight?

Finally, namananaB from Gloom's magic mirror makes an appearance - but is he here to help or harm our hectic hero?

Mark the 40th Anniversary of Bananaman with this retro fighting game where YOU can have fun fisticuffs fighting a few of your favourite mischief makers. Meet Eric, the schoolboy who leads an exciting double life. For when Eric eats a banana, an amazing transformation occurs. Eric is Bananaman! From his first appearance in the Nutty comic in 1980, to his time living in Dandyville, the blue and yellow hero is now Beanotown's best (but not their brightest) hope against defeating evil

name: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden - Wanderer Set DLC
summary: Defend yourself from the supernatural and slash back against darkness with the Wanderer Set DLC. This gear set includes the Wanderer outfit and Cortador and Ascua, fabled weapons from a long lost, noted banisher.

name: Bad Credit? No Problem!
summary: Step into the shoes of a title loan agent for 14 days. Make tough decisions and uncover stories in a world where every choice matters.

name: Bang Bang Barrage
summary: Survive the treacherous sea in this quirky top-down roguelike shooter! Play solo or team up and fight off Cthulhu's minions. Master a unique recoil-based mechanic to blast enemies and chart your course. Mix and match upgrades to craft the perfect sea-surviving strategy!

name: Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning 64
Balls of Life
summary: Take your journey from cradle to grave in the happiest of all possible forms: a smiling yellow ball! Get a job, pay taxes. Pay taxes and get a job. Vote. Serve on a jury. Does it sound like fun yet? Did we mention paying taxes?

name: Barkour
summary: Step into the paws of a brave, four-legged special agent! In BARKOUR, you work for a secret organization where all agents are exceptionally skilled animals brought together by one goal: to save the world from the forces of evil (and mischievous cats)!

name: Baguette Wars
summary: Dive into the hilarious and intense clashes of Baguettes Wars in Paris, with 40 captivating levels, a unique cartoon style, and a leaderboard to challenge your friends!

name: Baby Bump: Book 1
summary: Baby Bump, Book 1 is the first book of the Baby Bump series. It is followed by Baby Bump, Book 2.

name: Baby Bump 2
summary: Baby Bump, Book 2 is the second and final book of the Baby Bump series. It succeeds its first book, Baby Bump, Book 1.

name: Bachelorette Party
summary: Bachelorette Party is the first and only book of the Bachelorette Party series.

name: Ballet Parking
summary: Bump into cars and make them spin like ballistic ballerinas until they reach the parking spot that matches their color. Make sure you use the right strategy: both the time and the number of hits are limited!

name: Back Alley Tales
summary: In a small town, you started working as a security guard and decided to check the data recordings from security cameras for fun. But you didn't know you would discover the tales of lascivious alleys...

name: Banana & Cucumber
summary: Banana & Cucumber is a clicker Game, in which you click a Banana & Cucumber! In Banana & Cucumber you click the Banana & Cucumber to gain even more Banana & Cucumber!

name: Banana Monkeys
summary: Banana Monkeys: The Ultimate Monkey Collection.Dive into the enchanting world of Banana Monkeys, where you collect whimsical, quirky monkeys every 3 hours and share the fun with friends through trading and exciting events. Join a vibrant community of collectors!

name: Bananamana
summary: Bananamana is a clicker Game

name: Banana Gine
summary: Banagine is a clicker game. There is a banana and there is an aubergine. So, this is a Banagine. Click to Banagine and count more Banagine. Because everyone loves Banagine!

name: Bauhaus Bonk
summary: In this single-player game of skill, the movement is not straightforward. Switch between pivot points to maneuver your way through Bauhaus art-inspired arcade levels. Avoid obstacles, reach the goal and beat the high score!

name: Banana Cat
summary: Banana Cat is a simple clicker in which you click a “catnana” (a fusion from a cat and a banana). If you wait a specific amount of hours you’ll obtain cat bananas, some cat bananas will also be drawn by YOU in our discord server. What are you waiting for? Come and click banana cats with us!

name: Banana 2: Fruit
summary: Bop your banana.

name: Backyard Beans
summary: Lovingly smack your loved ones and stylishly throw them into various things! As Backyard Beans, you meet where it hurts and joyfully brawl through your circle of friends.

name: Badminton Time
summary: Get ready to move your arms to hit the badminton shuttlecock and become the new champion!

name: Battle Wizard Attack
summary: Unleash your inner spell caster in this action-packed, retro-style RPG! Choose from eight powerful magic disciplines and face monstrous hordes across sprawling maps packed with destructible chaos.

name: Baldy Dash
summary: A browser game based on Shaun the Sheep.

name: Baki-baki Memoir
summary:
A collaboration game with a famous YouTuber!

Control the main character, Gunpi, and conquer the three heroines!

name: Banana Tap
summary: fun and addictive game, your goal is to tap on various unique and advanced types of bananas

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo
summary: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo enables players to customise their decks with new cosmetic card skins featuring characters from The Witcher 3, Dave the Diver, Vampire Survivors, and Among Us.

name: Bards College Expansion
summary: A mod for Skyrim Creations that greatly expands the Bards College with a brand new main questline, new side quests, mini-games, shouts, abilities, skill system, weapons, and more to help you become a Bard!

name: B-Air Micro
summary: Made for #lowrezjam and carried on afterward, B-Air Micro is a roguelike-like in the vein of games like Spelunky. Explore the treacherous caverns deep below the earth and define your aspirations as one of eleven unique classes. Do you have the courage to venture to the bottom?

name: Backrooms Media
summary: Backrooms Media is a multiplayer co-op exploration game that plunges you into unsettling, hyper-realistic liminal spaces. Navigate eerie environments filled with lurking horrors. Group up with your friends to face the terror of the endless backrooms together and... try to escape.

name: Balloon to the Moon 2
summary: Balloon to the Moon 2 is a Semi-Open World Retro Style Platformer inspired by Jet Set Willy. After the First Game, Peter made it to the Moon but is then greeted by the moon's Inhabitants. Which are humans with rabbit ears. The Moon Rabbit Princess offers you to live with them if you can complete a trail to grab all the moon treasures scattered throughout the moon. You will have to navigate several areas to grab all the treasures.

name: BallZ DX
summary: Ultimate block breaker with all the bells and whistles

name: BattleCore Arena: Kaps Pack
summary: Unlock the entire appearance of Kaps for your core and banner, along with 2,200 Battlecoins to use in BattleCore Arena on boosts and cosmetics. This offer can only be purchased once.

name: BattleCore Arena: Premium Founders Pack
summary: Get access to the content of the Founders Pack along with an emote, a title, and one additional season pass token. This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.

name: BattleCore Arena: Founder's Pack
summary: Get access to an exclusive Core appearance, banner background and symbol, a title, and one season pass token with the Founders Pack. This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.

name: Bakahazard
summary: Embark on a journey of several can-be-seen-everywhere ordinary students from the "Breakfast High School" saving the world, in this simple traditional turn-based RPG that makes no sense at all.

name: Bao Bao's Cozy Laundromat
summary: Relax in Bao Bao’s Cozy Laundromat, an idle game where you join Bao Bao, a charming panda, in creating the coziest laundromat. Purchase colorful washing machines, add delightful decorations, and hire panda helpers. Watch your cozy laundromat bustle with life, even when you’re not around!

name: Back to Base(Q2)ics Jam 1
summary: The Back to Base(Q2)ics Jam 1 Mission Pack contains 16 brand new maps, each with their own story intermission and offering hours of gameplay. There is also an expansive hub map containing a secret level and a boss map, bringing the grand total to 18.

name: Baroque Darts
summary: Baroque Darts is a darts game in the baroque serie for i-mode and EZplus, distributed by Sting Station.

name: Baroque: Become a Meta-Being
summary:
The world collapsed due to the unprecedented disaster "Great Heat".
In this distorted world, people couldn't keep their shape as human beings.

You noticed that you became a Meta-Being "Grue"
and wandered around the distorted and ever-changing "Neuro Tower".

name: Batman: Rogue City
summary: Batman rogue city is a doom total conversion mod featuring the famous caped crusader as he works to take down his rogues gallery once again. The game controls similarly to doom eternal, using the zmovement mod as a base. Grapple up buildings, sneak up on thugs, and drive the batmobile in the best doom superhero experience to date.

name: Babe and Friends: Animated Preschool Adventure
summary: Babe and Friends: Animated Preschool Adventure (aka Babe und seine Freunde: Ein Abenteuer für Kinder im Vorschualter, Babe y sus amigos: Aventuras para los más pequeños) is a video game published in 1999 on Windows by TDK Recording Media Europe S.A.. It's an adventure and educational game, set in a math / logic and pre-school / toddler themes, and was also released on Mac.

name: Ball Rise Up
summary: Rise up the ball higher! Challenge your friends for the highest score!

name: Badge(r)s
summary:
The game all about creating, sharing, collecting and moving virtual swag!

Badge(r)s! the casual location based (aka GPS) MMO.

name: Backwater Eulogy
summary:
Backwater Eulogy is a stream of consciousness, autobiographical exploration of loss and the double-sided nature of grief. Told as a linear narrative, there are no choices, and there are no alternate endings. Sit and stay for a moment, before leaving.

Taking the form of a short visual novel, this is a short story of sorts about grief, moving on, and life in the rural Midwest. As a "kinetic novel" there are no alternative routes or choices- just one storyline to follow to its inevitable conclusion. Placing an emphasis on a small, curated experience, it is best experienced in one sitting.

name: Bartolomeo, Misled by Circumstances, Learns that Appearances can be Deceptive
summary: Bartolomeo has always dreamed of meeting his favourite poet. Could the man wounded in his house be him?

name: Bally Fears: The Introduction Game
summary: You are a child named Reyes Spherikaw. Your mother passed away a few days ago, but Reyes doesn't know this yet. Your father has brought you to his workplace because there was no one to look after you. The game begins when your father calls you to warn you about something...

name: Battlefield 6
summary: The ultimate all-out warfare experience. In a war of tanks, fighter jets, and massive combat arsenals, your squad is the deadliest weapon.

name: Baldur's Gate Java Game
summary: The award-winning RPG series comes to your mobile phone! One of the most beloved Dungeons & Dragons interactive adventures ever, Baldurs Gate set the standard for character development and storyline. Explore the treacherous dungeons of the Forgotten Realms where treasures are plenty, magic & monsters abound and fantastic adventure awaits.

name: Backrooms Horror Escape
summary: Are you ready to face your fears?

name: Barbuta
summary:
Explore the castle but watch out for traps!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Battleship
summary:
Sink or be sunk! Deploy smart tactics and a powerful arsenal to bring down your opponent's hidden fleet in this classic guessing game.

Make every guess count in this timeless, turn-based strategy game of nautical cat and mouse. Arrange your ships on the grid and engage in thrilling naval battles with players around the globe to see who can locate and sink the other's fleet first.

A lineup of special weapons adds new tactical depth, while customizable ship skins, player avatars and more let you take command of your game. Full speed ahead — your legend awaits!

name: Backyard Baseball '97
summary: Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997, now updated for modern systems! Build your roster from among the iconic Backyard Kids, aim for those home runs, and various game modes. Relive the magic of this classic baseball game!

name: Backrooms Cleanup Crew
summary: Backrooms Cleanup Crew is a fresh combo of cleanup simulator and fast-paced action, all set in the liminal halls of the Backrooms

name: Battlefield 1918
summary: The total conversion modification Battlefield 1918 (or BF1918 for short) takes Battlefield 1942 into a whole new scenario, the first world war.

name: Banquet for Fools
summary: The Pavura needs four volunteers to solve the mystery of an abandoned village. Answer the call in this party-based action adventure RPG.

name: Battle Mountain
summary: Battle Mountain, the pinnacle of Combat Climbing. Athletes from all over the globe gather to claim the ultimate prize: The Crowntain to grant their deepest wish. Fight across challenging maps with your friends in competitive 2-6 player chaos.

name: Banshee: Demon Girl
summary: BANSHEE is a single-player third-person soulsborne stealth action game. The first Japanese kunoichi in 16th century Europe: an incredible story of revenge from beyond the grave. Fight with a katana, move like a ninja, seduce like a geisha, and use vampiric abilities, learn from mistakes.

name: Babelomania
summary: A technogothic horror where a beautiful wedding turns into a death trap... Who will survive?

name: Baseball Superstars 2024
summary:
Baseball Superstars 2024 is a fantasy baseball game inspired by the Gamevil sports game franchise!
Develop unique players and relive the nostalgia of the original Baseball Superstars series with Baseball Superstars 2024!
Show off your incredible pitches and batting skills with the Elite Players you produce!
Train your fantastic players with the key trainers of the series!
Participate in exciting events and claim treasure trove of rewards! Jump in now and join the fun!

name: Bathday
summary: Bathday is a short horror game in which you will find yourself in a public shower room. All you need to do is shower and go home after a hard day's work. But, while taking a shower, you ever have any thoughts of “Do I really exist?” or “What if, when I close my eyes, the world disappears?”...

name: Backrooms: Spirits of the Forgotten
summary: Escape the nightmare of the Backrooms—if you dare.

name: Babel Defender
summary: Build your tower during the day. Reach 100 floors to reach the heavens, from where the Almighty dominates you. But at night, fear the lightning wrath of God who wants to punish your insolence and defend your tower at all costs!

name: Banana Blitz
summary: Banana Blitz is an exclusively online multiplayer running game where players must use their wits and reflexes to outrun, outsmart, and backstab their friends to be the first to reach the finish. Set traps, unleash chaos, and steal the idol at the last second as you battle for supremacy in thrilling, fast-paced races.

name: Babette
summary: There's this old 90s virtual pet game at a yard sale. It's called 'Babette'. Now you can play with Babette the cat from the comfort of your bedroom. Just you and her! Keep Babette happy by playing with her, feeding her, and more! Except... Babette's more than just a cat. And she's coming for you.

name: Barheim
summary: A single-player, 3D Time Management Tower Defense where players experience the chaos of mixing drinks and maintaining a bar while defending themselves from thirsty Vikings!

name: Bakudan Baku-tan
summary: A simple caravan shooter with tiny creatures. A game focused on scoring points while dodging the hell of bullets and defeating enemies.

name: Bara Labs
summary: Bara Labs is a short collection of experimental prototype games made by our team. We will decide whether or not to make a full-length game out of the shorts based on how the prototypes are received by the players.

name: Bambi: A Life in the Woods
summary: This visual novel follows Bambi, now an adult and respected leader in the forest, alongside his longtime friends and new children, Geno and Gurr.

name: Bad Parenting 1: Mr. Red Face
summary: Mr. Red Face, a fictional character created by adults to teach their children, suddenly becomes real..

name: Bat to the Beat
summary: Swing your bat to the beat in this cricket-themed rhythm action game. Travel the world, mastering the unique rhythms of each location with easy-to-learn two button controls. Score as many runs as you can, batting to the beat and switching between attack and defense.

name: Balls Crush Simulator
summary: The only simulator where you can crush balls with fun and pleasure!

name: BangXBang
summary: Bang x Bang is a text adventure game with elements of homosexual love, in which you are the son of a gangster, and even though you don't want to get involved in your "family business", one day a big gangster wolf suddenly finds you, then your peaceful life is far away from you...​

name: Back Alley Arcane Shop
summary: Back Alley Arcane Shop is a fantasy world-based furry gay romance visual novel. You become the protagonist - Resque, who runs a arcane shop in a back alley, and you will meet four furries. Discover the fate and future of the Arcane shop with your partner.

name: Bank Robber
summary: Bank Robber is a variant of Commodore's Money Wars. The player controls a man who has to move money from the bank to his home. The bank is located on the left side of the screen while the home is located on the right side. The buildings can however only be entered when their doors are opened. From the sky, meteorites are falling and the player has to avoid being hit by these while moving across the screen. Getting hit means a life is lost. Other things falling from the sky are pills that give an extra life when eaten and bricks that when caught builds or repairs one of three protection buildings (similar to the shields in Space Invaders). At the end of the game the player gets a ranking depending on the amount of cash that has been collected.

name: Bat Cage
summary:
Bat Cage is an action game where the player has to capture bats while fighting off other bats that try to rescue them. The playing field consists of a bat cage in the bottom and above it a bat flap around and there are also eight bat eggs bouncing around. The player controls a bar that can be moved around freely. It is used to capture the bat eggs which are taken to the bat cage where they can hatch. As soon as the hatching begins the bat at the top of the screen will attack and try to rescue the egg. The player then has to use the bar to fend it off. It works a bit similar to Breakout as the bat will bounce back up again when it makes contact with the bar. The player then scores points as long as the egg hatches. Ultimately the attacking bat will give up and retreat and the player can move on to the next egg that needs to be captured.

As the game goes on the player will reach bonus levels and the number of attacking bats will increase. The game is over when the bats stay at the top of the screen and no longer attack when the player hatches his eggs. The game can be set to different skill levels (1-36) that alters the speed of the game.

name: Barbecue With Friends
summary: "Shashlik" is a multiplayer simulator of kebab cooking. You will make marinade, prepare coals and grill kebabs! You'll also be able to put out the mangal with water, marinate a stone, put a friend on a skewer and drink beer!

name: BattleCards Saga
summary: BattleCards Saga, the strategic card game where every fusion reveals a new creature and every battle shapes your legend.

name: Bar Night VR
summary: Mix. Serve. Restock. Fill. Repeat. Bar Night VR is a VR bartender experience where you manage a bar, being responsible for serving customers, restocking drinks, filling machines, and more. Progress through the nights and master the bartender experience!

name: Bandit Buster: Western
summary: Bandit Buster: Western – Stop the Bandits, Save the Town, and Watch Out for Explosive Surprises!

name: Back Light
summary: Back Light was made for the Game Boy Jam in about 4 days. In Back Light you play a kid up way past their bed time. You just want to play your game boy but this is before hand held gaming had back lights. So to increase you happy meter and score stand under a lit lamp. Make sure to keep your happy meter up and avoid your Mom to try and get the highest score!

name: Balloon Jerks
summary: Bubble matching arcade game.

name: Bankiware
summary: This game was created in a short period of time for the Touhou Game Jam 2024.

name: Bad Cheese
summary: Bad Cheese is a psychological horror inspired by the eerie charm of 1920s animation. Step into the tiny paws of a mouse spending the weekend at home with a dysfunctional Dad while Mom's away. Be on your best behavior and KEEP DADDY HAPPY.

name: Balanced
summary: A cozy deckbuilder about balancing the forces of nature: sit back, relax, and enjoy this zen game of life and harmony. How long can you keep the scale Balanced?

name: Backrooms: Partygoers
summary: Backrooms: Partygoers is a backrooms horror game based on Level 0 where you play as a researcher tasked to find anomalies inside the backrooms. You are equip with devices that can beep whenever an anomaly is near, where the partygoers roam and can hear you.

name: Battle For Vera
summary: Battle for Vera is a Real-Time Strategy game that draws inspiration from beloved classics, and improves upon many of their ideas to create an exciting new experience.

name: Ball Game
summary: Welcome to ball game! Roll, bounce, and spin your way through a series of ball based obstacles and levels. Be careful not to fall too many times or take too long, but most importantly, have fun!

name: Back to the Rooms
summary: Back to the Rooms is a 6-player co-op horror experience. Survive and explore the backrooms with your friends or alone to save your home.

name: Basketball Legends 24
summary: Build Your Dream Basketball Team. Own Your Legacy.

name: Back Alley Darts
summary: Back Alley Darts is a crowd-play game designed Back Alley Darts Game experience. The aim of the game is try and get a bulls eye or the hiest points going and be the top of the leaderboard. The more points you get the better it is as you will unlock stuff in the game to be able to use in the game

name: Bananounce
summary: Idle game with banana bouncing everywhere!

name: Baldi's Basics The Ancient Save
summary: This game offers a rich storyline, building on the classic Baldi's Basics experience. Players are drawn into a deeper mystery, facing new challenges and unexpected twists. With added characters, puzzles, and secrets, it expands the universe with a thrilling and engaging plot.

name: Bad Time Trio
summary: This is the original bad time trio. by mcatr

name: Battle Spirits CrossOver
summary: Battle Spirits CrossOver is a digital card video game developed and published by FuRyu.

name: Battleshots: Chaos Edition
summary: Strategize, plot, and maneuver your ships across the game board, carefully targeting your opponent's vessels while safeguarding your own. But beware, as for every attack could be influenced by unpredictable random events that shake up the traditional gameplay dynamics.

name: Battle Squares
summary: Battle Squares is an online, eight-directional 2D shooter where players control customizable square characters and fight in multiplayer matches using a mix of two class types.

name: Battleminer Giants
summary: Step into a breathtaking voxel open world from the creator of BattleminerZ, where towering giants, forged from the landscape itself, roam the land shaping the fate of kingdoms.

name: Battle Kitty
summary: Kitty and Orc brawl with monsters, beat out rivals — and need your help to move through Battle Island and become champion in this interactive adventure!

name: Barry Bonds enter the world of Myst
summary:
Barry Bonds, surreal adventures, and the becoming his world thereof

An adventure game set in the world of MYST starring Barry Bonds, made by Jon Bois for the website Progressive Boink, back in 2005.

name: Bamboo Retro Run
summary: Run, jump, and slash your way through endless retro action!

name: Ball Rush 2
summary: Smash a path to the finish!

name: Banana-Clicker
summary: Unlock rare banana treasures with every click!

name: Barro F22: Pack #2
summary: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Barro GT: Pack #2
summary: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Barro T23: Pack #2
summary: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Bat Bots
summary: Enjoy a modern take on timeless arcade action with Bat Bots, a nostalgic shooter inspired by the classics. Take down waves of robotic bats using precise aim and quick reflexes. Engage in solo play, challenge your friends and family, or work together to defend against the oncoming waves.

name: Batography
summary: Play as a curious bat on his mission to take a full fledged photo of the moon. Run, Climb, Glide and Snap your way through an array of obstacles while interacting with the cheeky characters in the neighborhood. Can you collect all ten moon cakes?

name: BakaSonic
summary:
BakaSonic is a hack of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Mega Drive by Bakayote. A demo of it was submitted for the 2014 Sonic Hacking Contest.

Started by Bakayote as practice for hacking, BakaSonic has been evolving since its creation, even being a prank at one point early in its development. This hack contains level art, object art, code and music modifications.

name: Battlerace Support Package
summary: Your purchase of the package is crucial for our operations, enabling the development of more innovative games. With your help, we can continue working on creating satisfying productions that will deliver unique experiences to our players. Thank you for your support!

name: Banana Next Gen
summary: Banana Next Gen is a fun-filled 2D/3D side-scroller where you control a flying banana trapped in the Banana King's castle. Collect coins, unlock levels, and face the tyrannical Banana King in an epic final showdown. Can you save your family and escape?

name: Ball Race Party
summary: Ball Race Party is a game where you race against time or other players with your physical ball. You can play single player or multiplayer.

name: Bane of Oakenshade
summary: Enter a dark world filled with mystery and evil. A brooding atmospheric first person dungeon crawler. Featuring multiple spells,weapons and armor. A vast amount of lore to indulge in if desired. Large maps encouraging exploration. 9 areas to explore featuring 10 dark ambient immersive soundtracks. Hours of game-play with rewarding character progression. An unfolding story to discover.

name: Backyard Soccer '98
summary: Return to the soccer field with your favorite Backyard athletes! The original Backyard Soccer 1998 is back and now enhanced to run on Steam. Build your roster from among the iconic Backyard Kids. Kick, pass, and score in this classic game that made soccer fun for everyone!

name: Battle Gear 4 Tuned
summary:
Battle Gear 4 Tuned was an update to Battle Gear 4, and the last game in the Battle Gear series, released by Taito in 2006. Alongside the original Battle Gear 4, the game saw a direction change of trying of more of being a coin-operated Gran Turismo.

Released in November 2006 in Japan as an update for Battle Gear 4; later re-released for export markets in 2010 without support for the NESYS service, but with additional tracks (previously NESYS exclusive content in the original release) enabled. The NESYS online service closed on March 31, 2019.

name: Barkane: The Folds of Calamity
summary: Take control of Marmalade, a magical Shiba Inu, on her journey to traverse a paper world and collect the gems of ultimate power! In Barkane: the Folds of Calamity, players navigate a series of 3D paper-folding puzzles, where they must manipulate the level itself to progress. Players can fold sections of the level along joints, allowing them to reshape the world, navigate around obstacles, and solve clever challenges. Move Marmalade around the level in order to collect the crystal shards, activate the goal, and progress to the following level.

name: Battlenauts
summary: Battlenauts is a 4-way mixed reality space strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of a cosmic struggle. As the commander of Earth's starfleet, you find yourself racing against rival factions to control a newly discovered, mysterious anomaly. This anomaly is the gateway to an entire new solar system and it’s resources, and every decision you make could tip the balance of the galaxy. Prepare for an intense, fast-paced experience that combines strategy, tactical combat, and dynamic multiplayer competition.

name: Base Jumping
summary: Open your parachute as close to the ground as possible to win.

name: Balatro: Special Edition
summary: Balatro: Special Edition Includes 10 physical versions of the in-game cards.

name: Back 4 Blood: Fort Hope Elite Weapon Skins
Bardia
summary:
Bardia is a story of gallantry, courage and historical facts based on Alexander of Macedon’s attack on Iran, the circumstances around the Achaemenid Persian Empire and the sacrifice and resistance of Aryobarzan and the brave soldiers of Iran. Through action-adventure gameplay, the story unfolds itself.

Bardia, an adventurous puzzle game, appeals to both domestic and international audiences. Bardia, familiarizes Iranians with historical figures and segments from their history. For the international audience, it shows the battle that really took place between Alexander of Macedon and Aryobarzan, contrary to what the film 300 depicted.

Bardia is based on historical documents and readings of sections of the Achaemenid period; and for the first time, all of Persepolis, Iran’s most historic site, has been built and put to display in a computer game.

A 3D graphic game, Bardia pays special attention to the architecture and clothing during the time of the Achaemenids: Particular attention has been given to the type of clothing military personal wore during this time.

name: Battle Teams 2: She Panda Gift Pack
summary: Unlock the pack now and enhance your gaming experience!

name: Bakso Simulator 2
summary: The Sequel to Bakso Simulator with new gameplay, areas, characters, and more!

name: Battaglia Navale & Forza 4
summary: The game "Battaglia navale & Forza 4", developed by Evviva! Software, combines two classic board games into a single digital package. Released on Windows platforms, this game includes the strategic naval combat of Battaglia navale and the logic-based challenges of Forza 4.

name: Baseball
summary: Step up to the plate in Baseball, a simple yet thrilling game where you control all the action on the field. Choose between easy, medium, or hard difficulty to match your skill level and start swinging!

name: Backrooms: Inside the Escape
summary: Venture through a labyrinth of seemingly endless, creepily familiar corridors based on popular Creepypasta lore.

name: Bashful Adoration
summary: Fight for your love with 2-4 friends locally or online in easy-to-learn, hard-to-master combat. Soar the skies on your broom, and dash and smash props and opponents until they're a twinkling dot on the horizon! Secure powerups, land devastating blows, and win the adoration of your crush!

name: Bambas!
summary: Relive your childhood and turn every crosswalk, curb, and puddle into an epic adventure with this innovative urban walking simulator.

name: Battle Spirits: Character Play Sheet Set 1
Battleship War Multiplayer
summary:
Battleship War is the classic strategy/skill game.

Hit all the ships of your enemy and lead your fleet to the victory!

Two games mode:
Classic: Guess the position of your enemy’s ships and destroy them!
Advanced: Collect points and buy 2 special power-up.

Also challenge your friends with online multiplayer!

name: Balantica
summary: Safely guide the twins to the altar. The path to the altar branches into multiple routes, each filled with trials and unexpected events awaiting the twins. As their companion, you will choose their path, build a deck of cards to give hope and overcome increasingly challenging trials.

name: Barney: The Land of Make Believe
Bank Simulator
summary: Bank Simulator puts you in charge of a dynamic bank, from developing sections and overseeing transactions to making strategic investments. Build customer loyalty, expand services, and manage financial risks to grow your bank into a top financial institution where every decision counts!

name: Bath House Simulator
summary: Immerse yourself in a working bath house, where you're responsible for cleaning all clients ranging from Spirits to Warriors and General Guests. Using and upgrading a variety of tools, you're responsible for making sure every client leaves feeling fresh and cleaned of all mud, grime, and gunk!

name: Baptisterio
summary: With an analog camera, a gift from my father, a photo of the missing tourists and the illusion of my first big news I prepare to enter with the brothers to the enigmatic baptistery.

name: Batman & Flash
summary: Batman & Flash is a hack of Konami's Monster in My Pocket for the NES/Famicom.

name: Bat Galaxy
summary: Half on-rails shooter, half exploration-driven adventure. Zoom into a world where billions of bullets surround you and your handy punch feature can send enemies flying.

name: Battow: Mages And Monsters
summary: Battow - Mages And Monsters is a bouncing bullet game, the player clicks somewhere on the screen for the Mage to throw a spell in that direction. The spell bounces off the walls of the scene, and the player will need to use this to their advantage to hit the rival. Every time the player collects a chest or shield, he is protected for one round, that is, will defend himself if he is hit by the monster's spell. It's a relaxing atmosphere game, simple and easy to play. There are 5 Mages, 20 monsters and 100 levels.

name: Banebush
summary: Banebush - is a non-linear and very red visual novel in the horror genre. Would you dare to step towards a fairy tale if it turns out to be true?

name: Battlefront+
summary: Battlefront+ is the largest ongoing mod project for Star Wars Battlefront II (2017), featuring a massive expansion to its roster of characters, selection of abilities, and list of appearances, all while maintaining a philosophy of diversity, balance, and compatibility with the fabric of the vanilla game. This project has continually pushed the boundaries of Battlefront II, bringing forth new and unique content, thanks to the combined efforts and contributions of the most talented members in the game's community.

name: BattleHeights
summary:
BattleHeights is a multiplayer party game combining elements of aerial combat, fantasy, and physics-based mechanics.

Players engage in matches across floating maps, using abilities like double jumps, grappling hooks, and wind spells to outmaneuver and outwit their opponents. The gameplay revolves around creative movement, strategic use of terrain, and team-based objectives in modes like King of the Hill, Team Deathmatch and other fun activities, like a Grappling Race.

The game features cartoony physics, emphasizing fun and laughter over competitive intensity.

name: Bad Manors
summary: On Friday the 13th, your plans for a spooky Halloween night are dashed when you show up alone at the escape room reserved by your friend. You consider going home when a handsome stranger offers to accompany you. Maybe the night is saved after all… Or so you thought.

name: Base Blitz
summary: Two teams battle it out in a high-stakes capture-the-flag competition. Set on resource-filled battlegrounds, each team must protect their base while devising strategies to infiltrate the enemy's. Your flag is perched on the roof of your base just out of enemy reach, but so is theirs. The only way in? Tear down their walls by gathering resources, crafting items such as pickaxes, bombs and cannons, and launch a full-scale blitz!

name: Battleboats.io
summary: Battleboats.io is a real-time, real-fun multiplayer game. Play together in teams, upgrade your might.

name: Battle Academy
summary: The Xbox 360 version of BBC Battlefield Academy includes the main game and all released six add-ons.

name: Baby Kaizo World 2
summary: A sequel to Baby Kaizo World by Nowieso

name: Backpack Boy
summary: Backpack Boy is off on one of his treks when he discovers a peculiar flashlight that changes the world around him. Explore a seemingly abandoned structure in this puzzle platformer built around mode-swapping.

name: Battle Mayhem
summary: Dive into the action-packed world of Battle Mayhem, a fast-paced multiplayer showdown where strategy, skill, and creativity are your ultimate weapons! Designed for endless fun and fierce competition, Battle Mayhem pits two players against each other in a thrilling fight to be the last one standing.

name: Babataire
summary: A solitaire inspired heavily by Zachtronics' Cluj solitaire, with Baba Is You character art on the cards!

name: Babataire EX
summary: Another solitaire, this time with actual Baba Is You mechanics! Stack all suits in order from 1 to 10, and form rules to help you on your way!

name: Ballistic.exe
summary: Ballistic.exe is an advanced weapon simulator, with challenging true-to-life aiming mechanics, full weapon manipulation and customization, and highly accurate ballistic calculations.

name: Battle Royal: Battlegrounds Call
summary: Where Survival is Earned, Victory is Inherited.

name: Battle Frenzy Collection
summary: Slash and mine for gold and glory!

summary: Retro arcade bat & ball goodness

summary: A box of a series of cards with barcodes based on The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past, for use with the Barcode Battler II. It has its own gameplay rules, given by the manual.

name: Bang Bang Pull Pull
summary: Ride a mining cart to the depths of the Earth in this fast-paced FPS adventure. Grab what's not glued, shoot everything that moves, explore different paths, and aim for the best run in these handcrafted levels.

name: Bad Faith
summary: A Mother brings her son to a specialized "Weight Loss" Clinic in order to help him lose weight. But for weeks, treatment had shown no progress...

name: Batter Up!
summary: Bounce your baseball off the faces of zombies in this arena twin-stick shooter! Build synergies with passive upgrades and create chaos on the battlefield.

name: Banana Extreme
summary: A banana clicking game that is extreme, collect bananas and achieve a higher and higher rank! Can you collect enough bananas to get to the boss at the end?

name: Bad Dream
summary: You're stuck in school. What has trapped you is a non-human creature. Run away from him (her?). Find the key and escape from the school to survive. Use w,a,s,d, ESC, left shift, mouse

name: Barcode Battler II: Senyou Card Software - Super Mario World
summary: A box of a series of cards with barcodes based on Super Mario World for use with the Barcode Battler II. It has its own gameplay rules, given by the manual.

name: Backrooms Journey: Into the unknown
summary: Explore the vast, ever-shifting world of the Backrooms in this eerie adventure. Navigate endless corridors, encounter otherworldly entities, and uncover the secrets hidden within this surreal realm.

name: Barcode Battler II: Super Mario Kart - Mario
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario Kart - Luigi
Bananitro
summary: Bananitro is a 2D game where you control Monkey on his bicycle, using Bananitro to perform maneuvers and conquer obstacle-filled tracks, with creativity as the key to success.

Backrooms Level X
summary: Enter the disturbing world of Backrooms Level X, a first-person narrative survival horror game that immerses you in an endless labyrinth of desolate and liminal spaces. 13 levels and giant enemies await you in this unique experience.

name: Bahamut: Remake
summary: In this land where magic and crisis intersect, a blue-haired boy fearlessly joins the ranks of adventurers with the ambition of defeating the legendary Dragon God Bahamut. Facing countless trials and challenges of fate, he will uncover the hidden truth and embark on his own destiny journey.

name: Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Mario (Game Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Luigi (Game Ichizoku)

Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Hell Amb. (Hero Ichizoku)
Back in Service: A Metro Driver
summary: Join the adventure and become the master of the Prague metro in our game, which takes you into the underground world of the capital city. Explore stations and overcome challenges on the tracks from the cabin of a historic train. Can you complete the route, transport all passengers, and avoid delays?

name: Ballotron Galaxy
summary:
Discover the newest challenge in your favorite arcade!
Blast off into space and put your skills to the test once again.
Shoot small balls to strike larger balls and blocks.
Uncover creative solutions to connect the blue and green ball.
Experiment with unique strategies to overcome challenging, logic-based puzzles.

name: Backyard Boxing
summary: Backyard Boxing" is a gritty urban boxing game where you fight to rise through an illegal league while hustling in the streets. Battle fierce opponents, gamble, race, deal, and travel to new cities, gaining fans and respect. Dominate the league and become a street legend!

name: Barcode World Senyou Card: Carry (Dead Zone)
Barcode World Senyou Card: Kane Gardner (Chou Wakusei Senki MetaFight)

Barcode Battler II: Batman Returns - Batman
Barcode Battler II: Batman Returns - Catwoman
Barcode Battler II: Batman Returns - Penguin
Barcode Battler II: Batman Returns - Michael Keaton / Danny DeVito / Michelle Pfeiffer
Bad-Draw
summary: This game is in the type of 2D platformer. It's about the revenge of a character made of drawings.

name: Battle Run
summary: Battle Run is an online multiplayer game in real time where you compete in races against users worldwide to add up as many points as possible.

name: Battle Run
summary:
Ready, set, RUN! Welcome to Battle Run! The adrenaline-pumping party racing game loved by millions of fans is back!

From the studio behind Tap Titans 2 and the popular Beat The Boss franchise, comes the return of long-awaited and fan-favourite real-time running multiplayer game - Battle Run!

Escape wicked rockets, evade spinning axes, and navigate past sneaky hazards - it's the ultimate race to the finish line!

Party up and play with your friends in an action-packed race and charge into first place! Become a racing legend as you outrun your opponents and compete in real-time multiplayer battles!

With runner’s like Ryder and his volcanic rain, Dust’s high-speed skateboard, and Macie’s explosive leap, it’s an attack blitz waiting to happen!

Revamped with all-new Runners, explosive items, and racing across vibrant worlds, this is Battle Run like never before.

name: Baba Yaga
summary: A turn-based roguelike game of strategic combat and sinister magic. Decimate the king’s loyalist forces, grow your powers, and discover the reimagined origin story of Baba Yaga, the most feared witch of Slavic folklore!

name: Bad Parenthood
summary: Survive the nightmare born from your own stories.

name: Baker's Agony
summary: Enter the dungeon to get the coveted sacred flour in this sword-focused action-roguelike. Make your way through bizarre and/or cute bread creatures thanks to the weapons and resources you'll find along the way, and if you don't succeed, try again, as the dungeon will have changed.

name: Back To Back
summary: Back To Back is a Top-Down Rogue-Lite built for Multiplayer. Survive endless waves of enemies while continuing to get stronger, but be careful to work with your friends as their bullets are just as dangerous as the enemy's.

name: Balkan Horror Tales
summary: Dive into a folklore-inspired horror survival narrative rooted in Eastern European legends. Experience the eerie atmosphere of the Eastern European nature alongside iconic horror figures like Baba Yaga and the Sack Man. Navigate through the detailed setting and lifestyle, uncovering more of the immersive storyline and make your own decision that will determine your fate in this gripping tale.

name: Balancing Cats
summary:
Tilt your phone to help a clever cat balance food while catching falling treats in a physics-based kitchen!

Challenge other players to reach the TOP!

name: Bandit
summary: Bandit is an unreleased title from Acornsoft. It is a clone of the 1979 arcade game Cosmic Guerilla from Universal.

name: Battle Of Witches
summary: Bouncing bullet game, the player clicks somewhere on the screen for the fairy to throw a spell in that direction. The spell bounces off the walls of the scene, and the player will need to use this to their advantage to hit the rival.

name: Bathhouse Creatures
summary: Ready, set, bath! Build and manage your bathhouse for animals in this casual and cozy management game. Keep your bathtubs clean and filled, serve a cast of whimsical creatures, decorate your bathhouse with your hard-earned cash, and be the best bathhouse there can be!

name: Bazar Simulator: The Wan Story
summary: Bazaar Simulator takes you to Boqueron City, where you will help Wan manage his uncle Wang Long's bazaar while uncovering dark secrets. Customize your store, drive scooters, work with mafias and unravel a plot full of humor, mystery and action in this unique simulator.

name: Bachelairs
summary: Race through a set of short dungeons, trying to collect the most treasures. The player that has the most coins at the end wins the game! Will you horde your coins? Invest in stronger gear? Or perhaps try to win extra gold with one of the awards? Face off against friends or play against the computer!

name: Ballotron Mega Bundle
summary: The Ballotron Mega Bundle includes several parts of the meditative puzzle Ballotron, as well as the colorful games Pirate Bloopers and Beat of Montezuma. The games are enjoyable and for the whole family.

name: Ballest of Them All
summary: A physics-based platformer about smooth movement. Master your ball to earn medals on highly-replayable tracks, or climb the Tower to prove you're the Ballest of Them All.

name: Balatro: Cryptid
summary: An unbalanced Balatro mod.

name: Battle Cars
summary: Where speed meets destruction. Drive fast, shoot faster. Race, fight, winGet ready for high-octane PvP multiplayer battles in Battle Cars!

name: Bayonetta + Bayonetta 2: Special Edition
summary: This is a European bundle that includes Bayonetta 1 and Bayonetta 2 both in each own disc and case for the WiiU.

name: Baptiste
summary:
Submerge yourself in a first-hand experience that will make you feel each chill as if it were real. The line between the game and reality blurs further with each step you take.

Explore a mansion where horror awaits in every shadow. The masterful dubbing and sound track will drag you to the depths of a nightmare. Darkness will become your most feared enemy, putting your bravery to the test in each corner.

Play as Tom, a young man still suffering from the tragedy. After the loss of his father, he accompanies his mother Sara on what ought to be a new beginning. However, the ghosts of the past threaten to consume him. Can you keep control against the siege of his inner demons?

Disentangle the gruesome secrets that impregnate each floorboard and each crack on the walls. Each discovery will reveal a story of pain and horror that beggars belief.

Submerge yourself into a world where beauty and terror coexist in a macabre dance. The visual design will transport you to a kingdom where the grotesque is fascinating.

Each objective, each note and each whisper contribute towards weaving the plot. Your perseverance in the face of fear will be rewarded with chilling revelations that will keep you on edge until the very end.

name: Battlefront Trench Warriors: Ops of Warfare & Trench Shooter: Warfare Tactics Bundle Collection
summary: From Trenches to Triumph—Your Battle, Your Legacy!

name: Battle Capacity
summary: A traditional 1 vs. 1 fighting game using 15 creature designs submitted to Smogon's CAP project.

name: Ballardo
summary: A strategic twist on classic pool games! Merge skillful billiards gameplay with roguelike mechanics to conquer increasingly challenging stages. Customize your playstyle with unique stickers, relics, and items to create a one-of-a-kind billiard experience.

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 4
summary: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 4 enables players to customise their decks with new cosmetic card skins featuring characters such as Vault Boy, Ezio Auditore da Firenze, Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III and more.

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 2
