summary: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 2 enables players to customise their decks with new cosmetic card skins featuring characters from Cyberpunk 2077, The Binding of Isaac, Slay the Spire and Stardew Valley.

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 3
summary: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 3 enables players to customise their decks with new cosmetic card skins featuring characters from Divinity Original Sin 2, Shovel Knight, Potion Craft, Enter The Gungeon, Cult of the Lamb, Don't Starve, 1000xRESIST & Warframe.

name: Bamboo Bushido
summary: When a mysterious force snatches his Grandpa into the depths of the Bamboo Forest, young Sam must master the ancient art of Bushido to bring him home. Battle a wacky cast of enemies and an even wackier cast of bamboo in this action packed 2D Adventure.

name: Bakken: Ski Jumping 2025
summary: Bakken 25 is a winter sports simulation game. Become a ski jumper and master every aspect of the discipline from the inrun to the outrun: the jumping, the flying and the landing! Are you ready for a new season?

name: Banker Simulator
summary: Banker Simulator is a single-player game where you revive a bankrupt bank. With active and passive (idle) gameplay, make strategic decisions to grow your bank, satisfy customers, and tackle financial crises.

name: Battle Bits
summary: Defend the system in Battle Bits! In this 2D game, you are a brave Arroba (@) fighting a computer virus. Face enemies from A to Z and bosses from 0 to 9 using signs as weapons. Use Bits to upgrade and defeat the final boss, 9, in this exciting retro adventure!

name: Banner of Conquest
summary: This is a survivors-like game set in the backdrop of the Three Kingdoms era. Players will step into the shoes of renowned generals from that period, grow through each battle, constantly take on stronger foes, and ultimately conquer the three kingdoms.

name: Battle
summary: A turn-based elemental powers battle system created for GBJAM #2 (GameBoy Jam). Art cooked up by Ethan Holbert.

name: Balloon Friends
summary: This is a mini puzzle game of cooperative puzzle-solving abilities that may test the emotional strength of the relationship between friends/partners, which requires you and your teammate to cooperate and let the Balloon Friends find the way to the end by conducting the gas!

name: Banned Tapes
summary: You are a filmmaker and recently purchased a box of VHS tapes at a flea market. Now you need to look through them and select tapes on which occur supernatural, violent, horrifying scenes...

name: Bay Breaker
summary:
Use your boat's new technology to launch ultra-springy balls,
capable of shattering even the toughest rocks.

name: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket
summary: In the Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket, you find yourself trapped in a labyrinth of endless, flickering aisles. Unearth dark secrets behind every shelf while evading lurking apparitions and supernatural terrors. Can you survive the haunted corridors and escape before the nightmare consumes?

name: Battlefront Expanded
summary: A mod for Star Wars Battlefront II (2017) that adds a whopping 71 custom Heroes and Reinforcements, pulling from both Canon and Legends material.

name: Bad Summer
summary: Bad Summer is a visual novel developed by S&J Games. An ordinary job takes a dark turn when camp counselor Jenny stumbles into a chilling mystery, while Detective Oliver Smith races against time to uncover the truth. Strange phone calls, eerie disappearances, and something watching from the trees. Camp Bear Ridge isn't what it seems.

name: Basil and the Isles of Spice
summary: Join Basil the Basilisk as she runs, jumps, and glides through the Isles of Spice on her journey to become the new Shaman of her village. Along the way to collect the mystical crystals, she'll meet a colorful cast of characters who will grow alongside her and help her uncover the secret of the caldera.

name: Barman Simulator
summary: Take charge of your very own bar in Barman Simulator! Craft unique cocktails, serve your customers with speed and precision, and keep a close eye on your inventory to ensure you never run out of stock. But that's not all—face daily challenges like dealing with thieves and managing the rush of peak hours. Hire and train a team of employees to help you keep things running smoothly. Customize your establishment by decorating it to reflect your personal style and offer exciting activities to draw in larger crowds. Turn your bar into the hottest spot in town!

name: Baia
summary: Due to the volcanic eruption, the climate has become abnormal. Floodwaters are about to inundate our homes. Commander, please lead the people to quickly build an ark and save them!

name: Bad Midwife
summary: You play as a pregnant woman kidnapped and trapped in an unknown place. Based on true events, survive a psychological horror journey where every step could cost your life, and your baby. Can you get the best final?

name: Baba Is You: Baba Make Level
summary: Baba Make Level adds an official level editor, the ability to share levels online with other players, a curated "Featured Levels" list, two new official levelpacks containing over 250 entirely new and unused/cut levels, new art, new music and new rules.

name: Base Dominators
summary:
An action-packed FPS war game, inspired by the classic ''Battlefield 1942''. Dominate the enemy bases to claim victory!

In Base Dominators, your mission is clear: dominate the enemy bases and lead your team to victory. This action-packed FPS war game allows you to choose from five distinct classes—Soldier, Sniper, Medic, Engineer, and Anti-Tank—each offering unique abilities and playstyles to suit your strategic approach. Command the battlefield by piloting tanks, cars, helicopters, and airplanes as you immerse yourself in chaotic, adrenaline-fueled warfare. With two dynamic levels—Forest and Desert—you’ll need to adapt to diverse terrains, figure out the best strategies, and collaborate with your teammates to outsmart your opponents. Whether you're coordinating attacks or holding the line, teamwork is the key to dominating enemy bases and claiming victory. If you're a fan of military FPS games, vehicle combat, or just looking for an exciting war game experience, I believe this little game delivers all the chaos and fun you'd expect.

name: Backrooms: The Lost Circus
summary: Backrooms: The Lost Circus is a Co-op horror game up to 4 players, where you and your friends will explore the game, try to pass the game level using your mind, wit, remembering the places where you were

name: Bacterium
summary:
Bacterium is a puzzle game that will test your mental agility and strategical thinking.

Are you up to the challenge of restraining the Bacteria?

name: BattleCry: Age of Myths
summary: You are one of the commanders in training, under the new emperor's rules. Command your army and fight against oncoming enemies in the battlefield. Add different types of soldiers and try new formations to win the battles!

name: Battle Fish
summary:
Click down the bottom to make bubbles to heal your fish, Click up the top to make spikes to kill the enemy. Click and hold to make them bigger to make them more effective.

Killing enemies gives you cash which you can spend on upgrades such as ...shotguns...and ion cannons for your cute little fish called piggles or any other name you decide.

Game starts out a little slow, but get into it and it gets a lot harder.

name: Baby's Nightmare Circus VR: Remake
summary: Baby's Nightmare Circus VR: Remake is a re-imagining of the original Baby's Nightmare Circus, optimized for virtual reality. This version features new 3D graphics and real-time rendering for an immersive and unsettling experience. It also offers a non-VR mode for PC, which includes support for 4K resolution, ray-tracing, and various ultrawide aspect ratios. The game's environments have been fully rebuilt in 3D while retaining the aesthetic of the original, and the gameplay has been adapted for VR.

name: Banshee (Fazbear's Pizzeria Tycoon!)
summary: Banshee is a fangame based on FNAF 6, manage a restaurant, repurpose old animatronics, find secrets and keep track of the place during the night!

name: Bandle Tale: Scout Recon Pack
summary:
Bandle Tale: Scout Recon Pack includes a wearable Bandle Scout hat for your character, a Bandle Scout hat for your fluffy poro pal, a familiar color for your backpack home, a dazzling pathway effect to light your path, and a new recipe for your cookbook.

These items were pre-order exclusives.

name: Barcha
summary: A psychological horror game where you play as Hannibal, a father trapped between two terrifying worlds. After stealing a mysterious compass, he’s pulled into a distorted mansion inhabited by supernatural entities from the jinn realm. Can you survive and save your daughter before it’s too late?

name: Balls, Dice & Stickers
summary:
Balls, Dice & Stickers is a roguelike deckbuilder.

Throw balls at dice and use stickers to trigger wild effects.

name: Battle Puzzle 2048: Space Girls
summary: Combine tiles, battle space girls, and outsmart unique abilities in Battle Puzzle 2048! Play infinite mode or challenge 5 difficulties. Can you reach 2048 and win?

name: Ball Game
summary: Control the ball in first person and try not to get motion sick! A movement system that is so relentless, unexpected and fun will put your gaming skills to the ultimate test!

name: Banana Ragdoll
summary: Banana Ragdoll is a game where you can be amogus and look at Bananas! You can destroy tall towers with realistic physics! There are 3 levels available to you and many character physical property settings.

name: Bandit Accountancy
summary: In Bandit Accountancy, you sort gems using a gamepad or the arrow keys.

name: Ballmaster
summary:
You take control of Ballmyr, a pure-hearted knight of Ballencia. He was sent out under the order of King Ball to do some nasty work to innocent people. As he returned, King Ball ordered his execution! Betrayed, Ballmyr had no means to run because he followed his King. Unknown in the shadows, Death Ball was watching.

It was the perfect timing for Ballmyr, because his soul was both pure and corrupt, so Death Ball gave him a challenge for his soul only known to God and Death Ball, the Challenge of Ballmaster!

name: Barbatus no Majo
summary: Artec, which released the niche RPGs "Digan no Maseki" and "Dark Wraith", aimed to create an RPG that anyone could easily enjoy with "Barbatus no Majo".

name: Bad Karma
summary:
You play as A1, a deceased creature that had to wake up for some reason. On their journey they meet a bunch of inhabitants of the World of Glamor and Illusion, getting to interact with them - more or less.

The afterlife consists of 7 layers, each unique by design, serving its purpose. One might be calm, other might be aggressive.

name: Battle of Arachnidia
summary: Battle of Arachnidia is a fast-paced top-down shooter in which you fight back against hordes of arachnid robots. Protect your base by destroying all enemies by coming up with different tactics, improving your robot and using different help bonuses.

name: Bart Simpson Saw Game
summary: Evil puppet Pigsaw has kidnapped Bart Simpson in his own school. He's trapped with the evilest characters from Springfield! Help him find a way out before it's too late.

name: Battle for Cloud 9
summary: Battle for Cloud 9 is a Multiplayer 3rd Person Shooter 9 different weapons to choose from: Submachine Guns, Grenades, Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, Shotguns, Pistols, Sniper Rifles, and Automatic Rifles, Multiple Game modes: Team Deathmatch Free for all Deathmatch Team Capture the Flag

name: Baseball Legacy Manager 25
summary: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional baseball team!

name: Banan'em Up!
summary: A tiny challenging arcade shoot’em up where you shoot down quirky aliens to save your planet. Evade bullets, shoot enemies, get upgrades, survive through challenging waves to defeat the final boss, "The Monke".

name: Battle AirForce
summary: Three years after Battle Marine a new battle is about to begin! Battle AirForce is the first orthodox style vertical scrolling bullet hell STG since NOKOGI Rider by SUZUKI PLAN. It was created in Z80 full assembly language, aiming at a level close to the limit of VGS-Zero.

name: BackRooms X
summary:
BackRooms X is a game that combines all quality backrooms games into one.
The game features many levels where you will have to avoid strange creatures and solve puzzles. The gameplay is full of exploration and survival elements, where every detail matters.

name: Baki Hanma: Blood Arena
summary: Enter the brutal world of Baki Hanma: Blood Arena, a thrilling 2D action game inspired by the Netflix anime phenomenon Baki. With gameplay reminiscent of the classic Super Punch-Out!!, this game blends precision, timing, and shonen-style flair to deliver a high-energy combat experience.

name: Back from the other world, I missed love
summary: Defeat the Demon King and find your next adventure in an office with goddess-like colleagues. You, as a rookie hero with magical powers, connect with captivating stars like Saika Kawakita, Ai Uehara, and Yui Mihama.

name: Battlewrights
summary: A 4-player local party brawler with quirky characters, a unique movement system and fast, intense versus matches. Get back to the glory days of couch multiplayer and be ready to destroy some friendships.

name: Balloon Warfare
summary: Balloon Warfare is a first-person arena shooter with a twist: you become stronger by hunting down specific colored balloons to upgrade your weapon. Together with your team, you must take out the Boss Balloon that spawns on the map.

name: Bad Bitch Blasters
summary: In this mind-blowing insane-arcade RPG, Jennyfer takes down "The Organization" and summons The Legendary Devourer of Dead in order to wipe the planet.

name: Babel Defense
summary: A 3D real-time strategy tower defence based on the Tower of Babel. Organise your army of angels as waves of humans appear. Unlock upgrades and prosper to stop the human advance. Use your omnipresent powers to help you in your mission.

name: Back 4 More
summary: Third person strategy survival game, teams Compete through turn-based rounds to gain the most influence over the desert!

name: Backrooms: Found Footage
summary: Backrooms: Found Footage is a single-player horror game where you are the main character trying to survive the Backrooms. Curiosity wins and you decide to explore this weird place that you got trapped in. What could go wrong?

name: Bakery Shop Match Up
summary: Step into the whimsical world of Bakery Shop Match Up! Your task is to find and match items that belong together in this charming bakery-themed puzzle game.

name: Ball Drop
summary: Get the ball to the end zone safely. Without exploding!

name: Banana 3D
summary: In this game you click to earn skins to trade with and to collect. You receive a drop every 30 minutes, up to 4 a day. There is a short collection of developer-created skins, with an in-game workshop up-loader for the community to create their own skins for the Steam market.

name: Banana Girls
summary: Banana meets girls. Banan-ify your girls by clicking on them. Make her go bananas. And sometimes (every 3 hours) you get a 100% certified banana girl to claim as your own. Grow your banana girl fruity harem!

name: Banana Massacre
summary: In this goofy horror shooter, you play as a cop who has received a 911 call from banana people claiming that they need to be rescued out of a slaughter house that is being run by pigs. It is your duty to free the bananas from slaughter and to eliminate any pigs that stand in your way.

name: Bark Tank
summary: This game is a multiplayer online tank shooting game. The game has a team battle mode. Players eliminate enemy tanks through cooperation and flexible positioning. Only the side that survives in the midst of gunfire and kills all enemy players' tanks will win.

name: Bask: The Alchemist Frog
summary: Once human, now frog. Begin this unexpected journey into the land of the unknown in-search of a cure for your froggy state. Explore the world around you while helping others in need as you find new ingredients and potions to help you on your path.

name: Battle Bloodlines
summary: Battle Bloodlines lets you selectively breed unique creatures for their stats and skills. Create the strongest fighting team, then fight in asynchronous multiplayer. Discover new creature forms and abilities.

name: Battle Air Hockey Break Beats!
summary: Super exhilarating battle air hockey! Hit the ball and score a BREAK!

name: Backrooms: Exploration
summary: Backrooms: Exploration is a single-player horror game, which takes place in 2020. Two friends have lost their jobs due to COVID-19, but they still have to bring food to the table. After a failed heist, one of them ends up in the Backrooms. Now your only mission is to survive.

name: Ballon Jump
summary: Ballon Jump is an exciting endless jumping game where you play as a the ballon. Your goal is to ascend as high as possible, navigating through colorful obstacles. Each obstacle matches a specific color, and your ballon can only pass through if it matches the obstacle's hue. Collect items to change your ballon's color and continue your ascent. Test your reflexes and see how far you can go in this challenging and colorful adventure!

name: Balloon Chess
summary: Balloon Chess is a roguelite take on chess, where you fight through waves of enemies and challenging boss matches as you ride an elevator to the top floor. Get powerful new abilities, imbue your balloons with passive effects, and build up a 'deck' of backup balloons to take on higher challenges.

name: Battle of Emperor Tian
summary: "Battle of Emperor Tian" is a casual tower defense game. In the game, players can skillfully place these turrets. According to the characteristics and attack rhythms of different monsters, they can reasonably match the lineup to ensure the stability of the defensive line.

name: Bakery Cafe Simulator
summary: Bake, build, and grow your dream bakery cafe! Create delicious pastries, design your space, and serve customers. Play solo or with friends in online co-op to expand your business and experience the excitement of running a bustling cafe!

name: Band of Crusaders
summary: Band of Crusaders is a dark medieval strategy RPG in which you become Grandmaster of a knightly order and lead it against a demonic invasion of Europe. Craft your sandbox adventure - explore a vast simulated world, recruit crusaders, grow your camp, and face demons & human foes in real-time combat.

name: Backgammon
summary: Early PC version of Backgammon developed by John E. Hoel for IBM.

name: Backrooms Escape Protocol
summary: Backrooms Escape Protocol is a multiplayer horror game where you and your friends explore eerie backrooms, evade terrifying entities, and uncover hidden secrets. Work together to survive the endless maze and escape before it's too late!

name: Backrooms: The Silence
summary: Backrooms: The Silence is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players, where you have to explore and fight the game master on your own, use your own abilities to survive in this complex world, play with your friends to get the full range of emotions!

name: Baixos de Quebrada: Mobile
summary:
Baixos de Quebrada (BDQ) - Mobile is a car game in the Drive style. In it, you will have the opportunity to customize your dream car, making modifications such as lowering the suspension, adding window tint, changing the wheels, and much more. If you want to change cars, you can save money by doing small jobs, and you can also find different special cars scattered around the map to cruise around.

Additionally, BDQ - Mobile features Role Play style missions that allow you to earn money to acquire new vehicles and customizations.

name: Baking Bustle: Ashley's Dream - Collector's Edition
Ballistik
summary: A brick busting game with fireballs, bombs, and rockets.

name: Barro F25
summary: Barro F25 is pure speed! The fastest version ever created promises to push you to the limit with extraordinary performance and adrenaline at its peak. Get ready to dominate the tracks!

name: Battlers of Ekrasys
summary: An idle auto-battler hero builder all about experimentation. Defeat waves of monsters and bosses to learn their spells! Craft jewels, enhance them with the smithmagic system, and fuse over 70 unique abilities to discover powerful synergies and evolve your build.

name: Baku Funshiki
summary: Baku Funshiki is a hard-mode sequel to the game Funshiki. It features 10 extremely challenging stages, far more difficult than the original. The core gameplay remains the same: controlling a rocket-powered box on a frictionless surface using inertia-based mechanics to collect items and avoid obstacles.

name: Backrooms Multi-Verses
summary: Survival horror with realistic graphics based on Unreal Engine 5. Ten highly detailed levels: liminal world, puzzles and creatures. New levels and content regularly. Experience unbearable horror and find a way to escape from...

name: BAZR
summary:
Come on down to Luigi's Casino to try the brand new card game, BAZR!

BAZR turns Super Mario 64 into a roguelike deck-builder with multiple unlockable decks and 100+ cards to find! Find coins in the level to buy new cards, collect stars under par time to get big bonuses, or find card pickups scattered throughout the stages to build your deck to take on Bowser's Gauntlet!

Test your luck, skill, and SM64 knowledge!

Hack by ‪anonymousmoose309‬ , ‪furyiousfight3252‬ , and SpK

name: Battle Babes: Lust, Space & Shadow
summary: Battle Babes is a fierce and fun single-player, turn-based strategy card game set in a vibrant fantasy world. Lead 12 powerful heroines, unleash 600+ magical cards, and craft your perfect deck. Customize your warrior princesses and outsmart AI foes in epic battles. Ready to claim your crown?

name: Bananarchy
summary: MONKEY AROUND with your friends or solo in this adventure multiplayer!

name: Batamonisk
summary:
Batamonisk is an exciting new game!

Genre: It’s a 2D RPG (role-playing game) where you play as a character named Nakato.

Gameplay: You explore various areas, loot items, and defeat enemies, which is typical of classic RPGs but with its unique twist.

Developer: The game is developed by Phxnix1 and made entirely in RPG Maker VX Ace.

name: Back to Saturn X Episode 2: Tower in the Fountain of Sparks
summary:
Back to Saturn X is a series of megawad/partial conversion projects for Doom II, designed to be compatible with DOOM2.EXE. Created by the Back to Saturn X Team, it features an exclusive texture set, original music, and a new palette and colormap.

Back to Saturn X Episode 2: Tower in the Fountain of Sparks was beta-released on 1 September, 2014, with another twenty-two levels, a secret level, four episode hubs and an ending screen. It received one of the 2014 Cacowards. Its final version was released on August 14, 2020.

name: Back to Saturn X Episode 3: Instructions to the Rusty Time Machine
summary:
This work-in-progress third installment in the Back to Saturn X series (a vanilla-compatible hyper-megawad) takes place not on the titular Saturn X, but on the other side of a portal that leads... Somewhere Else.

What horrors await? Take a peek beyond the veil...

name: Backrooms: Hide Together
summary: A visually realistic 1-7 player co-op survival horror game. Explore 5 levels filled with confined environments, puzzles, and entities — with new levels and content added regularly. Beware of terrifying moments and ruthless monsters. Do whatever it takes to escape, even if it means hiding.

name: Battlic
summary: A 3D third-person action game following the protagonist Sophia, who heard the rumor about the monster that killed her parent on Kunlun Island.

name: Battle for Atlantis
summary: Battle for Atlantis is a game of global domination, like Risk. Based on Banyon Wars, this game adds EGA graphics and has four factions. Battle takes place among 43 cities divided between 8 islands of varying size, which collectively make up the atoll of Atlantis. Occupying an entire island gives you bonus armies based on the size of the island. Random flooding, seismic activity and revolution can destroy armies, and distribution centers, which are randomly distributed across the map, occasionally double the number of troops residing in them. The maximum number of armies that can be in a city is 9999. The game pits you against 3 computer opponents, and has 7 difficulty levels and a random difficulty level, and you can set the maximum number of armies that each city can have at the beginning of the game.

name: Bagelball
summary: bagelball is a physics & movement-based multiplayer sports-ish game, similar to the game with cars and footballs, except instead of driving a car you wield a bagel. you can ride the bagel to fly, throw bagels at high velocity, and wall jump, all to score the most goals within 5 minutes.

name: Battle Orb
summary: Get ready to aim, launch, and dominate in Battle Orb, the ultimate real-time strategy game in mixed reality! Step into your space, battle opponents worldwide, and master a whole new kind of physics-based combat.

name: Bad-Boon Strikes Back
summary: Bad-Boon Strikes Back is a custom level pack for Super Monkey Ball 2 created by KartingKoopa. It contains 60 levels populating familiar and brand new environments. Within the custom level scene it is widely regarded as a great entry point for newcomers.

name: Backseat Drivers
summary: Test your friendship in Backseat Drivers, the ultimate co-op driving disaster. One drives, one shouts directions, and your car belongs in the junkyard. Bump, crash, and scream your way through town as your clunker yeets into every possible obstacle. Yelling is inevitable. Apologies are optional.

name: Barista Coffee Simulator
summary: A Cosy Café Adventure, Brewed to Perfection.

name: Banter
summary: Banter is a social experience in virtual reality; you can meet new people and visit various worlds. Banter has various events you can join daily!

name: Baseball Heroes
summary: Baseball Heroes was an Online Sports Game developed by Syntasia.

name: Ball Scooping Friends
summary: Experience the thrill of a Japanese festival with a unique twist! This online co-op game combines the fun of "Ball Scooping" (like goldfish scooping, but with balls!) and "Shooting Gallery" games.

name: Barista Simulator 2025
summary: Master the Art of Coffee and Build a Café Worth Savoring.

name: Back: Fade
summary:
Once again you take on the role of the protagonist, ​Ren Xing, who, after escaping the first "Otherworld," is thrust into a new and bizarre journey. In Back: Fade, players will uncover the rules governing this Otherworld. This time, you are not alone—other characters will join you, offering mutual support. However, your shared goal remains the same: survive this twisted realm and find a way to escape. Every choice you make in critical moments will shape the story, and different decisions will lead to vastly different endings.

After waking up in a hospital, ​Ren Xing believed his ordeal was over—only to be dragged into a new "Otherworld." To his shock, unlike the first Otherworld, this time, he is not alone.

name: Banshee
summary: The game is about escaping from a house where “Banshee”, a frightening looking fairy, wanders around, exploring the surroundings and using the items found to escape.

name: Backrooms: We Escape Forever
summary: We Escape Forever is a co-op survival horror game for 1–6 players. Solve puzzles and escape dream worlds. Explore eerie environments, avoid terrifying entities, and survive together. Built with Unreal Engine 5, the game adds new levels and content regularly, offering fresh challenges.

name: Backrooms: Extractions
summary: Backrooms: Extractions is a 1-6 player co-op horror game set in 2062. As a MEG operative, enter the Backrooms to locate and extract lost agents while evading lurking entities. Use advanced tools, solve tense puzzles, and survive eerie environments. Stay alert: every sound could be your last!

name: BallMan
summary: A nice challenging old style platform arcade game - MADE IN ITALY!

name: Babylon 5 Armada 2
summary:
The sequel to the popular Babylon 5: Armada mod for Star Trek Armada, this mod features over 200 vessels in 8 different sides. Included are the Earth Alliance, the Minbari Federation, the Narn Regime, the Centauri Republic, the League of Non-Alligned Worlds, the Rangers, Shadows, and the Vorlons.

This mod is a must for any B5 fan, check it out today, or get Babylon 5 Armada 1 at Armada Fleet Command.

name: Backroom Loop
summary: Backroom Loop is a first-person psychological horror (entertainment) game. You are trapped in a familiar-feeling space, exploring and escaping… only to return to the start. Can you break free from the loop?

name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold - The Videogame
Balls Gone Wild
summary: There are also portals that instantly teleport objects to different locations.

name: Babka
summary: Babka is a retro indie game with a horror atmosphere that takes you to your hometown, where your neighbors summoned demons from the underworld to your grandmother's house. Rebuild her home and banish all the demons. Your decisions may change your path to becoming a better grandson.

name: Batman Returns
summary: Batman Returns is an side-scrolling action platformer based on the movie.

name: Battle for Rakir
summary: Fly, fight, and level up!

name: Backrooms Liminal Escape
summary: BACKROOMS: LIMINAL ESCAPE is a VHS-style horror game where you explore eerie liminal spaces through a camcorder. BACKROOMS: LIMINAL ESCAPE is More than just a walking sim, it features intense levels that require you to hide, run, stay quite, and survive in a creepy, analog nightmare.

name: Backspace
summary: BACKSPACE is an adventure/puzzle game where you start your new job as an intern for the space vessel manufacturing company, MVEM! While getting settled in at your new job and meeting the office's odd cast of characters, you may get a sense that something strange is going on...

name: Ballistik Wars
summary: Spray of missiles! Smashing super weapons!

name: Baionlenja
summary: Use the most overpowered and skill based movement mechanics of all time to explore the vast and interconnected research facility, where a mysterious fossil grants you unimaginable power and mobility. B-Hop, Rocket Jump and Air Strafe to uncover the secrets of the Baionlenja corporation.

name: BattleGroupVR2
summary: BattleGroupVR2 is a virtual reality real-time space strategy where you explore the galaxy and lead a fleet of powerful warships from the bridge of your flagship. Explore, mine, trade, hunt. Grow your fleet, upgrade your ships, train your captains, and battle the enemy from the captain's chair.

name: Barnicle
summary: A very short RPG Maker game about a girl named Barni. She struggles to go to class, so you have to help her through her morning.

name: Battle
summary: "B.A.T.T.L.E. is a high-action single-player FPS with realistic gunplay, intense combat, and stunning graphics. Master 64 unique weapons, customize them with 240 skins, and fight against enemies in immersive war zones."

name: Battle Engine Aquila
summary: The forces of the Forseti and the evil Muspell are in a fight to the death for a flooded world's most limited resource: land. You are Hawk Winter, plucked from obscurity to pilot Battle Engine Aquila. Airborne or on land, you'll harness Aquila's versatile mobility and awesome fire power in guiding legions of allies to victory. By commanding a device so powerful and advanced, your battlefield decisions will shape the direction of each engagement and, ultimately, the entire war.

name: Battle Ground Battle Royale
summary: FPS/TPS Multiplayer, battle royale - Alpha version

name: Bankshot
summary: DodgeBall... with guns... in space.

name: Bardi: Real Viking
summary:
Show everybody what you are capable of, save your land and prove that one angry northerner is worth a legion of enemies! Throw axes, improve your wagon, unleash the magic on your enemies, call for backup and save the country sheep! Bardi will face dozens of adversaries, interesting tasks, dangerous bosses and many other adventures. Go forward! Free the North!

Complete 50 different levels to destroy the conquerors. Choose one of 5 classes of Bardi and find your own fighting style. Using unique for each class features burn, freeze, crush and break down your enemies. Don’t forget to strengthen your wagon, upgrade your skills, and also don’t forget about the tamed dragon - the faithful friend of Bardi.

name: Battlement
summary: A couch-co-op where you fight your friends with elemental warriors that harness powerful magic. Choose to challenge your friends in the many game modes such as tag or duals, and slaughter them in unique places like PeaceGrounds or Castle's Edge. Fight with Honour!

name: BannerBound
summary: Bannerbound is a flag-capturing game where you lead a customized army, combining strategy and action to dominate the battlefield. Organize your troops, adapt your tactics, and fight for victory!

name: Basketball Showdown
summary: Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone worldwide in a head-to-head Basketball Showdown!

name: Balance
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where players tilt a platform to guide a ball through maze-like levels, avoiding hazards and triggering targets. It features simple vector graphics and is known for its high difficulty.

name: Barda
summary: The mesmerizing inventory management roguelite where keeping your bag tidy means the difference between life and death.

name: Badminton Time VR
summary:
Step into the virtual court for fast-paced rallies, the satisfying thwack of the shuttlecock, and delightfully friendly rivalry in vibrant locations.

Whether you're a seasoned pro or a backyard beginner, this game is easy to pick up and impossible to put down!

name: Bag Hero
summary: Blast through monster hordes with crazy weapons in a wild bullet hell! It’s chaotic, casual, and seriously fun!

name: Balavour
summary: Short indie horror game, featuring body horror and a sad and creepy story.

name: Ball x Pit
summary: BALL x PIT is a brick-breaking, ball-fusing, base-building survival roguelite where you battle hordes of monstrous enemies with your arsenal of ricocheting balls.

name: Bad 4 Business
summary: Run a small business in a tough town, with 90's vibes in top down and 3rd person. Protect your cash. Drive and deliver your goods. Discover the needs and wants of your customers then craft some 'hot' new products. Decisions matter, play on the shady side or be the business person of the year.

name: Banisher
summary: Banisher is a single player horror ghost hunting game where the player completes tasks to weaken a demon and then attempt to destroy the demon. However, evil cannot be destroyed so easily!

name: Bad Janitor
summary: Play undercover as a janitor with the objective of getting tenants to move out by discreetly annoying them, so the buildings can be torn down and get rebuilt into office complexes by your actual employer, CityGrind Corp. You must also perform basic janitorial duties to keep your job and cover.

name: Balloon Hater
summary: Pop balloons, upgrade your weapons, and boost your rewards in this satisfying idle clicker! Choose from a variety of tools to burst balloons faster and automate your progress.

name: Battleship
summary: Aim Productions' unlicensed mobile game for Java platforms based on the Battleship board game.

name: Backframes: Escape Together
summary: Backframes: Escape Together is a cooperative horror game for 1–4 players. Explore dark levels, solve dangerous puzzles, and escape from sinister entities. Use your voice to interact with objects, uncovering unexpected paths to survival.

name: Balatro Multiplayer Mod
summary: A multiplayer mod for Balatro, allowing players to compete with each other.

name: Bar Soviet
summary: Bar Soviet is a narrative-driven bar management sim set in a dystopian republic. Mix drinks, talk to patrons, and manage your finances while navigating life under an authoritarian regime.

name: Baspetball
summary: When the tutors leave, the house turns into a basketball court, and the ultimate showdown begins: Cats vs. Dogs. Take control of basketball-playing cats, move, pass, and shoot a yarn ball to score baskets while outsmarting dog opponents. Explore creative strategies and make that swish!

name: Backyard Digger
summary: A chill game about digging in the backyard of your home. Find precious metals, explore caves, avoid dangers, and upgrade your equipment as you dig deeper and deeper.

name: B.A.N.K.
summary:
B.A.N.K. — a cooperative (1-2 players) bank employee simulator with elements of humor and horror

You are a new employee at B.A.N.K. (the official acronym is classified)

Your task is to serve clients from all corners of the universe. Deposits, loans, currency exchange, document checks — this is now your daily routine.

To earn money and keep the bank afloat, you must maintain order and uphold B.A.N.K.'s reputation!

B.A.N.K. is one of the few places offering financial services. But only clients chosen by the BOSS can enter. Check documents carefully and get rid of unwanted guests.

Two-player co-op: Earn money together, and one day, you might even take over B.A.N.K. with a friend!

name: Battle Against the Acolytes of Science
summary: A story-driven 2D bullet hell shooter set in the afterlife. An emotional journey of young heroines as they confront the science worshippers known as "Chemistians" Vibrant pixel art vividly portrays the world and narrative. "Welcome to 'The Crystal Palace'..."

name: Bakudo
summary: Bakudo is a sci‑fi boss‑rush action game fusing high‑octane ball‑sport mechanics with exhilarating combat. Enroll at an elite Bakudo academy and clash with formidable opponents as you uncover a major conspiracy. When determination is put to the ultimate test, you must tip the scales of destiny.

name: Ball Jump
summary: Take control over a small ball. Tap on the screen to jump. The platform cubes will move. Tap at the right moment to jump with the ball.

name: Backgammon Galaxy
summary: Backgammon Galaxy is the world's largest online gaming platform for PvP backgammon and mastery features.

name: Bacrush
summary: Bacrush is a fast-paced arcade game where you control a small green square. Your goal is to collect as many coins as possible while dodging dangerous gray cubes. You can shoot projectiles to push back the cubes, but be careful — shooting too much will cause your square to overheat! Gather as many coins as you can and survive as long as possible to set a new high score.

name: Batty Zabella 2 XOXO XMAS
summary: Batty's back for a Christmas-themed adventure! Don't expect a typical holiday season, though - there are still plenty of creepy, crawly things lurking in her home. Batty Zabella 2 XOXO XMAS is a spooky-fun point-and-click adventure game for the Game Boy. This time, she’s back with even more sass, new puzzles, and a haunted mansion full of creepy surprises.

name: Barista
summary: This game was created for the "Games for Blind Gamers" game jam.

name: Bandeirantes: The Game.
summary: Bandeirantes invites the player to experience the life of one of the bandeirantes who explored Brazil in the 17th century. Come to the first historicly correct game of it's kind. Survival Crafting placed in the Brazilian Rain Forest.

name: Bacterian
summary: Ever wanted to reach deep within yourself? Now you can. Fight off filthy diseases and germs in Bacterian - new take on a classic Sokoban - style game.

name: Bad NPCs
summary: A Minecraft mod that enhances NPC behavior by making villagers and other humanoid mobs hostile and unpredictable. Expect aggressive dialogue, opportunistic attacks, and new AI patterns that turn settlements into dangerous, reactive environments, forcing players to adapt defenses, tactics, and interactions.

name: Balloomia: Sky Playground
summary: Control your gasha ball through differents plataforms in 60 seconds, collect your coins and reach the checkpoint! Are you ready to face low gravity, spikes and much more in this sky playground?

name: Bake Until Done
summary: You are a muffin. A wholesome little guy trying to navigate a baker's kitchen full of traps, tricks, and devious desserts. But those sweet treats are out for crumbs. Beat them back and get past the obstacles using only your muffin’s morsels. Just don't lose too much of yourself in the process.

name: Banyu: Reclaiming Hope
summary: The northern coast of Java has been transformed into a sunken world due to climate change. Surviving communities now float above the water, working hand-in-hand together and rebuild with the remnants of the past. You are a lone sailor, navigating this solarpunk world with a dream to restore the Great Array — not to speak to the stars, but to catch the sun.

name: Barks and Bytes
summary: Barks & Bytes is a frantic multiplayer game where Robots bluff, swap, and outsmart each other to dodge the dreaded Dog Card. Plunge into different game modes where deception is the key to survival. Draw, deceive, outplay, and pray you don’t end up as dog food...

name: Backyard Baseball '01
summary:
Backyard Baseball 2001 is the second Backyard Baseball game, and the fourth overall game, in the Backyard Sports franchise. Build your roster from iconic Backyard athletes and legendary MLB players. Strike out opponents, hit homers, and earn hilarious Power-ups. Play ball!

This version replaces three players (Barry Bonds, Frank Thomas and Ken Griffey Jr.) with generic characters with similar stats, as well as changes the Cleveland Indians to the Cleveland Guardians, removes "Oakland" from the Athletics' name, and removes the digital scans of the professionals' trading cards and online play.

name: Bally Fears: The Paradox
summary: In Bally Fears: The Paradox, you play as Reyes, a young child. Your mother recently passed away, but Reyes does not know yet. As a result, your father keeps you in his office. The game starts when you receive a call from your father, warning you about something...

name: Basketball Simulator
summary: Basketball Simulator delivers a true-to-life basketball shooting experience with intuitive controls. Step onto the court, sink impossible shots, and feel the crowd roar as you chase greatness. Will you become the ultimate three-point legend in your city?

name: Bashing Brutal
summary: Bashing Brutal is a fully Physics-Based combat game, focusing on melee fighting. Experience the Brutal life of a Gladiator, Bash your opponent's heads in with Maces, Boxing Gloves, Baseball Bats.

name: Barotrauma: Home & Harbor
summary: Home & Harbor is the upcoming expansion for Barotrauma. Introducing outpost ownership, building and management and a mysterious new faction: The Descendants, which will shake up the world of Europa's merry sailors.

name: Bajka
summary: Enter the realm of animal dreams! Experience adventures in places where humans exist only in legends. What path will you take, my friend?

name: Basement
summary: You’ve just moved into your new home. The neighbors are quiet. But the basement... isn’t empty. Uncover the tragic truth behind the house’s previous owners in this story-driven psychological horror experience. Explore, and survive the lingering presence of a soul trapped in darkness.

name: Baccarat
summary: Baccarat keeps you on the edge of your seat with every turn of the cards! Feel the thrill of high-stakes decisions, the rush of a perfect hand, and the sweet satisfaction of a big win. Will luck be on your side, or will the suspense keep you coming back for more?

name: Bandido Rush
summary: Trapped deep in a collapsing gold mine, a fearless Mexican bandido needs your help to escape. Use his trusty six-shooter to master airborne movement, navigate treacherous worlds with unique mechanics, and conquer hardcore platforming levels. Can you save him before the mine caves in?

name: Backrooms Bodycam
summary: These are still the same yellow corridors and rooms inhabited by dangerous entities, but now you can fight them back!

name: Backrooms Bodycam 2
summary: Enter the Mysterious World of the Backrooms! Find weapons left behind by other wanderers, fight off dangerous entities, and make your way to the exit!

name: Ball & Roll
summary: Ball & Roll is a physics-based platform game that you can play solo or with friends! Control your cute animal inside a rolling ball, overcome challenging obstacles, move fast, and reach the top as quickly as possible. But be careful... One mistake can send you all the way back to the start!

name: Backpack Seeker's
summary: Backpack Seeker's — a tactical RPG where your backpack decides everything! Collect, combine, and use items in unique ways to win. A living world, a nonlinear story, and hundreds of hidden mechanics await! Ready for an adventure where every item is a step to victory?

name: Bad Teams
summary: You can race with your friends, fight on the tracks and have fun. All you have to do is show that you are better than everyone else. Bad luck.

name: Backrooms Blackmarket
summary: A survival horror and management game where you scavenge forbidden artifacts from the Backrooms and sell them on the dark web—if you can escape the lurking horrors in time.

name: Banpo's Bridge Wondrous Worlds
summary: A relaxing and expansive catalog of hashi puzzles where players connect beautiful islands together with bridges.

name: Battle Copters
summary:
Compete in the most ACTION PACKED multiplayer airborne battles, with easy controls and AWESOME DOGFIGHTING action!

Take control of a mighty Battle Copter and immediately plunge into 8 player ONLINE BATTLES to the death over 5 dangerous locations. Lock on your missiles and UNLEASH HELL on your opponents as you swoop through the arenas in aerial combat.

name: Battle Sablemon!
summary: Battle and tame Sablemon in this 3v3 turn based combat RPG. Find, tame, battle and collect elemental creatures on your journey to discover the mysteries of Acer Island.

name: Backrooms: The Scream
summary: Backrooms: The Scream is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players, where you can play as a single player, but what could be better than hearing your friend scream in the game? This is an unforgettable experience you will get with your friends!

name: Backrooms: Forgotten Floors
summary: Backrooms: Forgotten Floors is a cooperative horror game for 1–4 players. Descend into levels no one remembers, through spaces that shouldn't exist. You're here now — and the only thing worse than being lost is being noticed.

name: Backrooms: Recode
summary: Backrooms: Recode is a cooperative horror game for 1–4 players. The rules don't stay the same. Neither do the walls, the halls, or your thoughts. If there's a pattern, it's not meant for you to understand.

name: Backrooms: Flicker
summary: Backrooms: Flicker is a cooperative horror game for 1–4 players. Navigate a fractured reality with no clear form or end. Whatever's keeping you here doesn't speak — it simply waits. Don't flicker, or you won't find yourself!

name: Backrooms: Noise
summary: Backrooms: Noise is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. Explore a dimension where even silence doesn't sound right. The world doesn't explain itself - and the more you try to understand it, the further you feel from the answers.

name: Backrooms: Final Exam Part II
summary: Backrooms: Final Exam Part II is a cooperative horror game for 1–4 players. Together or alone, you'll return to a place you were never meant to leave. The deeper you go, the more uncertain it becomes whether there was ever a way out.

name: Bakery Story 2
summary: Bakery Story 2 is a baking simulation and management game where players design, decorate, and manage their own bakery, baking a variety of sweet treats.

name: BackSlap
summary: A must-have idle rhythm game for slacking off at work! Single-key tapping for ultimate stress relief, 90+ addictive tracks, 9 quirky themes, instantly hide with mouse middle click, supports osu beatmap import, AFK level-up while vibing to music! Certified by Bathhouse Cat Master with gold medal!

name: Baseball Card Shop Simulator
summary: Collect, trade, dominate the market and outsmart the competition.

name: Bad Cat
summary:
Cat and granny live in one house — it’s the ultimate revenge of cat vs granny. Take on the role of the most mischievous kitty in this animal simulator game.

In this hilarious prankster game, you’re up to no good as you cause chaos in granny's house. You are a little bad kitten from hell. Your mission is to prank grandmother and her dog in every way possible.

Create chaos, steal sausages, break the TV, play VR games, and mess around like the boss cat you are. Collect your fishes in the aquarium, catch them! You can even turn on the TV to distract grandmother. The goal is to make granny and her dog angry. Will you be able to pull off all your pranks and cause enough prankster chaos to win the day in this 3D pet simulator game?

While you start as an average pet, you will earn the title of a naughty kitty — then the fun begins. In this game, you will play as a cute prankster determined to keep grandmother on her toes.

Your goal is to create as much havoc as possible throughout the house by completing various tasks. There’s always another prank to pull: hide in cupboards, jump on tables, send vases crashing to the floor, or push the dog around. Misbehavior is always rewarded here — no punishments, just pure cat anarchy.

You can even unlock different cat styles and colors to match your mischievous mood. Whether you’re a fluffy orange tabby or a sleek Siamese, you’re always the star.

name: Ballotoro
summary: Ballotoro is a snappy incremental roguelike where every roll counts. Launch satisfying combos, chain synergies, and watch the numbers explode. Optimize your build, reach the goal faster, and when it all clicks, it feels like you’ve cracked the code.

name: Bass Harrier
summary: Bass Harrier is a rhythm-fueled shoot 'em up. This world is powered by the Riddim of the music—enemy spawns, environments, and even the lights shift dynamically to the stage's soundtrack. No need for prior experience—just follow the beat, dodge threats, and fire away!

name: Bam Bam Boom
summary: Fight your way to glory in this intense platform fighter. Master the manoeuvres of a unique roster of characters and utilise strategies to strike your opponent like Bam. Bam. Boom!

name: Battle Shadow Arena
summary: A skill-based 1v1 action game where you combine weapons and elements to build custom combos and take on ever-stronger bosses in your own style.

name: Backrooms: Final Exam
summary: Backrooms: Final Exam is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players, Where you will explore this complex and intricate dimension with your friends or alone, trying to figure out what to do, wandering around and being scared by every sound, you will need to pass your final exam!

name: Balloon Party
summary: The party room was supposed to be a joyful place, but is it really connected to “joy”? You need to interact with various objects in the party room and complete a series of explorations to find a glimmer of hope for escape. Can you... break free?

name: BallStack
summary: BallStack is a vibrant match-3 game where you stack and match colorful red, blue, purple, green, and yellow balls to clear levels, unlock power-ups, and compete on global leaderboards!

name: Bart Bash
summary: Bart Bash, the exciting new game from TeleSTOP where you launch happy barts, score points, and upgrade your way to fun!

name: Banned Together
summary: A queer mystery game about book banning. Play as Ruby (they/them), a journalism major on a surreal, after-hours adventure to investigate the disappearance of books from their college library.

name: Battle Live! School of idols
summary:
You play as Ayane/Akiomi, as you through the idol school of Pride Park Secondary. There are two main routes to the game for each wing of the school showing everything it has to offer, as well as a bonus epilogue for seeing both routes.

The game is very linear and should take about an hour to see it to completion.

name: Baccarat Online: Baccarist
summary: Favored by the highest of high rollers, baccarat is one of the world's oldest and most popular card games. The aim of the game is to guess who will hit the highest hand value, which in this game is 9. Feel the risk as you dive into the casino atmosphere and hit the big time!

name: Battle Mythic Maidens Arena
summary: Engage in card-based combat against alluring opponents in a fantasy world! Face beautiful but dangerous combatants, all with unique stats, strengths and weaknesses. In each turn, you are randomly dealt cards of four action types.

name: Backstreet Warriors
summary: Intense and minimalistic Beat'em up made for Pico-8.

name: Babbling Brook
summary: Sculpt sand to create winding streams through lush forests and rolling meadows. Babbling Brook is a relaxing indie game about messing around with water and sand. Also, there's a flock of rubber ducks trying to escape to the open sea...

name: Ball Travel
summary: Help the Ball to save his girlfriend. Go on a trip around the world. Go through obstacles and solve puzzles. Collect as many stars as possible.

name: Ballad: As the Music Goes
summary: Ballad is a musical cosy 3rd person 3D adventure game. Explore several biomes, discover melodies in order to call, help, sooth, interact with the world and villagers around you thanks to your Kalimba ! Or just chill and jam in a colorful place, whatever you choose, magic of music awaits you !

name: Back to School
summary: Back To School is a fast-paced cartoon game where you tap to chase a runaway bus. Compete for the best time in this fun adventure!

name: Batta? Batta!
summary: "Join the adventure with Battery Knight Beta!"

name: Batalla de Arquitectos
summary: Compete to create a better circuit than your opponent's and thus be able to reach the goal earlier.

name: Baldi's Basics: Encounter Doors
summary: Baldi's Basics: Encounter Doors is a tense crossover game that blends the fear-inducing world of Baldi's Basics with the puzzle-filled challenge of Doors. Explore 100 procedurally generated rooms, each with unique puzzles and obstacles, while trying to avoid Baldi and his relentless friends. Solve the challenges, unlock new doors, and escape before they catch you!

name: Ballista Wall Defense Rush
summary: Ballista Wall Defense Rush is a defense game where you upgrade your ballista and fight off endless waves of monsters. Earn gold from each kill, improve your defenses, and see how long you can survive against increasingly stronger enemies!

name: Bats Bits Balls
summary: Welcome to BITS BATS BALLS - the place where your dual-analog reflexes are put to the test! Destroy blocks, collect bits, and progress from one level to the next, only to find yourself in an infinite mode catered for the most hardcore of players!

name: Basilica
summary: Explore an enchanted cathedral that calls to you. Grow stronger and wiser as you traverse through the ethereal. Collect and create items to navigate its ever-changing floors. Uncover its hidden secrets, and use the ancient wisdom of divinity to guide your way. Lose yourself, or find yourself.

name: Backrooms: The Next Level
summary: Backrooms: The Next Level is a Co-op horror game up to 4 players, where you and your friends will explore the game, try to pass the game level using your mind, wit, remembering the places where you were

name: Bastion of Valor
summary: Bastion of Valor is a strategy game where you build and develop your village, grow its population, and defend against raids. You can construct your village as you wish and assign tasks to your villagers. Your strategies will shape your village's future.

name: Bastion Frontier
summary: Bastion Frontier is a dark fantasy tower defense game where your mission is to defend the last Crystal Hearts — the only source of light left in a dying world.

name: Banners & Bastions
summary: Banners & Bastions is a 3D tabletop real-time strategy game in mixed reality. Command your troops and fortify your kingdom to defeat the enemy in dynamic and epic battles!

name: Bang
summary: Welcome to "BANG"! This is a third-person roguelike shooting game, where you will enter a multi-dimensional world full of unknowns and challenges.

name: Basketball Court VR
summary:
"Basketball Court VR" is an exhilarating virtual reality (VR) basketball game that immerses players in the world of competitive sports.

This VR game allows players to step onto the virtual basketball court and experience the thrill of shooting hoops from the comfort of their own home.

With stunning graphics and realistic physics, "Court VR" provides an authentic basketball experience, right down to the squeak of your sneakers on the court.

The game features a variety of challenging levels and game modes to test your basketball skills, from classic free throws to intense three-point shootouts.

As you compete and win matches in "Basketball Court VR," you earn rewards that can be used to unlock a wide selection of unique and visually appealing basketballs.

name: Balls
summary: Balls is a clicker game where you click on Balls! In Balls, you can click on Balls to get more Balls! Every 24 hours you will drop one of the common and rare Balls. You can switch between the Balls you drop during the game, and you can combine common Balls into a rare Ball!

name: Band of Badasses
summary: Get ready to run and jump from one level to the next in this runner game. Take out aliens with your rifle or slice them up real good with your katana. Unlock your favourite characters to take them running and jumping through a fun-filled destructive frenzy.

name: Basketball Serial Shooter
summary: Bounce the ball on the playground or in the air, and shoot the ball into the hoop.

name: Basketball Théorie Pratique sur Ensembles Aléatoires
summary: The game is about making a choice, being a totally random outcome. None of the three choices are logic, being more of a coin flip than a real game with logical processing the player needs to do.

name: Back to the War
summary: This is a multi-player competitive shootout game, biased towards low configuration, low threshold, high fluency, comfortable operation feel, fast pace, leisure entertainment, decompression of the game experience. Subsequent copies of various skins will be dropped.

name: Barabizna
summary:
BARABIZNA is a atmospheric horror game set in a creepy old house. Find and collect all the hidden items before it's too late. But beware... you're not alone.

In this game, you become one of those people looking to profit from someone else’s misfortune by selling a few intriguing items that are said to be hidden inside the house.

name: Battle for Agatharia
summary: A single-developer Crusader Kings III Total Conversion mod that brings to life a land of piety, ambition and unyielding conflict. Set amidst a fictional hard-fantasy world inspired by the early medieval period, players must navigate political intrigue, scathing rivalries, and the ever-present threat of conquest.

name: Barrel Baller
summary: A 3D platformer where you take control of v806 autonomous hauler unit across different planets. Your goal is to deliver cargo to hard-to-reach locations.

name: Bakahaza
summary: BAKAHAZA is a Japanese mobile game for iOS and Android phones. The title is a portmonteau of the collaboration name "Shōnen Bakabon" × "BIOHAZARD". It is a reimagining of the 1996 Resident Evil title with the cast of Tensai Bakabon taking the place of the cast. It was released on Android in 2017.

name: Battleground
summary: Battleground - A game in the genre of last man standing or royal battle. Fly to the island, find the weapon, get ahead of the enemies and win the round!

name: Backmooms
summary: You’ve wandered into a strange dimension while shopping. A mysterious monster is chasing you, You must escape. "Backmooms" is a first-person adventure game.

name: Ball Blast
summary: Dodge falling rocks and blast them all in this chaotic arcade shooter! Play solo or co-op, unlock wild cannons and power-ups, and survive endless waves of bouncing destruction!

name: Backbeat
summary: A rhythm game where you're the drummer. Play the snare and kick drums along with the beat, and stay in time to ace the level.

name: Battles of Cardista
summary: Build your deck, control the battlefield, seize victory. Battles of Cardista is a card battler with single player campaigns and PvP multiplayer. Each faction has a different campaign, each lord a different twist.

name: Ball Blast: Dreamland DLC
summary:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
Haunted Castle Map
Candy Land Map
Vaporwave Map
15 Boomerang Shards
10 Shock Wave Shards
10 Laser Shards
6 Extra Cannon Boosters
2500 gems

name: Ball Blast: Space DLC
summary:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
Space Station Map
Red Planet Map
Wasteland Map
15 Saw Thrower Shards
10 Barrier Shards
10 Cannon Shards
4 Extra Damage Boosters
4 Fast Charge Boosters
2500 gems

name: Ball Blast: Wilds DLC
summary:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
Desert Map
Runic Map
Frozen Map
15 Shotgun Shards
10 Turret Shards
10 Plasma Cannon Shards
10 Shield Boosters
2500 gems

name: Backstabbing King
summary: Backstabbing King is a chess based strategy puzzle game with a few twists on the base chess mechanics.

name: Baldur's Gate III: The Black Hound
summary:
Baldur's Gate III: The Black Hound was a cancelled role-playing video game developed by Black Isle Studios and to be published by Interplay Entertainment for the Microsoft Windows platform. Announced in 2002 under the codenames FR6 and Project Jefferson, it was planned to be the third main entry in the Baldur's Gate series, utilizing the Dungeons & Dragons 3rd Edition ruleset.

The development of the game was halted in 2003 due to Interplay Entertainment's loss of rights to create more Dungeons & Dragons games for the PC platform.

name: Bass Masters Classic
summary:
This game consists of five 3-day tournaments at four lakes. The mission is to catch as much large bass as possible. Once the day of the fishing tournament is over, the five largest bass that were caught get weighed and are compared to the other fisherman's catches. The one with the heaviest catch is the winner.

The player starts off choosing an angler. Then the player can either go to the bait shop, practice pond, or start in the tournament. In the bait shop, choices of baits, lines, rods, reels, fish finders, and boat engines are available for purchase. The practice pond mode is just where the player can cut his teeth on the game mechanics without consequence.

The tournament mode is the main part of the game. Players start out in a fishing boat. Some of the factors that can affect your fishing are temperature, wind speed, water clarity and time of day. After casting the line, the game goes from an above the lake view to a side view of the lake water depths. Then it's just up to the player to attract the fish with the bait, and after the fish is caught on the hook, reel it in.

name: Barn Quest
summary: Barn Quest – Merge, restore & wrangle horses (oh and one extremely bossy cat) in this cozy farm adventure!

name: Ballrun
summary: Be a marble in this multiplayer racing game with snappy and satisfying physics! Use wild powers to bounce and roll your way through fun tracks filled with obstacles, shortcuts, and unpredictable rivals.

name: Battle Line the Rise of War
summary: Dive into Battle Line: The Rise of War, an exhilarating third-person shooter (TPS) that throws you into the heart of fast-paced, action

name: Band Together
summary: Band Together is a retro 2D action platformer game with cute pixel art graphics and challenging gameplay. Search for your fellow bandmates as you traverse a deserted island! Find and utilize the power of magical musical instruments to make your way past rough terrain and dangerous creatures.

name: Battle of Guang
summary: This is a single-player action game playable in both first-person and third-person perspectives. Players can choose to pilot a combat mech armed with guns and blades, slashing through disgusting cockroaches in post-apocalyptic ruins to eliminate regional threats.

name: Bane
summary: Control a group of heroes or join a party of friends online in this old-school, turn-based, generative RPG. Be clever and careful while exploring ancient sites. Cooperate to survive traps, hazards, and quick, tactical combat. Collect treasure and clues to prepare you for the next adventure.

name: Bartholomew.exe
summary: In this short FPS horror experience you are thrown into a maze where the game's state shifts between Nightmare and Dream, you are hunted by the monster Bartholomew in the nightmare and you get to hunt him in the dream. Upgrade your revolver, stock up on traps and kill Bartholomew.

name: Baa-Baa Blitz: The Sheeps kebab Incident
summary: Baa-Baa Blitz: The Sheep’s Kebab Incident is a fast-paced action platformer where momentum is everything and sheep are… highly flammable. Play as a fire-breathing dragon and race on wild courses at breakneck speed. Glide through rings, collect coins, and ram wooly bystanders who go boom!

name: Battlemon
summary: Battlemon is an action-fighting game where you take control of small, cute character and battle in various different arenas. There are many vibrant and powerful different characters to choose from, with even more being gradually added through updates!

name: Back 3: Spooky
summary: After escaping the Art Horror Dimension from the last game, the protagonist awakens in an enigmatic faction, only to find his escape companion Gao Yan missing. When interrogated about Gao Yan's whereabouts, Ye Tan – who survived the Haunted Manor Dimension – appears as a member of the faction and rescues you. With her assistance, you enter a wholly distinct new dimension unlike the previous two, embarking on another adventure. In this uncharted dimension, you'll forge new alliances, confront fresh dangers, and your choices will determine the branching paths to multiple endings.

name: Banana Ninja vs. 100 Mann
summary: A gorilla. One hundred men. And you're caught in the middle. No story, no talk. Just you, pure violence, and 100 Mann asking for trouble.

name: Battle Spirit CrossOver: [BSC41] Greatest Record 2023 Rare Card Set
Bankfeest
summary: Litterally translated to CouchParty. As the name implies, it is a game to be played with friends!

name: BankingSim
summary: BankingSim puts you in charge of a growing bank. Issue loans, set interest rates, manage risk, and deal with defaults as you grow your financial empire.

name: Bank It!
summary: Push your luck in this fast-paced 3D dice game where fortune favors the bold... but greed comes at a price! Roll the dice, build the pot, and race to call "BANK!" before the unlucky friend rolls a 7.

name: Barrel Patrol 3D
summary: Barrel Patrol 3D is an arcade-style 3D shooter in which you protect fuel cells from enemy attackers inside circular arena levels. Gameplay mixes fast-paced shooting and defense across progressively harder waves, with simple controls and retro-style graphics.

name: Battlefield 6: Phantom Edition
summary:
The Phantom Edition is an upgraded version of Battlefield 6.

It includes:
BF Pro Token: grants the first Battle Pass, 25 tier skips, and exclusive unlocks.
Phantom Pack: a collection of cosmetic items such as 4 soldier skins, two weapon skins, a melee knife skin, a vehicle skin, a weapon sticker, a weapon charm, and a dog tag.
Phantom XP Boost Set: temporary boosts for weapon and career XP rates.
Pre-order Bonus (Tombstone Pack): includes cosmetic items and XP boosts regardless of edition

name: Barbie: Horse Trails
summary: Giddy up! Play as Barbie and Barbie in a new open-world adventure through Canterbury Trails Park with your horse, Lucky. Become a Junior Ranger and help give the already amazing park a fresh new look for everyone to enjoy. Gallop through wildflower fields and other beautiful landscapes. Tackle fun side missions with friends, capture amazing photos, dig up ceramics, and search for the mystery horse. Find chests filled with collectibles and add sparkle to Barbie and Lucky’s looks. From the cozy cabins to the lively campsite there is plenty to unlock and discover. Ride along on this wild adventure and see!

name: Battle Pixel
summary: Survive intense firefights and claim victory.

name: Balefire: Ashes To Ashes
summary: Pyre, Young promise of the Inquisition, must escort the witch Sunniva the day before her execution.

name: Bad Cards
summary: Bad Cards is the chaotic online party game where you and your friends compete to make the most ridiculous, unhinged, and laugh-out-loud card combos. Play in person or online, dive into wild-themed packs, or create your own cards to share with the world. With community-driven content, endless replayability, and easy jump-in gameplay, it’s the perfect recipe for fun, awkward moments, and questionable life choices.

name: Baazi
summary: To survive the dungeon and escape. You'll need to discard all cards in your dungeon and keep your health above 0.

name: Backyard Defenders
summary: Defend your picnic from hungry bugs in this strategic tower defense game! Place unique defenders, upgrade their abilities, and survive increasingly challenging waves of ants, beetles, mosquitoes, and epic boss battles. Can you protect your backyard feast?

name: Balcony Garden
summary: A cozy VR gardening game where you grow 80+ rare plants from all seven continents. Water, fertilize, and care for your garden. Enjoy dynamic weather, calm vibes, and surprise visits from cute animals — all without quests or complex systems

name: Backrooms: New Gate
summary: An immersive wandering simulator through the endless Backrooms. Explore empty corridors, listen to their whisper, and lose yourself in the depths of dark spaces. A subtly oppressive atmosphere, meditative strangeness, and the feeling of an alien, silent world.

name: Bagua Alley
summary: You’re trapped in an endless maze of alleys. Carefully observe your surroundings and complete the Bagua to escape the infinite labyrinth!

name: Ballad of Violence
summary: Play as Via Mintz who fights with her trusty Violin-Crossbow. Collect Melodies to change your arrows element to defeat enemies and solve puzzling levels. Fight your way through prisons and concert halls to bring balance between the musical sections of Yuvono City.

name: Bastionfall
summary: Bastionfall is a challenging third-person Action RPG featuring skill-based combat and a unique online co-op follower system. Explore a fallen kingdom, master parries and dodges, and command loyal companions in epic boss battles to reclaim a legendary sword.

name: Bad Vaxx
summary: A browser game centered around vaccine misinformation, in which you can either debunk lies or spread them.

name: Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes
summary: In Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes, take command of a fleet escaping the annihilation of the Twelve Colonies. Manage crises on board as you prepare for the next encounter with the Cylon Fleet. Times are dire, and hard choices must be made. Your only hope: rejoin the Battlestar Galactica.

name: B.A.D.
summary: Martians Attack! Due to their sub-terrainian habitat, the people of earth did not know of the Martian’s existence, or their unscrupulous leader, Rupert. The Martians have decided that they are tired of making crop circles and plan to attack the Earth instead. Fight your way through wave after wave of nasty Martian enemies!

name: Bat & Ball
summary: A fast-paced, mouse-controlled reflex game where every swing matters—hit the ball, build your streak, and push your focus to the limit in this minimalist baseball challenge.

name: Bannercatch
summary:
Max, the Guardian of the Galactic Tollway, challenges you and your partner to play BANNERCATCH—a five-level team game of strategy and skill.

You and your partner each control two humanoid robots. Max controls his four highly skilled robots. To win, your humanoids must travel to Max's zone, capture his flag, and bring it home. But be careful! As you and your humanoids are zeroing in on Max's flag, Max's robots are coming after yours.

You and your partner must plan your moves carefully and work as a team. You must also break the secret binary code that Max uses to communicate with his robots. Winning won't be easy, but the rewards are great. Win enough games, and you will be among the first humanoids to see Max's face.

name: Baku
summary: BAKU is a single-player spot-the-difference game. Save the troubled animals by eating their nightmares. However, there is a secret to this story.

name: Bangman
summary: Very good game!

name: Ballistic Tilt
summary: Tilt the playdate to roll your ball. Avoid hazards and solve puzzles as you make your way to the exit. Three different play modes to try: puzzle, action and speed run.

name: Backrooms Lost Runners
summary: Backrooms: Lost Runners is a co-op survival horror game where teamwork, voice-reactive AI, and immersive puzzles merge. Explore unsettling liminal spaces, outsmart cunning entities, and dive into a deeply interactive story—remember, even your whispers can betray you.

name: Bandits vs. Lords: Epic Clash
summary: Prepare for a thrilling adventure where every decision counts. Construct your base, gather resources, and train unique troops to outsmart your opponents in tactical combat. Raid enemy villages for loot, forge alliances with other players, and expand your territory in a quest for ultimate dominance.

name: Bay: Zero
summary: With many, many bossfights, this FPS PvE is extremely fast paced, and could be a great distraction from reality when you finish it!

name: Back To The Future: The Ride
Basalt: The Cursed Vein
summary: Basalt is a haunted roguelite match-3 mining adventure. Dig for precious ores, battle unsettling creatures, and rebuild a town of strange, whispering residents. The deeper you reach, the greater the rewards… though the villagers keep warning you - don't dig too deep!

name: Bank
summary: A block-pushing puzzle game that mixes levels of both long term strategic planning and of timing and skill. Collect money and bombs, blow up walls, situate bombs in chain reactions, block monsters, and make your way to the finish.

name: Battleships Combat: Evolved
summary: A classical game, but with a twist! 20 different ships, each with an interesting damage pattern, fight on a battlefield with customizable size and possibly also islands. Against AI or other players on local network.

name: Baggage Handler Simulator
summary: BH Simulator is a fun and immersive airport logistics game. As a baggage hub manager, build efficient conveyor systems to sort, unload, and load luggage. Plan smart routes, avoid bottlenecks, and prove you're the boss of the baggage game. Can you turn chaos into perfect order?

name: Backrooms: No Level
summary: Backrooms: No Level is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. You think you can complete anything, but what if you can't? What if nothing is real and you can't complete anything, even with friends, it will be extremely difficult to complete this game!

name: Back to Modern World: Fantasy Hero
summary: Yoha Taka only want one thing is to go back to his former world and stay besides his sensei again but that's only possible if he defeats the demonlord. So what will happen if a chuunibyou got sent to another world that only filled with fantasy.

name: Battery Farm
summary: A grave robbery gone wrong sends you tumbling down an absurd rabbit hole.

name: BattleBalls
summary: Battle Balls is a physics-based arena brawler where you design your own spinning warriors and send it into chaotic fights. Choose your weapon, adjust spin speed, damage, and health, then watch as your creations bounc, slash, and smash their way through the arena.

name: Battletoads
summary: Game Gear port of "Battletoads".

name: Battle Royale Manager
summary: In Battle Royale Manager, you don't control the fighters—you build them. Train survivors, develop personalized strategies, place bold bets, and watch the chaos unfold in fully simulated AI-driven battle royale matches. You're not a fighter. You're the mastermind behind the fight.

name: Bakar Game
summary: Join Bakar on an exciting quest to find his friend Hassouna in this adventure game filled with lush landscapes, educational puzzles, and thrilling challenges. Traverse diverse environments, meet beloved cartoon characters, and perfect for players of all ages!

name: Baba-Yaga za tridevyat' zemel'. Nachinaem uchit' nemetskiy
summary: The tireless traveler Baba Yaga sets off on a journey to Germany to visit her many friends and learn the language during the trip. Accompanying the fairy-tale heroine on a foreign tour, young users will be able to practice listening comprehension, expand their vocabulary, and learn the simplest grammatical forms. This journey will not be smooth - you will have to save a dragon, fight spiders, remove the spell of a magic mirror, and remember old fairy tales. But at the end, everyone will receive rewards: Baba Yaga will receive updates and souvenirs, and young users will receive a prize from Baba Yaga!

name: Banished Souls
summary: Banished Souls is a single player psychological horror. Use your gear to identify the ghost type and room of death. You can then trap the ghost to banish it. Can you complete the investigation and banish the ghost?

name: Basket Bots
summary: Basket Bots is a fast-paced, 1v1 physics-based basketball brawler ! Jump, dash, roll push the ball and score to outplay your opponent.

name: Baduk Challenge
summary: Take on exciting challenges and sharpen your skills by playing Go. Compete in tournaments, win prizes, and customize your own Go board with unique items!

name: Backrooms Maze 2D
summary: Backrooms Maze 2D is a tense survival maze game where you navigate shifting halls, evade relentless enemies, and race to the exit before your sanity drains away. Multiple difficulty levels, pixel art style, and eerie ambience keep you on edge every step of the way.

name: Backrooms: The Others
summary: Backrooms: The Others is a cooperative horror game for up to 4 players where you will be forced to explore these unknown nooks and crannies, trying to survive in this complex world where death can be waiting for you at every turn!

name: Barista Dream
summary: Barista Dream lets you create a variety of coffees, including espresso, Americano, latte, and cappuccino, with meticulous precision. It aims to provide both fun and learning while making coffee. Manage your cafe wisely and prepare as many orders as possible to boost your popularity.

name: Bad Rat Tax
summary: A singleplayer open-zoned rat-like taxi game where you must talk to your client while driving.

name: Barrage
summary: Embrace the technological evolution and build up your hydroelectric empire in Barrage, a turn-based strategy game where players compete to build majestic dams, exploit the power of running water, and bring their faction to victory!

name: Banana of Doom
summary: A party style deck building and card crafting game where you combine words in hand to win tournaments! ‘Robot Grandma’ vs ‘Moist Goblin’, which is more likely to end the world? AI decides! Expand your collection and add to your binder. A hilarious fast-paced multiplayer party game.

name: Bananaganza
summary: A fast-paced casual arcade game where you peel, slice, and catch flying banana pieces to feed monkeys and rack up high scores.

name: Band Girls
summary:
