Cute girls in rock bands appear in large numbers!
An easy puzzle game anyone can play!

name: Backrooms: Reminiscence
summary: Backrooms: Reminiscence is a single-player horror game where you experience something unexpected, and now you're left all alone in the cold world of The Backrooms.

name: Backyard Football '99
summary: Backyard Football 1999 is back and now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, scoring TDs with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter between Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

name: B.A.D. Institute
summary: Once you come to B.A.D. Institute, you'll never leave. A first-person survival horror game where hiding and outsmarting your enemies is the only way to survive. Uncover the mystery of what happened at this boarding school and how to escape with your life.

name: Battle Royale Builder
summary: Battle Royale Builder lets you practice Building, Editing, and Shooting with no limits and AI to practice against! No harvesting resources, no sitting in a queue, no severs, no fall damage, just Build, Edit, and Shoot, with or without AI!

name: Back in Time
summary: Back In Time is a fast-paced time travel action adventure where you travel through time to prevent disasters. Rewrite history by making critical choices, unraveling mysteries, & manipulating time itself. Explore real-world locations, and uncover secrets in a twist-filled story with evolving gameplay

name: Back of Beyond
summary: In this dark turn-based strategy game, rule a mysterious town as its acting mayor. Deploy buildings and followers to gather faith and money while facing eldritch deity checks. Build your cult empire on the edge of devotion and madness.

name: Battle of the Four Towers
summary: Take command of a tower as you battle 3 others in a game of strategy and wits. Each round, pick up to 3 actions, either attack another tower or defend from another tower. If you manage to attack a tower, then they lose 3 Life Points, but if they defend they lose nothing.

name: Battleboat
summary: Battleboat is a strategic, turn-based naval combat simulator where you command a fleet on a grid and execute tactical strikes against a CPU opponent. Anticipate enemy moves, and fire precise payloads as you navigate the world of naval warfare.

name: Bandroll VR
summary: Feel the Neon Universe in your bones! Would you like to experience your favorite music genres in a new way? No need to worry, BandRoll VR creates amazing universes for you, blended with music genres. You can enjoy playing games while listening to your favorite music.

name: Baldi's Basics in Nightmares
summary: Fangame that mixes Baldi's Basic and Five night's at Freddy's taking heavy inspiration on the 4th installment.

name: Ball In the Hole!
summary: Test your skills and guide the ball into the hole across 15 levels of increasing difficulty!

name: Banzai Hentai!
summary: Banzai Hentai-Pieces are already scattered randomly. By clicking on the knuckle, you can move it in the direction of the free cell. Try to arrange them in order using the least number of moves.

name: Baroque-Ya
summary:
Baroque-Ya is a collection from Japanese developer and publisher Sting, bringing together four titles from the company's post-apocalyptic Baroque series for the Nintendo Switch.
This collection brings together four distinct titles from the series' history:
BAROQUE: Original Version: The game that started it all. This is the original 1998 version of the 3D dungeon-crawling RPG, where players guide an amnesiac protagonist through the ever-changing Neuro Tower to atone for a forgotten sin.

BAROQUE Syndrome: A prequel to the main story, originally released as a visual novel in 2000. This game delves into the lives of the characters and the events that led to the world-altering catastrophe known as the Great Heat Wave.

BAROQUE Shooting: Reversed: An updated release of the 2000 PC spin-off. This title is a 2D side-scrolling shoot 'em up, offering a fast-paced, action-oriented take on the Baroque universe.

BAROQUE Become a Meta-Being Revive: An updated version of the 2022 arcade-style game. In this Frogger-esque title, players take on the role of a Meta-Being, navigating obstacles to survive in the distorted world.

name: Bastionforge
summary: In this game, you have to destroy crowds of enemies with the help of your loyal warriors

name: Balanced Food CalorieMate for Game Creators: Jelly Mission
summary: Transform into a Calorie Mate JELLY and deliver nutrition to a game creator immersed in work. This action-adventure takes you on a journey through an apartment room.

name: Banana Clicker
summary: Click. Upgrade. Conquer. Build a banana empire, unlock powerful upgrades, and uncover a wild banana-fueled conspiracy. Meet silly NPCs, test your luck in gacha, and unleash Banana Storms! With skills, achievements, and endless growth, the bananas never stop!

name: Ballrun 3D Marble Maze Speedrun
summary: You choose to play BallRun not because it is easy, but because it is hard, because the goal will serve to organize and measure the best BallRunners and their skills, because that challenge is one that you are willing to accept, one you are unwilling to postpone, and one which you intend to win.

name: Bacon Quest: Lovers' Beef - Special Edition
summary: Bacon Quest: Lovers' Beef is a light-hearted dungeon crawler featuring Syren a sexy succubus and her cute friend Aoi. Battle through each stage finding hidden gallery images, loot and hentai scenes.

name: Bael's Rock
summary: Embark on a journey into the heart of an old-school text adventure game that beckons you into a world veiled in shadow and mystique. Here, your wits are your greatest weapon, and your keyboard, the tool to wield it.

name: Baku Maru
summary: A fast-paced 3D unique action platformer where you'll be rolling and munching all your nightmares away.

name: Battle Drive
summary: Survive on a dying world by taking on the most dangerous missions that no one else can handle; overcoming natural disasters, nefarious opportunists & PVE challenges, while using your skills, strategies & reflexes to save money towards customizing the vehicle that will see you through the apocalypse!

name: Back to the Scene
summary: "Return to the Scene" is a story-based interactive suspense and mystery AVG game with multiple endings. The intricate case on an urban campus, the elusive murderer, and the unknown adventures entice you to explore deeper and deeper.

name: Banished Sir
summary: Banished Sir is an RPG game set in a Medival Fantasy world where decisions made matter.

name: Ball Heroes
summary: The core gameplay takes the essence of soccer, while creating some very interesting rules to make it even more exciting! The basic rules of the game are simple, but it's up to the player to figure out a variety of skill combinations and team cooperation strategies.

name: Ball Space
summary: A single player 3D puzzle platformer set in low earth orbit. Roll, jump, and float around in space as a ball collecting records, coins, and new friends. Listen to the records you collect and uncover forgotten secrets. Gravity changes from area to area so be prepared for some unusual challenges.

name: Backfire Brigade
summary: Backfire Brigade is a chaotic couch co-op firefighting game for two to four players. Coordinate with your fellow firefighters to rescue victims trapped in burning buildings while extinguishing the flames.

name: Bang Bang Legion
summary: Jump right in! Immerse and unwind in only three minutes, or make a clutch comeback in one! No pay-to-win, but high-welfare—check out the first Pixel-style Strategy Battle Game 'Bang Bang Legion'!
publishers: Xiamen Mechanist Internet Technologies, co. Ltd.

name: Battle Puzzle 2048: Wicked Witches
summary: Combine tiles and battle magical foes in a puzzling world of witches and chaos!

name: Battlethorne: Reckoning
summary: Fight, build, and strategize in a massive third-person action-strategy RPG with hundreds of units and large-scale tactical battles across vast battlefields.

name: Bad Sector 3
summary:
Bad Sector 3 is a psychological horror game where every room may conceal corruptions you must detect to move forward. Make three mistakes, and you’ll be thrown back to the previous floor… forced to start all over again.

Advance through an unstable structure that reshapes itself with every attempt: rooms shift, turning the path ahead into an unpredictable maze. The mechanical irises will grant you access to the following sectors.

name: Battlefield REDSEC
summary: Now entering REDSEC, a free-to-play destination built on Battlefield’s iconic DNA. Drop into Fort Lyndon for a Battle Royale only Battlefield can deliver, featuring massive-scale destruction, fast-paced squad play, and the deadliest ring in BR. Survive and advance in Gauntlet: an all-new cutthroat, knockout-style elimination mode where squads race to complete missions. Then redraw the lines of battle with Portal.

name: Bane and Valor
summary: Bane and Valor is a hero-based top-down action-RPG that offers tons of build variety to let you play the way YOU want. Find your favorite hero, craft the perfect build, solve quests and defeat mighty bosses in this medievil fantasy world.

name: Bait & Tackle
summary: Catch exotic fish and fight comical sea-monsters as you chase after The One That Got Away in this fishing-centric boss rush!

name: Baptized in Dismay
summary: Baptized in Dismay is a psychological horror RPG set in a dystopian 1980s. Nations have turned to isolation and walls to prevent another war. But a curse, or sickness, spreads... consuming people from within and erasing their humanity. Will you endure… or be Baptized in Dismay?

name: Bare Bones
summary:
Collect body parts to make yourself whole again!

For Dr. Zilog who created you, you are just another failed experiment. But even that he destroyed your body and left you with nothing more than bare bones, you have a will to survive.

Journey through Dr. Zilog's dungeon of discarded creations. Solve puzzles, fight bizarre creatures, rebuild your body and finally take your revenge on the mad scientist responsible for all this mess in this Zelda inspired dungeon-crawler.

name: Battle of Britain
summary: Battle of Britain is a 1999 computer wargame developed and published by TalonSoft. It was designed by Gary Grigsby and Keith Brors.

name: Battle Zombie
summary: This is a large-scale shooting game with real military battlefields and modern military equipment. Different shooting gameplay challenges your limits!

name: Banana Loco
summary: A thrilling tile-based treasure hunt where players uncover banana prizes while dodging traps and explosive surprises. Are you ready to go bananas?

name: Baking Bad
summary: A chaotic co-op, rouge like, quota game, where you and your friends are constantly on the run, cooking, looting, and shooting whatever you can to survive.

name: Bae Bash! The Chaos Collection
summary:
As Bae’s 4th anniversary approached, the Brats sprang into action to make a game worthy of the celebration. But with so many wild and brilliant ideas, they couldn’t choose just one—so they mashed them all together! The chaotic mix of genres and styles created a game so powerful, it pulled Bae in herself! Now trapped inside, she must navigate the madness. What kinds of games await her, and can she find a way out?

Bae Bash: The Chaos Collection is a fangame dedicated to the hololive Production talent Hakos Baelz in celebration for her 4th anniversary. The game is built in GameMaker and features art from a vast number of different brat artists, as well as special arrangements and remixes of every single song Bae has released, and more!

name: Bad Dream: Afterlife
summary: You're back, but the entire dream is empty. All residents have evacuated, and the reason is you. The walls are covered with a number of hurtful messages, but the most common one is - "You can keep the whole city to yourself, but DON'T FOLLOW US, YOU MONSTER!"

name: Barrel Roll
summary: Barrel Roll is a roguelike deckbuilder, turn based, taking place in a futuristic far west. The deck ? A 6 slot revolver barrel. Gather bullets with special effects, customize your revolver's barrel to create strong synergies and take down as much criminals as you can.

name: Bandit
summary: Bandit puts you in the boots of a gold-hungry outlaw fighting his way through a western landscape. Dodge bullets, kick chickens, and fight a colorful cast of dangerous characters in your quest for the biggest payout.

name: Bat-Rush
summary: Bat-Rush is a casual but challenging game.Complete levels , unlock characters or see how far you can get on the endless mode! Fly your bat through caves, castles and more. Collect all the stars and try your luck on the hard mode available for each level. Don't be fooled by the cute graphics though , completing all the levels will be much harder than you think!

name: Balaball
summary: "Balaball" is a rouge-like game based on physical collision and deck building. Experience the pleasure of getting high scores in chaotic collisions. Find the new combination in different situations, trigger crazy chains and high scores.

name: Battle On! Hero Academy
summary: Welcome to Battle On! Hero Academy! In this desktop idle game, you are the dean. Recruit heroes and plan their careers from swordsmen to paladins. Your heroes battle and grow. Reap the rewards, then lead your upgraded team against epic bosses. Enjoy deep strategy and satisfying idle progression!

name: Bayaya
summary: A relaxing fairy-tale life sim and story-rich adventure in a colorful wooden-toy world.

name: Bad Heroes
summary: Save the world and romance misfit heroes in the first-ever dating sim and beat-em-up! When a crime wave grips Gloom City, you and your ragtag band of heroes-for-hire uncover shocking truths about the A-list supers at the top. Fight crime, punch mimes, and kiss six superheroes with supernatural abs!

name: Ballshit
summary: The first live-action visual novel with an anime flair! Gamer 'Eggy' turns into a girl. Join bro Monkey and his gf to uncover why the school belle hides a tough guy soul. Seek a cure or embrace your new life. Your choice drives this adventure!

name: Baby Kings
summary: Escape a dangerous dungeon with your friends as royal babies. Solve puzzles, dodge traps and laugh through chaotic co-op action for 2–8 players!

name: Barber Shop Simulator
summary: Barber Shop Simulator is a first-person simulation game where you run your own barbershop from scratch. Serve a wide variety of customers, each with unique styles and preferences. Offer everything from quick fades to full beard grooming. Upgrade your shop, and become the most chosen barber in town.

name: Baito Fight!!: Part-time Devil Hunter
summary: A baseball-themed daily life sim JRPG

name: Battle of the Abyss
summary: This is a auto battler game combined with slot machines. Players can collect different weapons, gradually upgrade their abilities, and challenge different levels until they achieve ultimate victory.

name: Batty Shadowless Adventures
summary: Batty Shadowless Adventures is a spooky-cute 2D pixel art platformer where you fly with cheese power, collect stars, and fight broken shadows. Explore dreamlike levels, uncover Batty’s past, and enjoy a magical mix of classic gameplay and modern storytelling.

name: Battleship Blitz
summary: A modern take on the classic Battleship game - now in 3D! Place your wooden fleet, take aim, and sink enemy ships in singleplayer or PvP multiplayer. Simple, nostalgic, and addictive.

name: Basketboy's Adventure
summary: Explore, collect, and fight in Basketboy's Adventure! Uncover stories and hidden secrets across the vibrant, hand-drawn semi-open world of Gugu City. Master dozens of skills and talents, bond with powerful pets, and gear up for an epic battle!

name: Basement 66
summary: The dice roguelike. You’ve been locked in Basement 66 with the Demon. Roll the death dice. Destroy cursed cards. Remember, only one of you can leave this hell alive. Will you survive? Good luck…

name: Bamorota Defense
summary: Defend the sealstones in a fantasy world! Place towers and cast spells to stop endless waves of monsters in this casual tower defense game.

name: Barfbot
summary: Square off against evil rhombi in this level-based microvania bullet-filled platformer. Find secrets passageways, unlock new weapons, dodge waves of enemies all in search of your beloved pet bot. Jump, barf, die, repeat.

name: Backrooms Stories
summary: Read five horror stories set in the Backrooms. Experience existential horror and terrifying encounters while making choices that will alter your fate. Will you escape or be lost forever?

name: Backrooms Anomaly
summary: Explore a looping corridor filled with anomalies. Walk through the fluorescent-lit backrooms environment, examine your surroundings, and spot subtle changes in reality.

name: Backrooms: Missing Persons
summary: Many have vanished without a trace, swallowed by the endless halls of the Backrooms. Now it’s your turn to step inside. Wander through unsettling liminal spaces, guided only by the constant hum of fluorescent lights. Are you the next to disappear?

name: Battlefield 6 Season 1
summary: Season 1 rolls out in three phases with new hardware, gadgets, maps, and monthly drops for Portal. Blackwell Fields spans besieged facilities and homesteads under a burning horizon, supporting all combat sizes with land and air. Eastwood turns a quiet villa and golf retreat into a frontline, with land vehicles and helicopters in play.

name: Bao Bao's Cozy Cleaning Services
summary: Relax with Bao Bao in this cozy 2D pressure washing sim. Clean pastel environments, chill lo-fi beats, and no stress, just peaceful vibes. Play solo or with up to 3 friends. A peaceful pressure washing game for quiet minds and cozy days.

name: Balltopia
summary: Balltopia is a roguelike marble racing simulator where your only objective is to make more money. Featuring dozens of unique levels and over 50 game-altering cards, the potential to win is almost limitless - but be careful! Place an errant bet, and you could lose it all.

name: Battleplan
summary:
Battleplan is a historical, WW2 real-time strategy game of unparalleled realism and simulation.
Fight across massive battlefields created from real-world geographic data.
Create your army by customizing your order of battle and chain of command.
Draw directly on the map to create elaborate plans.

name: Ball Wall Jump Bump
summary: Ball Wall Jump Bump is a fast-paced arcade game where you control a bouncing ball between two walls. Dodge incoming obstacles, earn points for each successful escape, and flip to the other side with every hit. Jump, react, and keep the rhythm going — how long can you survive?

name: Background Bells
summary: In Background Bells, you will return to the roots of classic survival horror games like Resident Evil and Silent Hill, with a unique style and a chilling sound design that will send shivers down your spine. Battle the monsters that will cross your path as you explore terrifying locations and solve twisted puzzles.

name: Badass Brigade
summary: Throw a dude at another dude! Badass Brigade is a light-hearted 2D action game where you shoot, punch, grab, and throw your foes. Take on missions where you can explore the world and uncover a wide variety of weapons and gear for new ways to fight.

name: Baseball Dreams VR
summary:
Baseball Dreams VR is a true-to-life baseball simulator.
Enjoy realistic games in immersive VR from a first-person view.
Customize your settings for a more casual gameplay experience.

name: Barbarian
summary: A Donkey Kong Country knockoff for DOS computers released in 1996, infamous for its strange pre-rendered cutscenes featuring the main character inbetween levels.

name: Baldur's Gate
summary: The Sega Dreamcast version of Baldur's Gate is an unreleased port of an RPG developed by BioWare. Planned for release in May 2000 (with porting work being handled by Sega themselves), it was delayed and ultimately cancelled.

name: Battle Beaster 2
summary: Battle Beaster 2 is an unreleased Sega Dreamcast game, and would have been the sequel to Battle Beaster. Announced in March 2001, it was cancelled for unknown reasons.

name: Bang Bang Girls: Moe Panic
summary: Glamour and firepower collide in this thrilling special forces shooter! Stylish action meets stunning visuals in this character-focused TPS that will captivate you!

name: Bad Boy Brother
summary: Japan's Triple B title hittin' the shelves! fighting and flaunting their 'tudes, add in three entirely new game systems, and you get a sick beat 'em up!

name: Bakery Bundle: Lemon Cake + Magical Bakery
summary: Serve up sweet delights and enchanting treats in the whimsical worlds of Magical Bakery and Lemon Cake.

name: Battle Squares 2
summary: Battle Squares 2 is a twinstick shooter for 2-4 players. Play online with your friends, choose your weapons, and battle your way to victory! In Battle Squares 2 you can customize your own sprite animations, and the level editor lets you define the arena of battle!

name: Bachi-bachi Pawer
summary: A 2D side-scrolling action game where you take down the boss cats ruling the back alleys and fight your way to the top!

name: Battle Hanafuda
summary: A strategic two-player card battle based on the traditional Japanese game Hanafuda. Learn as you play and enjoy thrilling “Koi-Koi” duels filled with risk and reward.

name: Bad Beat
summary: Poker, Puzzles and souls in a dark roguelike. Switch the grid, build combos, defeat powerful dealers in a cursed casino where your soul is the ultimate ante.

name: Bazar Simulator Online
summary: Bazar Simulator takes you to Boquerón City, where you will help Wan manage her uncle Wang Long's bazaar with your friends in a cooperative game. Customize your store in a game full of humor and action in this unique simulator.

name: Babel
summary: Explore the enigmatic Tower of Babel in this epic action-platforming adventure with challenging combat. Unravel mysteries beyond time and face terrifying creatures in your quest to uncover the disappearance of all gods and demons.

name: Backyard Hockey ‘02
summary: Lace up your skates, strap on your helmet, and grab your hockey stick because the Backyard athletes are teaming up with kid versions of legendary hockey stars in Backyard Hockey ‘02! Customize your uniform, set your lineups, and get ready for three periods of non-stop hockey action! Play quick games, single games, or a whole season. Track stats in Season play and create custom players to watch their skills improve over time!

name: Backyard Basketball ‘01
summary: The Backyard athletes are teaming up with the kid version of hoops legend Lisa Leslie in Backyard Basketball ‘01! Customize your uniform, pick your fab five, and get ready for four quarters of hoops! Play single games or a whole season. Track stats in Season play and create custom players to watch their skills improve over time!

name: Bang Bang Tank
summary: Bang Bang Tank is a physics-based roguelike. Lead your tank battalion into explosive battles against the Evil Onioner’s invading army. Choose skilled drivers, craft unexpected winning strategies, upgrade your sciences, and deploy troops tactically to crush your enemies!

name: Bakery Magnate: Online
summary: Bakery Magnate is an economic game that takes place in the 90s, during the collapse of the USSR, when everyone survives as best they can. You play as Juhud, a shoemaker trying to raise his illegal business in defiance of the state and the mafia.

name: Bashnya
summary: Big Khrushchyovka. Eight neighbors. One escape pod. Bashnya is a sovietpunk multiplayer roguelike where players seek a way out, but find their doom.

name: Basketball Dunk!
summary: Basketball Dunk is a one-button game where the objective is to hit a key to dunk a ball down into the hoop. The balls are flying from the sides of the screen and, with each successful dunk, the challenge increases as the hoop changes its position or starts moving as well. The game is over once the player misses even one dunk.

name: Baroque Shooting: Reversed
summary:
A shoot ’em up set in the world of the RPG “BAROQUE” returns as “REVERSED”, now available on Nintendo Switch.
The story takes place in the Neuro Tower, a mysterious structure overrun by countless enemies. You must fight through them using the items you acquire along the way to reach the final boss that awaits in the deepest depths.

name: Baroque: Become a Meta-Being Revive
summary: Become a Meta-Being and head for the Neuro Tower… The protagonist is a Meta-Being! A jumping action game set in the world of BAROQUE.

name: Backrooms Interception
summary: Immerse yourself in a rich Backrooms experience filled with crafting, combat, exploration, and interactions with otherworldly entities. As you progress, a gripping narrative unfolds, revealing secrets hidden within the endless corridors. But be warned danger lurks around every corner.

name: Bake it! Pizza Master
summary: Roll the dough and add toppings to order! Serve your customers delicious, fresh-baked pizza!

name: Bad Time Bug in Apartment 309
summary: A short, comedic visual novel created by Crying Rules Actually.

name: Backflip Madness 2
summary: Backflip Madness 2 is a fast-paced, parkour-flavored extreme sports game. Your goal is simple - make tons of spectacular tricks and stunts. Take it to the extreme, again!

name: Back From Earth
summary: This is the story of a fragile alien climbing through strange worlds in search of home. A journey of symbols and emotions, where every step forward carries the weight of healing.

name: Battle Demon Kirsten
summary:
Our protagonist "Kirsten" is a soldier troubled by her current way of life.
During her adventure, she'll encounter a wide variety of people,
and those warm exchanges will shape her in one direction or another...
Formerly known as "War Demon Kirstin"​

name: Back in the Swamp
summary: An immersive first-person point-and-click exploration game set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland overrun by giant insects and abandoned robots. Embark on a journey to uncover hidden mysteries, guided solely by hand-drawn sketches—no text or dialogue.

name: Baby Game Plan 0-3
summary: 0-3 years old is the fastest growing phase of human beings which is very important for children. We developed this game by absorbing the scientific research results of the current developmental psychology, multiple intelligence and games of early education for babies’ characteristics at this stage.

name: Baseball Scouter
summary: You awaken as the manager of the league's worst team, burdened by the disastrous legacy of your predecessor. Your only edge is a secret ability: to see the hidden baseball potential in anyone. Scout overlooked talent, rebuild the roster, and uncover the truth behind the team's ruin.

name: Backrooms: Rogue 0
summary: A routine expedition into the Backrooms goes silent. You are the last call. Now trapped in endless corridors that loop into themselves, you’ll soon realize you are not alone. Something moves heremany things—and none of them can be fought. Your only hope is to stay unseen. Never trust what you see.

name: Barty's Adventure
summary: Discover the world of Barty's Adventure: a cozy, time-loop metroidvania set in the world of children's toys. Make new friends, explore unique biomes, and master the three-day cycle to stop the Colic from returning once and for all!

name: Barp Online
summary:
BARP Online is a retro fantasy RPG built on classic web-based MUD and early-MMO roots, revived and expanded for modern players. Featuring fast turn-based combat, skill progression, crafting, guilds, and a massive world to explore, BARP blends nostalgia with constant new content and community-driven updates.

Create a hero, train dozens of skills, battle monsters, gather resources, fish, mine, forge powerful gear, and join guilds that unlock unique abilities. Explore cities, caves, forests, islands, and dangerous high-level zones. Team up with friends, challenge world events, or adventure solo at your own pace.

BARP Online retains its original retro charm, complete with pixel art, classic sound effects, and browser-based gameplay, while adding modern improvements like weather systems, time-of-day cycles, new quests, expanded skill trees, and quality-of-life updates.

Whether you're chasing leaderboards, building your perfect character, or just relaxing with fishing and crafting, BARP Online offers a nostalgic yet constantly evolving RPG experience.

name: Back To School
summary: In an attempt to pick up your daughter from school, you must face your past and overcome your deepest fears. This is a psychological horror game where you are a parent going back to school.

name: Back To Back
summary: Back To Back is 2 player co-op adventure game, where the players are forced to act together to survive various challenges with limited shared resources.

name: Backrooms
summary: Escape the backrooms levels as reality warps with every step; listen, for the whispers behind the walls may guide you out. Enjoy an unbelievable co-op Backrooms experience.

name: Backrooms
summary: Escape the surreal Backrooms. The most anticipated Backrooms game of the year awaits you (voted by the Backrooms Research Unit). When your friends are gone, you'll discover that being the last one alive is the true horror.

name: Backrooms
summary: Survive relentless entities, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover the dark secrets of your surroundings. With an XP system, crafting, and resource management, every decision matters. Will you find your way out or become another lost soul?

name: Balls
summary: A chain-reaction deck-building game in which you build the perfect combo machine to achieve the highest-scoring explosion chains.

name: Balloon
summary: Balloon is a 3rd-person interactive poem where you play as a lost red balloon—fragile and uncontrollable, yet endlessly desirable.

name: Bad Trip
summary: A first person survival horror where escape is an illusion. No flashlight, no inventory—just your instincts… and what lurks behind you.

name: Bandit
summary: In "Bandit", play as the Sheriff, a Deputy, a Renegade, or a Bandit. Bandits must eliminate the Sheriff, while he relies on allies to uncover traitors. Trust, traps, betrayal… stay sharp.

name: Barge
summary: Grow crops, raise animals, and harvest resources that you can sell in towns you pass as you and your barge float down an endless river in this top down, pixel art, farming sim.

name: Bass Invaders
summary: Move and shoot to the beat to defeat the evil alien invaders in this retro-inspired arcade rythm game!

name: Base Defense
summary: Protect the base from cyborgs. Use a laser gun and bonuses. Upgrade weapons and bonuses.

name: Battle Legends
summary: Third person shooter game multiplayer (Shotgun, Pistol, Rifle, bullets and health.- The game is inspired by space fighters in a magical place.

name: Battle Frontier
summary: Master deep third-person combat as you explore a world filled with powerful creatures to collect. Merge with your BattleBeasts to unlock their abilities, uncover the mysteries of Almana or dominate the arena in online multiplayer.

name: Battle For Embolia
summary: Battle For Embolia is a fast-paced indie MMORPG with responsive combat, meaningful progression, and constant updates. Explore a growing world, face challenging bosses, and help shape the game’s development through community feedback. Free to play with no pay-to-win.

name: Battle Blocks
summary: Battle Blocks is a physics-based Online/Couch fighter! Grab 2-8 of your friends. And blast them with grenades, guns, and whatever you can get your hands on! - "Rumper is not responsible for any loss of friends..."

name: Battle Ball
summary: Battle Ball is a fast-paced futuristic sports game set in a cyberpunk world. Manage your team by drafting players, hiring coaches, and making trades. Then, take control on the field to play intense, action-packed matches. Build your team and dominate the neon-lit arenas in this thrilling sport!

name: Battle of Goldfish Scooping
summary: "Battle of Goldfish Scooping" is an asymmetrical multiplayer action game. Players take on the roles of scoops and goldfish to aim for high scores. Based on your previous play results, you can acquire skills and enhance parameters to aim for even higher scores!

name: Baroque Syndrome
summary: This ported edition of Baroque Syndrome presents the visual novel depicting the events before the main Baroque story. Play as Kitsune, owner of the Baroque Shop, and experience a branching narrative shaped by your choices. Fonts, stills, animations, and UI have been remastered for smoother play.

name: Bad Badger
summary: You're a bad Honey Badger. Smash out of your enclosure and wreak havoc across an Open-Zoo sandbox. Break, escape, sneak, smash, steal, ride, trick & taunt. BE BAD!

name: Balloon Bros
summary: A chaotic co-op airship adventure! Team up with 2–4 players, each controlling a different part of the ship at the same time. Navigate a wild, procedural world full of obstacles, surprises, and skyborne chaos. Hold together… or crash spectacularly!

name: Bag of Dreams
summary: Bag of dreams is the cozy card-based Roguelike Dreambuilder you didn't know you needed. Can you piece together the perfect sleep, one fragment at a time?

name: Ba Bị
summary: The Ba Bị's game is a time limit challenge in the style of a haunted early 2000s educational software. Play as one of the unlucky kids trapped in this twisted game and help them make it out alive!

name: Ballad of the Midnight Man
summary: Survive the Midnight Man in this horror comedy visual novel.

name: Balla Machina
summary: A Pinball rogue-lite deckbuilder

name: Bad Delivery: Pizza Your Heart
summary: You're the new girl at your local pizza place. Make pizzas, go on delivery runs, and collect tips to save enough money to pay your rent (and maybe find love along the way)!

name: Barfender
summary: Barfender is a chaotic co-op bar management game where you build your dream bar, serve wild customers, and desperately try to survive the nightly madness. Craft drinks, clean messes, stop bar fights, and keep your crew sanity intact. Do you have what it takes to run the messiest bar in town?

name: Basilisk's Isles
summary: Basilisk's Isles is a point and click investigation game. Explore the beautiful painterly islands, talk with their colourful inhabitants, and use the different windows and tools at your disposal to unravel their strange mysteries.

name: Bank Shot
summary: Bank Shot is a Bullet Hell on a pool table with Rouge-like elements, where you are the weapon. Ram enemies to send them flying into the pockets or pelt them until they break. Choose upgrades that change the game, and shoot for the high score

name: Bacharu M.I.A.R.E. no Kuronikuru
summary:
Bacharu is a psychological visual novel in which an artificial intelligence, MIARE, uses human emotions as data to understand and “fix” humanity.

Drawn into MIARE’s system after an unexplained anomaly, Jade, Raifu, and Rubik have their deepest desires fulfilled—at the cost of fragments of their humanity. As the story unfolds, the line between free will and manipulation begins to blur.

As MIARE learns to feel, humans begin to lose what makes them human.

Bacharu asks a single unsettling question:
If a machine can feel our emotions, who is truly human?

name: Bash The Party
summary: Bash The Party is a fast-paced Wick-esque FPS game set in a futuristic cyberpunk environment. Use different pistols, carbines and rifles to fight with your enemies. You must be fast and precise to move through this cinematic game.

name: Barrok 2
summary: Race high-speed sportscars in time-based challenges or against AI opponents. Master the track, beat the clock, and prove your skills in fast, arcade-focused races.

name: Basketball Knockout
summary: Rapid fire hoops in arcade classic style.

name: Ballet of Steel
summary:
Play as a ballet dancer with incredible reflex, who can see bullets coming and swiftly swat them back, using the enemies weapons against them. With an unknown motive, she dives deep into the ruins of what was once a bustling metropolis, to find answers...

This is an atmospheric turn-based bullet hell game prototype inspired by games such as Enter The Chronosphere, Ultrakill, Radio the Universe and TWWWR. Fight your way through 9 floors full of mechanical foes in a dying world.

name: Backrooms Santa
summary: Backrooms Santa is a singleplayer horror game. Bring back the kids gifts and escape a massive Backrooms maze — while holiday horrors hunt you every step of the way. How fast can you save the kids christmas?

name: Backpack Raiders
summary: Backpack Raiders is a hybrid survival roguelite + tactical inventory builder, where how you arrange your gear is just as important as the gear you choose. Survive the City. Build Your Loadout. Outplay the Swarm.

name: Battle Food Mania
summary: Food fights hit the streets! Battle Food Mania is a fast-paced, action game packed with humor and chaos. Play as pizza, cupcakes, bottles and more as you battle to deliver the box - or stop the delivery! Run, shoot and blast your rivals in wild food wars, play solo or with friends.

name: Backroom Cleaners
summary: Purge the unknown Backrooms in this 4-player co-op TPS roguelike. Experience endless combat with fresh build combinations every run.

name: Backseat
summary:
You wake up in the backseat of a car... a friendly person is driving... you haven't felt so calm in ages... where are you two going?

A short and sweet roadtrip dream.

name: Battle Mutants
summary: Experience arcade chaos! Smash through 12 explosive stages as badass mutants in this modern beat 'em up. Enjoy unique level mechanics, brutal bosses, and stylish pixel art. Grab a friend for epic co-op mayhem!

name: Balls Break Bricks
summary:
A minimalistic take on the classic arcade, this game provides 15 levels to destroy.

Catch bonuses, multiply your balls and don't lose them! When you're not busy with catching a ball, shoot the bricks. Aim into the corridors and enjoy that rebound.

name: Backrooms: Imposter
summary: Work together to escape the Backrooms, but choose carefully who you trust. An imposter hides among your team, turning survival into a deadly mind game.

name: Battle Puzzle 2048: Queens of the Abyss
summary: Combine tiles and face off against anime witches, seductive demons, and powerful queens of darkness!

name: Bao Boi
summary: Bao Boi is a fast-paced vertical climbing platformer where every mistake means instant death. Dash, jump, and weave through traps and enemies, race the timer, and see if you can reach the summit in one life.

name: Babel
summary: Babel is a 2.5D multi-narrative action adventure game in a meta-apocalyptic world, built from the paintings of Hieronymus Bosch, Pieter Bruegel, Giuseppe Arcimboldo and other visionary masters.

name: Baiacool - Tides of Olympus
summary: Dive deep into Greek mythology (literally)! Face sea gods armed to the fins, solve puzzles, battle tough bosses, and discover that even at the bottom of the sea, divine drama never stops.

name: Battle Force
summary: A modern warfare FPS game powered by a next-generation engine, featuring stunning, realistic graphics! Become a member of the world's most elite special forces!

name: Battlecaster 2
summary: Battlecaster 2 is a challenging fast paced arena roguelike. Defend yourself against unrelenting enemies and overcome difficult encounters. Use abilities strategically to control the ring of combat.

name: Ball Busters
summary: An over-the-top 3D arena roguelike about juggling balls. Rip insane combos, unlock bodacious-to-unhinged characters, and craft high-hit builds—until you drop it.

name: Bad Eye Deer
summary: Bad Eye Deer is a point and click survival horror game where you survive 3 nights, manage your 'energy' and 'temperature' levels, and keep your own eye out for any incoming threats.

name: Babulya
summary: Babulya – that’s what grandchildren affectionately call their beloved grandmother. But what if your Babulya is no longer human, but a bloodthirsty monster? You came to taste her pies… and she wants to taste you instead…

name: Battle of Britain
summary:
Battle Of Britain is my first arcade game and I am so excited and I am passionate about developing my skills for make more games in future which will better then one before.

Battle of Britain is prepared with simple battle graphics, so you will not see any crowded visuals or effects.

It seems so basic and easy but it is not actually. You need to be speedy on keyboard for navigate the airplanes and bringing bonuses.

name: Bagarre
summary: Bagarre is a competitive top-down PvP MOBA. The main gameplay is a Deathmatch, with RPG and gacha elements. Everyone starts with the same base character and theorycrafting is a core feature of the game.

name: Banjo: Recompiled
summary: Banjo: Recompiled is a project that uses N64: Recompiled to statically recompile Banjo-Kazooie into a native port with many new features, enhancements, and extensive mod support. This project uses RT64 as the rendering engine to provide graphical enhancements.

name: Banjo: Recompiled - Jiggies of Time
summary: A port of Banjo-Kazooie: Jiggies of Time as a mod of Banjo: Recompiled.

name: Banjo: Recompiled - Nostalgia 64
summary: A port of Banjo-Kazooie: Nostalgia 64 as a mod of Banjo: Recompiled.

name: Barely Alive
summary: A co-op survival party game - hunt your friends or survive until sunrise. Use the in game proximity VOIP and radios to form alliances...or betray.

name: Bakkorila
summary: Bakorila is an action roguelike focused on dash-based combos. Climb destructible towers, defeat enemies with lethal dashes while performing wall jumps, and use your weapon to survive increasingly dangerous threats. Build your loadout, defeat bosses, and help Bakko return to his homeland.

name: Barony: Deserters & Disciples
summary: The Deserters & Disciples DLC is here to further add to the myriad ways you can approach Barony's deadly dungeons! This time we're bringing FIVE new races and classes, each introducing rich, fun, and unique mechanics to Barony for the first time.

name: Baby Lemonade
summary: A non-linear surrealist adventure about a man trapped in his dreams while a company wants to buy them for broadcast. An immersive, open-ended exploration between psychedelic dreamlands and fragmented realities, where you can follow various bizzare objectives, find hidden paths, or try to wake up!

name: Backrooms: Don't Look Away
summary: A terrifying multiplayer horror experience set in the Backrooms. Four survivors against player-controlled mannequins that can only move when nobody is watching!

name: Bashers
summary: Gather items and kill endless waves of enemies! Level-up, unlock characters with different abilities, powerups, items and locations!

name: Balseo: The Sea Beyond
summary: BALSEO: The Sea Beyond is a stealth-action roguelite. Upon death, begin your voyage into the beyond. Traverse an ever-changing archipelago, master new skills, and choose wisely whether to face or flee from danger in the mystical southern fog.

name: Bayou Boats
summary: The swamps are your playground in Bayou Boats! Race your airboat with fun physics against challenging NPCs through a series of 24 handcrafted swamp racetracks. Dodge alligators, navigate twisting waterways, and manage your power boosts as you sharpen your skills. Earn trophies, grow your crowd, unlock new maps, and compete with your friends for the fastest race times.

name: Balls vs. Tombs
summary: Balls vs. Tombs is a dark fantasy action-survival game built around a single, haunting purpose: to reclaim stolen souls and restore peace to a desecrated graveyard.

name: Batnum
summary:
Batnum, a portmanteau of "battle of numbers" is an early BASIC game based on the family of "object pile" games, which includes Nim.

The player and computer take turns removing objects from a pile, with there being a set minimum and maximum amount of objects that can be removed per turn. The objective is to force the computer to take the last object.

name: Bard’s Fault
summary: Bard’s Fault is a co-op Action Roguelike where you and your friends fight back-to-back against relentless swarms. Craft new builds, sync your abilities, and break the timeline in this multiplayer bullet heaven. Death is just the beginning, go back to the past and unravel a time-travel mystery.

name: Bartender Simulator 2026
summary: Mix fast. Think smart. Rule the bar.

name: BanjoRecompiled
summary: An unofficial PC recompilation of Rare’s Banjo-Kazooie, created using reverse-engineered source code. The project requires users to supply their own legally obtained Nintendo 64 ROM and does not include copyrighted game assets
